39423580.review:
Жанр почти "покинь комнату", только что по комнате можно перемещаться и есть кат-сцены. Банальная до зевоты сентиментальная история, разве что в детстве могла понравиться. Некоторые моменты так и остались необъяснёнными. Как хоррор игра тоже весьма обычна. 

Имеется единственная быстро надоедающая и в конце-концов сильно раздражающая мелодия. Картинка на любителя - стандартное готическое аниме. Управление недоделанное: когда берёшь какой-то предмет из инвентаря, это никак не отображается, соответственно без пояснений вообще трудно понять как пользоваться вещами. 

Пазлы ужасные: иногда догадаешься, какой предмет куда тыкать, но ничего не работает. Зарабатывает потом, когда история чуть-чуть продвинется, причём связь между развитием истории и доступностью действия не очевидна. В результате одни и те же комбинации предметов приходится пробовать по нескольку раз пока не заработает.

39265475.review:
Не очень сложный квест...
Загадки не очень-то сложные, но у некоторых вещей есть нестандартное применение... К слову, все предметы используются для решения какой-либо загадки – лишних нет.
Сама история довольно грустная, но из-за того, что после финальных титров появляется больше вопросов, чем ответов, погрустить не получится – вы будете заняты поиском ответов. Как вы сами понимаете, рассказать о столько коротком квесте, нераскрыв детали сюжета, не получится, поэтому лучше не писать о нем в обзоре.
Графическая составляющая игры выполнена в довольно неплохой анимэ-стилистике, но, как мне кажется, могли бы сделать лучше.
А вот музыка в игре очень хорошая, она создает атмосферу игры. Правда, произношение английских слов, как мне кажется, не очень – плохо понятны многие слова...
Впрочем, игра бесплатная – моежете скачать и убедиться во всем самим.
P.S.
Действительно, а почему игра с названием "PRICE" бесплатная?

39254025.review:
[h1] PRICE [/h1]

Un juego que se basaria en resolver varios puzzles para llegar hasta el final mientras vamos descubriendo la historia de Ivry y Iva

El juego consta de dos partes, la primera se situa en la habitacion de Iva y la segunda donde Ivry, los dibujos son estilo anime y personalmente me han encantado, la banda sonora esta bien pero se puede hacer algo tediosa ya que la melodía se repite constantemente, en juego en si no es largo, ademas de darnos 8 logros fáciles imperdibles que se sacaran simplemente pasandotelo, es un free to play bastante entretenido por lo tanto si te gusta el anime y resolver puzzles juegalo, te lo pasaras entre 1h o 2h ^^

Saludos y a disfrutar ^^

39248140.review:
若死者仍同生者般度日，那么死亡还有何意义？
PRICE画风唯美细腻，音乐虽仅有一曲，但少女婉婉的低吟犹如冥海上塞壬的低语。
美中不足的是，篇幅短小，我们所经历的故事只是一段记忆，所能做的也只是从长廊中苏醒，或许......这就是命运，但谁说地狱中就难有妹控的一席之地？

游戏虽好，但流程过短，即使是精细编排的谜题和凄婉动人的乐曲都难以弥补这个硬伤，在一切的开始，我以为我会在维多利亚时期的庄园中经历一段堪称史诗的故事，在这个房间外有无尽的未知在等待着我，那阴影里可能隐藏着人心中的怪物，那黑暗中一定有常人难以涉足的辛密，我的旅程会随着脚步变得愈加广阔，慢慢的在这个昏暗的古堡里拼凑出名为救赎的螺旋......然而，当我走出这个房间的时候我发现......其实你所看到的就是一切......

游戏需要改进的地方不多，但恰恰需要改进的地方又太多，本游戏的游戏性在现代看来还是太弱了，游戏体验固然不错，但操作方式还停留在N年前的骷髅王和机械迷城上。这方面只需稍加改进（嗯，请参考无尽梦魇，我为什么会想到这个？因为这个核能蜡烛！），以DLC的形式对剧情扩充就能升格为一款极高树表的神作。


最后！教主φ(￣∇￣o)太萌惹！教主是我的你们谁都别想抢！

PRICE é um jogo Point and Click no estilo "Escape the Room", que apresenta um clima envolvente e uma história misteriosa que pouco a pouco é revelada ao jogador.

Apesar de possuir uma arte interessante e uma plot intrigante, o jogo falha (e muito) em outros quesitos:

- A jogabilidade é travada e a mecânica para utilizar itens é muito mal elaborada.

- O jogo é extremamente curto, podendo ser finalizado em menos de 1h.

Imagino que não seja tão dificil encontrar jogos melhores que este em sites de games de flash espalhados pela internet.

38723968.review:
In [i]PRICE[/i], you play as Ivry who wakes up in his sister's bedroom seemingly without explanation. However, as he soon realizes, his sister, Iva, is nowhere to be seen. He must figure out just what is going on.

Since this is a shorter game, I will keep this review short. This game is essentially an "escape the room" style puzzle game. You have to search for objects and put together clues to progress. The art in the game is pretty excellent and there are animated video segments that explain some of the story. For a game that is free, that was not expected.

There are couple of downsides here. The first is that the inventory system is annoying to use. The other would be that the story finishes with some unanswered questions. It really felt confusing at times.

Overall though, for a free game that takes about an hour to play, it is not bad. I would recommend it those looking for a quick puzzle game.

38424334.review:
[h1]TL;DR:[/h1] 
If you like puzzles, dark plots with minimal gore  and beautiful artwork and don't mind short games , this game is for you.  :)

______________________________________________________________

I dowloaded PRICE as the horror driven plot and art intrgued me. 
For a free game, I had little expecations. But man did they do the horror genre well. 

[h1]Horror Meter [/h1]
Thankfully nothing too scary but I was on edge each time something did happen. :')


[h1] Characters [/h1]
As for the characters, I found them pretty interesting and satisfactrily developed but I couldn't quite empathise with them (considering the genre, no spoilers ofc).



[h1] Gameplay [/h1]
The play style is of a horrror mystery point and click genre. 

You unlock pieces of the story through solving pretty difficult but clever puzzles. I won't lie, I spent at least an hour figuring out what to do so that was a little fustrating but once I got the hang of it , it became a little more natural. 

Quick hints: You must equip items to use them, don't spend an hour dragging them like I did . You must also combine clues to progress as well, :')


[h1] Sound Track [/h1]
The music was repetitive but if you're not too fussy you wouldn't really mind at all. Considering how it's a short game, that's very forgiveable. (I personally did mind it at all.) 


[h1] Final Thoughts [/h1]
Overall, I'd say it was nerve whacking (but that's also since I generally don't do horror) and whilst there are plotholes, whimsical characters and annoyingly confusing puzzles (but once they click , you're good to go), horror-mystery fans who love to discover and piece a story together would love this...

All for a no price at all. ;D

Pros - It is creepy, lovely usage of decadent and morbid themes, some of the most beautiful art I've ever seen in a free game.

剧情很短 用了一个多小时就通关了

先说剧情：虽然短但是内容很紧凑 环环相扣 中间也有很多伏笔 逐渐过渡到结局 给人的感觉就是 这个结局虽然大概能猜到但是知道具体细节的时候还是很感动 

再说游戏性：搜集线索寻找线索的时候设计的还挺走心的 需要玩家不只是简单的点游戏画面里的物品 更需要分析这些物品之间的关联 一步一步的发现新的线索从而找到关键性道具 说这游戏烧脑肯定算不上 但是多多少少还是需要动动脑子的 就是那种不需要查攻略不需要很费脑细胞但是需要用心去发现的类型 很喜欢

再说一个不影响总体的小小缺点：第一周目开局那个背景音乐 感觉有点小小的瘆人- -我看评论都说这游戏bgm很赞 是挺好很欧式但是第一关搜房子那个镇魂曲反反复复放真的有点吓人呀..... 如果能换一个相对温柔一点的会好很多 毕竟这个游戏的定位也不是恐怖解密 归根结底是一个讲爱与被爱 奉献与牺牲的游戏 

总体来说这个游戏还是很棒的 推荐！作为一个免费游戏做的这么用心真的很棒！！

37738222.review:
[h1]Superou minhas expectativas[/h1]

PRICE é um jogo de Puzzle que, apesar de parecer ser de terror, não vai muito além de pequenos sustos, e este nem chega a ser o foco do jogo em si.

O que torna esse jogo especial é a sua história original; um pouco simples talvez, mas que te faz querer avançar cada vez mais no game para tentar descobrir os grandes mistérios que vão sendo desenrolados a cada nova [i]cutscene[/i], estes envolvendo os personagens Ivry e sua irmã, Iva.

Não posso deixar de citar aqui também a trilha sonora desse game, e caramba, [i]que[/i] trilha sonora! Desde a intro do jogo, a cada nova descoberta e nova cutscene desbloqueada, tanto história quanto trilha sonora te jogam cada vez mais profundo na atmosfera deste. Quando menos se espera, você já está próximo do fim; é uma pena que tal game tenha uma duração tão curta.

Os puzzles presentes neste não são do tipo "impossíveis de resolver", alguns chegam a ser bem óbvios, outros nem tanto. A própria arte do jogo (que não é de se reclamar) te ajuda um pouco a descobrir algumas coisas.

Está mais que recomendado. Simplesmente amei esse jogo!! <3

感谢作者友情提供的游戏
虽然是免费的，但从各个方面来说，不难看出作者为这个游戏做了不少的设定和巧思
先竖起一个大拇指
就我个人来说，最喜欢游戏开始时杂乱昏暗背景画面
从门那边飘过来的蝴蝶带有一种斑斓的诡异，美极了
比起两个精致的主人公，晃动凌乱的线条更有氛围也更能打动我
音乐很棒，在游戏不同的地方会让人有不同的感受，或阴森或沉寂，挺厉害的
[spoiler]故事的话就不予置评了，作为对骨科没什么特殊喜好的人来说这个剧情还蛮中二的[/spoiler]
[spoiler]配音……emmmm……[/spoiler]
谜题有点晦涩，如果不是经常玩解密的人，玩起来感觉会很摸不着方向

36479047.review: PRICE jest krótką grą logiczną która też jest horrorem. Gra się dzieli na dwie części E.C.I.R.P przyjemniejszą graficznie, tajemniczą i nastawioną na straszenie i P.R.I.C.E bardziej przerażającą, odkrywającą tajemnice poprzedniej i klimatyczną. Cała gra opiera się na motywie śmierci jak i pieśni śmierci (requiem) w tle przygrywa nam właśnie ta pieśń. W grze też bardzo ważny jest motyw tytułowej 'ceny' która musi być zapłacona, każda przysługa ma swoją cenę im więcej chcesz zyskać tym więcej musisz zapłacić a jeśli źle sformułujesz swoją prośbę to będzie tylko twoja wina, że nie dostajesz dokładnie tego czego chciałeś. Gra polega na fabule która jest bardzo tajemnicza i niejasna, trzeba dużo rzeczy sobie dopowiadać przez co nasza wyobraźnia często może pokazywać nam rzeczy które nie są prawdziwe. PRICE opowiada o pewnym rodzeństwie. Ivry i Iva to właśnie bohaterowie tej gry ale kierujemy poczynaniami Ivry'ego który chce się dowiedzieć o co chodziło z jego koszmarem i chce przywrócić sobie chociaż cząstkę pamięci której stracił. Podczas rozwiązywania zagadek dowiadujemy się kim on był, kim była dla niego Iva i co się stało z ich rodziną. Gra mimo że jest krótka potrafi człowieka zainteresować i czasem nawet wystraszyć. Gra mimo że prosta to bardzo klimatyczna i warta każdej minuty przeznaczonej na nią bo historia jest naprawdę dobra a technicznie gra muzykę ma idealnie pasującą do tematyki, grafika do takiej stylistyki pasuje idealnie a gra sama w sobie jest naprawdę przyjemna do grania. Naprawde polecam każdej osobie nawet jeśli nie lubi horrorów to dla takiej historii naprawdę warto się przełamać.

二部構成の短編アドベンチャー。

ムービーが圧倒的で、とにかくその一点に特化している。
一見の価値アリ。
若干イヌカレー風味なのが気になったが。

ワンルームのホラーテイストなクリック系アドベンチャー。
短編なだけに段階的な調整が無く謎解きは結構難しい。
特に「ヒントをヒントとして認識できなかった」私は無意味に詰みました。
「攻略サイト」┗(^o^ )┓三

全体的にストーリーを断片的に見せるという演出なので、全体の把握には脳内補完が必要。
クリアしても正解は提示されない。
問題はゲーム中にストーリーの全体の把握を求められるという点。
なので「まぐれ」でクリアしてしまった場合の残尿感は相当なものだと思われる。

フリーゲームなので、このページを発見したなら出会いと思ってプレイしてみよう。

36265672.review:
《PRICE》是一款密室逃脱游戏，讲述了一对兄妹关于爱与魔法的故事。游戏的剧情主要集中在开头和结尾，通过CG的方式进行叙述，开头通过一段OP做出了大量铺垫，在结尾时猛然一收，让人措不及防，整个故事偏阴暗，但很感人。

游戏的画面采用日式画风，但又充满了英伦风的异域风情，给人一种《潘多拉之心》的感觉。场景中，哥哥黑马甲加白衬衫的经典搭配，将长腿欧巴的气质尽显无遗，而妹妹一身苏格兰披肩搭配连衣裙的造型惹人怜爱，背景的各种西式家具营造出了华丽的欧式场景。

游戏的音效不错，老旧木门的吱呀声，人物的喘息声，以及对意境的营造都十分到位。在音乐方面，OP名为《P.R.I.C.E》，即无尽徘徊，ED则是《E.C.I.R.P》，意为无尽偿还，其象征的含义和故事剧情非常贴合。游戏只有一首BGM《安魂曲》，玩家每解开一个重要谜题，就会解锁一个声部，分别是【P】iccolo，【R】ecorder，【I】va，【C】larinet，【E】nglishhorn，合在一起又是P.R.I.C.E的意思。

最后，愿天下有情人终成兄妹。

36142604.review:
[h1]美工方面是无懈可击的。[/h1]

但是游戏整体的体验感并不算很好。

首先，由于有人物行动动画的存在，对于一个密室逃脱类游戏，重复而缓慢的移动让人觉得游戏节奏十分拖沓（即便可以点击跳过），而且横版房间的表现力也远不及立体房间的感觉。

谜题的设计和连贯性有点奇怪，要么是显而易见的线索合成，要么是摸不着头脑的乱点或者穷举的解谜法，不过大多数小型密室逃脱类都是类似的尿性就是了。只有八音盒和花瓶两个密码提示有点解谜的味道。
[spoiler] 本来我还以为四个骷髅的画跟塔罗牌的顺序有关，结果是想多了。顺便，塔罗牌的顺序是看攻略完成的，操作太别扭懒得试了233[/spoiler] 

剧情采用了[spoiler] 很中二很装逼[/spoiler] 很容易黑化的哥特风，至于内容就不予评价了……

还有第一版循环的童声BGM也让我有点狂躁，实在有点吵……

不过作为一个免费游戏，能加入cv，算是有点小意外。

即便如此，个人还是不推荐，因为作为一个密室逃脱类游戏，它实在是没啥玩点，除非是喜欢这类风格或者想找个游戏消磨热身的群体吧。

36045591.review:
Zunächst: PRICE ist ein kostenloses Spiel, daher kann jeder selbst ausprobieren, ob es ihm gefällt. Es kostet einen nur die Zeit, die man damit verbringt. Wer Langeweile hat und neugierig ist, der kann es natürlich trotzdem spielen.
Ich für meinen Teil habe es durchgespielt, würde es aber nicht weiterempfehlen. Warum das so ist, werde ich hier weiter erläutern.

Die Zeichnungen sehen wirklich sehr hübsch aus und erzeugen eine märchenhafte, kindliche, aber keineswegs entspannte Atmosphäre. Die Macher haben es hier ganz gut geschafft, die etwas unheimliche Stimmung mancher Märchen einzufangen. Sowohl die Sprites, als auch die Hintergrundgrafiken, Objekte und Zwischensequenzen sind (größtenteils) durchaus gelungen. Die Geh-Animationen sind nicht ganz so beeindruckend, aber immer noch im Rahmen.
Das Einbauen einiger Holzschnitt-Grafiken aus dem Mittelalter bringt einen etwas anderen Stil rein, passt aber auch gut zur Stimmung.

Die Story ist recht überschaubar, hat mich aber zumindest für die Dauer des Spiels bei Laune gehalten.

Die Hintergrundmusik ist recht minimalistisch gehalten und besteht die meiste Zeit nur aus Frauengesang und später noch ein paar dezenten Blasinstrumenten. Ungewöhnlich, aber durchaus passend. Weniger gut gefällt mir allerdings die Musik, die im Vorspann (/1. Trailer) zu hören ist. Ein wenig zu überladen für ein ansonsten recht überschaubares Spiel.
Die (nur) chinesischen Synchronsprecher fand ich eher mittelmäßig. Eine Option, sie auszuschalten (Untertitel gibt es ohnehin immer) wäre hier ganz nützlich.

Bis hierhin wäre es ein durchaus spielenswertes, kleines Adventure gewesen. Aber es kommen leider noch einige Negativpunkte hinzu.

Das Gameplay ist ziemlich unbefriedigend. Die Rätsel sind zwar okay, die Clues-Mechanik auch interessant, aber das Adventure-typische "Benutze Gegenstand aus Inventar auf Objekt im Raum" ist hier recht holperig umgesetzt. Anstatt Drag-and-Drop oder zumindest einem SCUMM-ähnlichen System alá Maniac Mansion gibt es hier keinen wirklichen "Verwenden"-Befehl. Stattdessen wird der zuletzt angesehene Gegenstand im Inventar "ausgerüstet" und verwendet, wenn man sich ein passendes Objekt im Raum ansieht. 
Gerade an einer Stelle, wo man vier einzelne Tarot-Karten in bestimmter Reihenfolge nebeneinander legen muss, wurde das ziemlich nervig. Die meisten Adventures, die ich gespielt habe, haben das deutlich angenehmer gelöst. Selbst manche kostenlose Flash-Games haben das geschafft.

Die Übersetzung hat an manchen Stellen auch ihre Fehler. Bestimmte Textpassagen sind auf Deutsch, da kann ich bei einem anderssprachigen Spiel noch ein paar Schnitzer verzeihen. Aber die englischssprachigen Stellen haben leider auch noch einige Ungereimtheiten, die bei einem Horror-Spiel leider wirklich nicht zur Stimmung beitragen. Da die Ausgangssprache chinesisch war, ist das sicherlich nicht einfach. Dennoch sind da einige Sachen dabei, die einem als Korrekturleser auffallen sollten.

Und wo wir schon bei unfreiwilligen Stimmungsbrüchen sind: ein Großteil der Zeichnungen im Spiel ist, wie bereits erwähnt, recht gut in die Atmosphäre des Spiels eingebettet. Leider gibt es auch hier Ausnahmen. Wenn der Protagonist das Zimmer untersucht und etwas kommentiert, wird eine Miniatur seines Gesichts im "Super Deformed"-Zeichenstil angezeigt, eine im Mange und Anime verbreitete Karikaturform mit überzeichneten Gesichtsausdrücken. 
Über ein wenig Comic Relief hätte ich mich nicht beklagt, aber hier zerstört es einmal mehr die düstere Atmosphäre, die es eigentlich erzeugen will. Dafür, dass es ein Horrorspiel sein will, ist das meiner Meinung nach ziemlich unangebracht.

Ähnliches muss ich leider auch über ein paar Animationen im Spiel sagen. An mindestens einer Stelle im Spiel fliegt bei einer Figur der Kopf runter. Eine unerwartete Enthauptung kann unheimlich sein oder zumindest kurz schocken. Aber hier? Sieht es nur plump und unfreiwillig komisch aus. Da merkt man dem Spiel seinen Indie-Status und das damit vermutlich verbundene geringe Budget leider ziemlich an.

Ja, es ist ein kostenloses Spiel. Insofern sollte ich mich nicht beschweren, wenn es meinen Erwartungen nicht gerecht wurde. Aber würde ich es empfehlen? Definitiv Nein. Vermutlich jeder Steam-User hat in seiner Bibliothek schon ein anderes Spiel, in das etwa zwei Stunden Spielzeit besser investiert sind. Falls nicht, gibt es - selbst hier auf Steam - auch andere, kostenlose Spiele, die mir deutlich mehr zugesagt haben als PRICE.
Zum Sammeln der Achievements oder bei wirklicher Langeweile kann man es spielen. Aber wirklichen Spaß hatte ich damit nicht.

35708025.review:
Without using a guide, I had to resort to the tired trope of "Use every item on everything" until things worked.
Some things were obvious, but others not so much.
There were a couple puzzles that required a little brainwork.

Even though the music was good, it plays constantly on a short loop and if you're not blazing through the game, it became irritating enough for me to remove my headphones.

The voice acting and english subtitles were alright. Stealth proofread the translation, so it makes sense the subtitles would be good.
The art style and talent is also alright.

For a free game, it's something to pass an hour or so worth of time. If you love escape-the-room style games and have no money for anything else, I suppose it wouldn't hurt to give this a shot.

35699947.review:
Es ist schwierig immer ein endgültiges Urteil über ein Spiel zu geben, wenn es sehr schöne Elemente hat, aber auch einige negative Aspekte. Ich würde sagen, da das Spiel kostenlos und obendrein nicht zu lange geht kann sich jeder selbst ein Urteil machen der auf Point-and-Click mit Atmosphäre steht. Hier trotzdem meine Meinung in Pros and Cons.

Pros
- nettes Artwork, und Liebe zum Detail
- schönes Intro, Zwischensequenzen und Abspann
- die Story ist gut
- die Rätsel sind (eigentlich) leicht

Cons
- Die benutzbaren Objekte muss man im Inventar in die Mitte legen, um sie benutzen zu können, was etwas 
   gewöhnungsbedürftig ist
- Die Hitboxes einiger Gegenstände sind verdammt klein, z.B. von Schubladen und einer Räucherkugel/kegel
- Die Hintergrundmusik besteht im gesamten Spiel  (außer Intro, Zwischensequenzen und Abspann) aus dem Lied eines kleinen chinesischen Kindes (was sich zwar gut anhört, aber schätzungsweise nur 2-5 Minuten) dann nervt es finde zumindest ich. Ich habe die Musik dann etwa auf 10% gestellt
- Einige Sachen werden vom Charakter erst gemacht nachdem etwas getriggert wurde, was minimal nervt
- Es gibt wenig Rätsel, vieles ist selbstversändlich. Ein Rätsel fand ich allerdings besonders schwer da man zwar die Lösung sieht aber diese nicht wirklich erkennt. (es gibt aber sehr gute Walkthrouhgs auf Steam, habe da 2-mal reingeguckt)
- Das Exit-Fenster welches sich öffnet, hätte man auch weglassen können oder etwas hübscher machen können, im Menü gings doch auch.

Fazit: Ein gutes Spiel, was noch deutlich besser hätte werden können, hätte man die Hintergrundmusik geändert, die Grafiken einiger Gegenstände verändert bzw vergrößert (natürlich mit den Hitboxen), und die Itemmechanik einfach standardmäßig mit: "Gegenstand im Inventar anklicken anderes Objekt anklicken" gemacht. Aber das Spiel ist kostenlos und von daher sollte man es ruhig austesten wenn man auf Spiele dieser Art steht und das Artwork schön findet.

35694346.review:
Patrzę gra wygląda nieźle. Ściągam (elegancko za darmoszke).

Odpalam. Trochę głośno ściszam. Klikam Start, gra ignoruje moje ściszenie w opcjach i w całym domu rozbrzmiewa się muzyka z intro. Alt+Tab i ściszam systemowo, wracam do gry, wysypała się. 

Odpalam, klikam Start oglądam intro w normalnej głośności. Gram chwile kliknąłem jakąś lalkę. Odpala się dziwna muzyka. ALT+Tab, bo chciałem ściszyć, zapominam się. Gra się wysypuje. 

Odpalam, Start, znowu intro (nie da się przewinąć). Gram chwile unikając klikania lalki. Zawieszam się na chwile. Myślę sobie "zdajże do poranków społeczności" Shift+tab. Czytam sobie i znajduje to co chciałem. Shift+tab brak reakcji, Shift+tab brak reakcji. Alt+F4 nie działa, zamykam menadżerem. 

Odpalam, zmieniam w ustawieniach na grę w oknie, Start, znowu intro (umieram wewnętrznie). Gram chwile. Pochwiali postanawiam zapisać jakby coś się stało. Gra wywala jakiś błąd i zawiesza się. Zamykam okno. 

Odpalam i myślę sobie że może jednak się zapisało. Klikam Wczytaj. Gra wywala błąd i zawiesza się. Zamykam. Myślę sobie "uszkodzony plik zapisu jak następnym razem zapisze do będzie dobrze" . 

Odpalam, Start, Intro (Robie Szopena na klawiaturze w nadziei że jednak pominę intro ale nic z tego).  Klikam Zapisz. Gra wywala błąd i zawiesza się. Poddaje się. Pisze negatywną recenzje

35428991.review:
PRICE isn't a horror game as much as it's a Grimm fairy tale or perhaps more along the lines of Gothic literature.  There are certainly disturbing moments and I guess a few "scares," but as a self-proclaimed scaredy-cat, I didn't get much of a horror feel from the game.  I would describe the story as more macabre.  Regardless, PRICE is an excellent game.  I found the story very compelling and the characters, especially the hero Ivry, even more so.  The visuals were phenomenal and the music was pretty much perfect.  

The only "problem" I had with the game was the puzzles.  They were a little hard... or maybe I'm just not smart enough to be able to solve them?  Generally, I knew what to do and was able to follow the clues in the game to the next piece of the puzzle no problem, but I did end up having to consult a guide.  I messed up on the order of things a few times, which caused me to become stuck, and there was one part of a puzzle in particular that I would have never thought to do until seeing it in the guide.  But despite the challenge I had with the puzzles (which arguably could kind of be said makes up the whole game) I didn't find that the difficulty subtracted anything from the story or made me enjoy the game any less.  

All in all, PRICE was a wonderful game.  I really can't get over the story.  I absolutely loved it!  
I recommend this game to everyone really, teen and up.  It's tame enough in the scare factor that even people who aren't a fan of horror can enjoy it.  And really, the story is just so beautiful that I want everyone to play this, although perhaps the theme is a little niche?  Anyway, the game is relatively short, free, and has achievements, which I know is a big draw to a lot of people.  I see no downside to playing through PRICE.

35360779.review:
Is this game the best game I've ever played? No, there's definitely some things I would change. But it's free, so I recommend it.
First off, it's not a "horror" game like most think of them. It's more like a traditional horror story. I've been reading an anthology of the the history of American horror, and this games atmosphere definitely reflects that type of horror. There are no zombies, you don't have to kill anything to survive, just a little bit of blood & creepy illustrations and a serious feeling of dread. It's very absorbing. It's short though, so you don't have to worry about losing hours of your life to it. The art is very good. I liked the characters and the setting. The ending is fairly open ended, letting you draw the conclusion you liked best.
The things I didn't like were mostly in the transition between the two parts of the game. There were some characters that showed up whose purpose wasn't clear and you mostly had to guess what was intended by those cut-scenes, but this is not in the good way that the ending did it. Also, I recommend opening up a walkthrough in another window or on your phone, because not all of the mechanics are explained too clearly. And sometimes you have to do things in a certain sequence so you see things that weren't there before. There's a good walkthrough on the community page here, so you don't have to hunt far. Once you sort of figure some things out, you shouldn't need it too much.
If you are expecting a modern horror game with lots of gore and jumpscares, this is not that. But if you'd like a short but interesting game with literally no risk to your wallet, definitely check this out.

35160957.review: To be quite honest, I was really suprised on how short this game was. Usually, when playing any sort of visual novel game, it takes hours, days, weeks, and then months to finish because there is so much to do and take in from headaching puzzles to heartaching plots. I managed to finish this game within a 1 hour time span but nonetheless this game is still a good time passer. Though the puzzles were a bit simple and effortless, I thought it was a relieving touch from the common "spend 9 hours walking around to find a clue to solve this one thing". The art and designs for this game was seriously breathtaking with it's own creepy touch to fit its' horror genre. The same could be said about this games' background music, creepy yet melodious. Overall, its a good short game. Not really as scary for a horror based game but does have its creepy moments and also this game does carry a very suprising and dark plot so heads up. Another thing to add is that this game is also free, not a single penny needed so for those interested, go ahead and download.

34836069.review:
[h1]Pay the price for LOVE[/h1]
       一个关于亲情（爱情）、交易、代价的悲剧。

       Price是非常常见的“为了做成某事而付出代价”的设定，流程不长，但制作精美，有配音这一点很让人惊喜，场景设计和人物形象颇有欧洲贵族的感觉，BGM不算特别惊悚，搭配剧情食用却是效果拔群。

       我以往都很热衷于讲讲对剧情的理解和感想，但Price我似乎说不出什么。说它展现亲情，我又怀疑这份亲情之中是否夹带了一丝“爱情”——哥哥多次袒露心迹“我爱你”，恋人的塔罗牌上画的是这对兄妹，调查过程中由哥哥向玩家阐述《海的女儿》的故事……

       亲人之间当然也可以用“我爱你”来表达感情，恋人塔罗牌也许只是为了契合主题，《海的女儿》也可能只是为了表达“付出代价”。这些也许都只是我的过度解读，但所有线索整合在一起，私以为这不仅仅是亲情，可能还掺杂了些许“爱情”的味道在里面。

       [spoiler]不能再多说了，就此打住。德国骨科欢迎你们。[/spoiler]

       Price作为一款可以免费游玩的横版AVG，质量实属上乘。剧情完整，但是人物构造有点空洞，对人物的了解多是看剧情得来的，这也是Price很令人惋惜的地方。如果流程可以再长一点，对人物的心理和感情刻画就能更深入更完整，剧情也能更加饱满。希望制作组的下一部作品流程能长一些，付费我也会支持的（偷偷比心）。
  
       最后，向正在看评论犹豫要不要玩的人安利Price，这一个多小时将会是非常美妙的体验。

34696179.review:
SPOILERS!

OK, it was free. It semed to be horror. I was expecting something like Whispering Willows... it wasn't but OK, it was only about an hour long, thats fine, its pretty, the music was grating but I could turn it off, so why the thumbs down? Because it was one of the most depressing and confusing gaming hours of my life. I still don't know what happened. It seemed that Ivry was resurected into a doll and then lived in a dream state for goodness knows how long until something woke him up and he realised that he was dead and his beloved sister Iva had sacrificed herself and was now in hell so he could live in a dream. Then he realises all this, seems to be trapped, Iva appears, asks if he hates her, he says he loves her and her head falls off. 

I know it was free and I wouldn't be complaining if it had been bad but it depressed me and confused me and I kinda take it personally. If you like sad, cryptic games, then is is for you but not for me. I don't even know who was watching him. Anyone can explain the story, please do.

34690877.review:
ポイントクリックアドベンチャーゲーム。
悪夢から目覚めると妹(または自分)の部屋で寝ていたが、眠る前の記憶がなく誰もいない。何かがおかしいと探索を始めるところから始まる物語だ。
二部構成で両方プレイすると真実が明らかになる構成になっている。1,2時間でクリアできるボリュームだが、アートワークや演出、BGM、部分ボイス(中国語音声)など無料ゲームにしては非常にクオリティが高い。ゲーム自体は典型的なポイントクリックアドベンチャーで、一部分かりにくい謎解きがあるものの全体的には悪くない内容だ。ストーリーについては序盤から不穏な雰囲気で話の流れが予想できるものだが、演出が良くできておりラストに満足感があった。
以前はシステムロケールの関係で起動しないという不具合があったが、現在では解消され日本語にも対応したので気になったらプレイすることをオススメする。

34655307.review:
About PRICE:

I first got in contact with this game when a friend of mine played it and I was bored and never heard of it, so it visited some shop- and community-pages... and was caught instantly. So since I got it for free and had some spare time at my hands I was eager to try and... HOLY SHIT! Like. Really. Holy. Shit. Mixed. With. Extra. Holy. Water. 

PRICE is a storytelling masterpiece. The atmosphere is really hitting, the story catches up with every cruel ancient fairytale and has lots of linkings to well-known folklores... but all of this can´t really catch up to the music, which is not only GREAT (better then most games I frequently played/ watched, it is also cleverly linked to tthe story. That´s how you do it!

The story is a bit cruel, a bit misterious but great! Only malus here is it´s lenght (honestly the game could have gone on for at least an hour or two and I wouldn´t even notice!), I would´ve loved to see some more of the siblings past here but well... it can´t be helped I guess...

The mechanics are... let´s say different. Honestly this is a point that could maybe be worked on. The "equip items to use them"-system didn´t really got to me at first and so the first stepsp i did were pure luck... but once you get it it´s really no matter (maybe another describtion helps here?).

Oh... and did i mention the art-style and all? The game is crafted in a beautiful drawn style making the time you spend absolutely adorable! Plus some really well made cut-scenes. 

My conclusion? Play this! Do it! JUST. DO IT. Don´t let your... well... you know...

34450318.review:
Rating: 5/10 ("Average")

Recommended for: People who have spare time on their hands.

PRICE is a decent little point-and-click game for its runtime -- less than an hour -- but overall the only things it has going for it are the artstyle and the soundtrack. The plot is adequate but predictable, and the short length of the game hampers your ability to get attached to the characters at all. It's free, which is nice, and that's almost the only reason I give the game a "recommendation". The other reason is the soundtrack, which I love. And the character design isn't too bad, either; Ivry and Iva were both very cute and easy on the eyes. But overall, PRICE isn't anything special.

34368775.review:
作为一款恐怖解密游戏，个人强推。
首先，游戏画面相当不错，2D的画面要营造恐怖感并不是一件简单的事，但这款游戏真的在作画方面十分用心，不管作用多少，这份用心是要点个赞的，然后还有音乐等等游戏中的东西就不多说了，相信是对得起大家玩两个小时的。最重要的是，免费啊！兄弟们！真的良心不多说！解密方面，大家不用抱太大期待，但这样的难度还是很适合这种短篇游戏的，所以说了这么多，一句话，推荐！最后，双结局很有看点，大家要有一定心理准备。最后一个成就有点意思，大家玩玩看吧。

34344158.review:
Recuerdo haber escuchado el tema principal del juego, pero recientemente me tome el tiempo de probar el juego y cumplió mis expectativas, sin embargo creo que tiene ciertos aspectos negativos que merecen al menos una mención, a continuación enumerare sus aciertos y errores

Positivas:
*Gratis (Duh)
*Visualmente es maravilloso: No es solo por el arte y estilo de los personajes o por que estos tengan animaciones al interactuar o desplazarse de un lugar al otro, sino también los fondos los objetos “examinables”, o la cantidad de dibujos que hay a medida que se avanza en la trama, siendo una cantidad bastante amplia teniendo en cuenta la duración del mismo,  se nota un gran esfuerzo y esmero por resaltar en este apartado,  tan solo con ver la intro debería ser suficiente.
Ost original: Es usual que en juegos gratuitos se utilice música hecha por autores/as totalmente ajenos/as  al juego en cuestión, en este caso es totalmente original del staff del juego lo que ayuda en brindarle aún más personalidad, lo cual aprecio mucho, son pocas canciones pero no puedo quejarme debido a su duración.
“Sistema nuevo”: Como un agregado bastante interesante, recolectamos “pistas” que pueden mezclarse con otras y con eso sacar más pistas hasta acercarse a la verdad, lastimosamente aunque creo que estuvo bien pudo tener mucho más impacto e incluso llevarse un poco más lejos de lo que termino siendo, sigue siendo un buen agregado igual.
Pantalla completa: Si, se ve bien incluso en pantalla completa…

Negativas:

*El terror: Irónicamente creo que falla en lo que más estuve buscando cuando se descargaba, ¿Dónde quedo el terror que tiene en sus etiquetas? Había empezado bastante bien, para luego convertirse en un total “meh”, podía sentir tensión de vez en cuando pero se pasaba rápidamente con algún otro evento o por la espera a resolver un puzzle, si bien puede ser que haya cosas que no haya visto, realmente siento que falto ese factor de intranquilidad, de hecho el ambiente y atmosfera se siente… Cálido, quizás un poco deprimente pero acogedor, por razones de no spoiliar dejare el tema aquí.
Puzzles: Nunca fui tan fan de los puzzles, pero realmente no disfrute resolver la mayoría de estos, ya que las maneras de resolverlos los sentí al azar, intentar usar todos los objetos del inventario, inspeccionar varias veces todos los objetos, e intentar mezclar las pistas a “diestra y siniestra” me provocaron la sensación que solo había avanzado porque “Tuve suerte” aunque hay alguna minoría que si disfrute pensando y resolviendo, pero es lo que dije… Una minoría.


También parece que la historia es más profunda de lo que aparenta, pero realmente no me llamo la atención así que prefiero “dejarla de lado”.
Como conclusión quiero decir que aunque falle en algunos puntos bastantes importantes es un juego gratuito bastante interesante y que puede matar al rato, sin embargo y dolorosamente pudo ser algo mucho mejor de lo que termino siendo, tal vez solo tal vez, es debido a su breve duración, pero tenía tantas ideas, tanto talento, tanto potencial que no supo aprovecharse del todo.  Estaré esperando otros juegos del equipo desarrollador con gran entusiasmo.

CONS: Plot twist is something you see from a million miles away, and half the time you're wasting around finding something to click on. Not nearly scary enough though.

PROS: The clues and items are intuitive enough to not be classified as bullshit, and the devs clearly had the players in mind by allowing you to click-skip walking animations.

34204671.review: This game was absolutely beautiful. I went into it thinking that it'd be fun and quick but that's not what I got at all, in a very good way. It was quick, that's for sure, but the art and music were absolutely beautiful and made you want to see it through to the end. I was also concerned because other reviews said the characters were flat and the ending predictable...but I have to disagree! For as short as it was, the characters were fascinating. The siblings were straight out of a gothic anime fairytale, and they were enthralling. The ending was actually the opposite of what I expected from the first half of the game, so it wasn't predictable at all for me! In the end, I'm still a little unsure of what exactly happened, but I'm okay with that. Maybe I'm a little slow, but I loved this game. I would have definitely paid money just to play this piece, and I can't wait to see more from the developers!

33884477.review:
看到宣传视频的时候已经觉得很惊艳，闪现的画面让人忍不住猜测剧情的发展会是怎样。
进入游戏之后的开场过后，已经脑洞大开脑补出各样的可能性；
[spoiler]比如说什么哥哥其实你已经把妹妹干掉了，再不然就是你已经被妹妹干掉了（好像没什么不对？）；但是没想到居然是相当温馨系的结局[/spoiler]
在这里温馨提示只看了半眼游戏提示的小伙伴，想使用物品只要换到那个物品退出去就可以了= =

黑猫：“希望你不要在“噩梦”里永远徘徊”
一周目的时候看到黑猫突然出现我是一脸懵逼的，玩完二周目再回来看到这句话，瞬间感受到[spoiler]恶意有没有，可怜我家妹妹和你做生意然后你还要急着催债；
二周目也完美解答了一周目遗留的各种谜题：为什么会出现在妹妹的房间？为什么回忆都是妹妹的回忆？因为哥哥已死，这个“噩梦”正是以妹妹的记忆为载体幻化出来的迷幻的梦境。而梦境结束后，黑猫口中的“噩梦”，二人的“永恒”，则刚刚开始。
当二周目这个“永恒”的结束的时候，妹妹绝望地奔跑过来迎接自己的终焉，开口的第一句话却不是自己的生死，而是哥哥是否憎恶自己。然后作者连个skinship都不给就直接掉头了啊！寄刀片成就拿的不冤:)
也许这笔与恶魔的交易所带来的、短暂的“永恒”，与自己的灵魂相比，妹妹并不会觉得不值吧；但是本宝宝觉得不值所以我要寄刀片:)[/spoiler]

[h1]总结[/h1]
免费精品，值得一小时的人生。

33775303.review:
This game is ideal for achievement hunters; the game is free and easy to play, the story is short, and the achievements are easy to get. I experienced a few slow and tedious moments, though. The clue hunting and assembling got a bit tiring for me. If you want to breeze through this game, I'd strongly recommend taking a look at the guides available on Steam. If you're hunting for trading cards, I'm afraid you won't find them here; I didn't get any freebies.

Although I've long outgrown anime, I did my best to take my time with the story. The translator has done a great job making this accessible to English speakers, but I felt like aspects of the story are being 'lost in translation'. Without any exposure to or an understanding of Asian media (specifically their take on the horror genre and anime), players may have trouble following the plot. The game seems to blend elements of Asian and Western suspense, thrillers, and horrors; it would have benefitted from being focused and dedicated to a single genre and style.

Overall, the game still needs a bit more polish before it can be taken seriously or compared against other anime games. Having said that, I have to commend the development team for taking on such an ambitious project. I was surprised to see a well-animated intro and some high-quality illustration; it gave a good first impression, but it just wasn't consistent all the way through.

33720408.review:
感觉这是一个做得很用心的游戏，而且还是免费的。

首先，这是一款恐怖解密游戏。要说恐怖 ，讲真的，整个游戏过程中的音乐一直在渲染 一种恐怖的氛围 （当然 ，效果的确很好，全程都有种紧张感），但真正让我感觉心惊肉跳的，是一周目点击某张图片后设置界面突然跳出 的那个部分。

进度无法继承。记得很久以前（具体记不得，但肯定长于一个月）我把一周目给通了。由于各种不可抗力的因素（听说二周目很虐），我就暂时弃坑了。直到今天我又重新下载过来，发现以前的记录没有了？！好在过关时间不算长，要不然我就怨念了……

最后啊，我觉得作者还是很自觉的……你还是知道我们想向你寄刀片的哈？所以就有了最后一个成就：Kill The AuthorI.不过还是请作者下次记得写上地址，要不然都不知道刀片要发到哪里去。（笑）

最后总结一下：音乐：⭐⭐⭐ 画面：⭐⭐ 剧情：⭐⭐ 作者：Ehhh……刀片X3

Aber nein das wäre ja wirklich dämlich. Man muss es gespielt haben es ist sehr gut gelungen. 33692996.review:
It's natural that it would be relatively short since it's a free game, but it's as good as any paid game.
It tells a very intriguing story in the short time you play it, and it was one that I found well worth discovering.
The art is beautiful in-game and during the cutscenes, and the atmosphere does make you feel uneasy as it should.
The soundtrack, sparse as it is, is quite lovely and haunting.

What have you got to lose? If you enjoy supernatural themes and point-and-click games, I recommend P.R.I.C.E.

【关于主线】
[spoiler]哥哥因为肺痨重病，担心哥哥的妹妹遇到了魔法师（卖安利的），被授予了禁术的匕首，因为安利说那个禁术不能对死人用，所以就得趁活着的时候……所以是妹妹杀了哥哥，然后哥哥的灵魂被放进了人偶（魔法师按照哥哥样貌做的等身人偶）里，而那个禁术是有代价的，但是如果哥哥一辈子不知道真相，那妹妹的代价就不会被触发，所以如果不继续探索真相也就是玩二周目的话，俩人就能一直在现实中幸福生活下去，但一旦知道了真相，代价就被触发，妹妹偿命，哥哥变回人偶再次死去，所以等于说是哥哥最后亲手害死了妹妹[/spoiler]

33465017.review:
This game has a lot more production value than I originally thought.
+Pros:
+The vocals are in the native language still, but the voice acts still seems to be done well.
+The story is not bad and is told in an artful way. It leaves you wondering "which was which" up until near the end.
+Artwork is well done.
+Thar be animations
+Music is fitting, if not a little over the top at times

-Cons w/ +solutions:
-When you get stuck...you feel like you've been forsaken by the puzzle gods + Steam discussion can remedy this
-Apparently there are different cuts scenes depending on how updated your codecs are and which language you are playing. +I believe they are all on youtube though.
-I am not joking about getting stuck, its extremely frustrating
-Some click boxes were so close together I didn't realize they were separate. (That screw took me forever.)

All in all, it was a good puzzle game with some lvl 9000 moments appearing at random and it is definitely worth more than the current price (free). It is short, but if you get stuck it can get longer. I put in 2.5 hrs and probably could have shaved off 30-40 mins if I didn't waste time doing the "try everything on everything x2" when I got stuck. Overall I recommend.

33438284.review: Good (if short) puzzle game with very nice art and music. It's challenging without being ridiculously difficult and has an interesting story-line. It has a slightly creepy atmosphere thanks to both plot and music, but not too much of one (I'm not a huge horror fan but I found this fine). However, occasionally it's confusing/too picky about things - combining Clue A with B does nothing, but B with A works; item finding can be a little hit-and-miss at times as you'll sometimes have to have triggered one thing before an apparently unrelated item can be found. These minor issues don't cause too much stress though and it's well worth playing.

33392358.review:
The game is free, so you know. I mean, it isn't a waste of your time to try, even if your connection is pretty slow!

I'm notoriously bad at Escape games (it's that "kind" of game), and although there are some ingenious mechanics (like the Clue system), due to general clumsiness as well as translation barriers, the gameplay is clunky and impairs immersion a lot.

That said, if you click everything systematically and try or test everything, you should be able to muddle through. There's also enough flavor in this game that it isn't an especially painful process. The storyline, visuals, and even atmosphere are all incredible.

I wish it had more depth or substance. I want to understand [spoiler]why it looked like that one scene had the dad and a younger version of the daughter from the horror game Mad Father[/spoiler] and see a connection explored there [spoiler]between these families[/spoiler]!

Like, I hate escape games, and found the mechanics encumbersome and unpleasant, but I'm still craving more from P.R.I.C.E!

It's a good game, and I would defintitely recommend it at this fine, fine price of Free!

33378409.review:
以免費遊戲而言這樣的體驗還不錯

整體遊戲氣氛足夠，系統還算流暢
畫面和氣氛渲染佳
還有一個炫麗的OP

謎題不難，不如說其實幾無解謎成分
原以為是像浮士德的噩夢那樣的解謎(甚而有動作)遊戲
不過其實只是靜態的探索遊戲
長度也其實沒有很長(如果再長的話免費玩我會良心不安)，所以大家可以放心玩

不如說比較像電子小說那樣
大部分的解謎點在於要組合線索還有裝備特定物品去觸發事件推進劇情

-------------------------------------------------

可惜的是遊戲音樂太大聲，亦太刺耳而不適合做為遊戲的BGM
尤其是人聲有點略嫌刺耳
所幸遊戲時間長度不長，還堪忍受

有配音這點滿不錯的，可惜大部分都有點棒讀
尤其是女主角配音太冷淡，語尾常常下沉且短促，聽了有點不舒服(並不是玩家我認為劇情需要的那種不舒服)
(男主角配音純粹音質音色個人不習慣亦不覺討喜)
惡魔的配音也有點太為了強調邪氣變得陰陽怪氣的做作
(尤其是那個"Nya~"(字幕使用半形標點導致在選用的自行下形狀變得很奇怪也是很可惜的點))
這些都多少讓人有點出戲
可以再思考一下要怎麼做才能讓配音更切合遊戲體驗

Q版的頭像和吐槽，以及惡魔的形象都讓這個感覺有點懸疑獵奇的遊戲有所喘息
也是不錯的地方

33274248.review:
起初，我觉得这个游戏有点难评价，因为它同时有着一些优点，也有一些缺点，综合之后反倒没什么可讲了，但是凭着游戏精神，我还是一一列出来吧
优点：
1.作为一款免费游戏，虽简短但制作精良，甚至有点物超所值的感觉
2.出色的人物立绘，动画剪影和国语配音，些许的jump scare使整个故事的氛围营造得更好
3.少有的线索和解密同时进行，这在众多一尘不变的解密游戏中不乏是一个亮点
4.剧情虽短但跌宕起伏，起初我以为是类似于无尽的梦魇，但之后发现是故事中的故事，令人细思极恐[spoiler] 暗黑味，嘎嘣脆
 [/spoiler]
缺点：
1.bug。我不知道是我这边的原因，还是游戏本身的问题，它总会将游戏的声音调到最大，这使得原本为了营造氛围bgm变得有些精神污染，更别说戴着耳机玩了
2.配音有点出戏。[spoiler] 有种大叔强装成青年的感觉 [/spoiler]
3.线索、剧情、解密衔接的不够流畅。有时钥匙都拿到了，但非得合线索看会剧情才能走，这会让游戏内容显得有些牵强；或者有些物品，比如柜子什么的，本来就可以互动了，但非得合个线索看会剧情才能触发，更别说有些线索之间的关系就很微妙，往往会给人一种很突兀的感觉。其他的，比如开个抽屉要密码，开个柜子要密码，开本书要钥匙，还有一次性的刀子，这些就不吐槽了。

总的来说，这是一款值得一玩的游戏，你能看得出制作很用心，但会有一些小毛病，不过这是免费的，就不要求什么自行车了

33230426.review:
A surprisingly deep F2P point 'n' click mystery game with some rather dark undertones. 

The art style is exceptional, with a gothic narrative that meshes well with what you see. The plot is a bit obscure at first, but after solving a few of the game's (somewhat head-scratching) riddles, things become more clear. The theme is rather strange,  but moving, and progression never feels like a chore.

PRICE will require a few additional "playthroughs" in order to reveal the full scope of the outcome, which definitely ups it's replay value. Certain puzzles can be a little tricky, so don't be surprised if you need a guide here and there in order to advance. I would strongly urge to persevere to the best of your ability though, as the reward for solving such conundrums independently in these types of games is the peak of the experience. 

It's a no-brainer recommendation for me - achievement hunters and casual players alike. PRICE is a must play for anyone looking for something different without having to spend a dime.

This game is pretty good.

The storyline is wrapped up rather nicely, though the real ending is a little confusing. The gameplay itself is a click-adventure and, aside from some selection issues here and there, it was just a lot of...clicking and double checking items for clues.

A few of the puzzles in P.R.I.C.E. (which you unlock after finishing E.C.I.R.P.) were a little vague, but did not subtract from the experience too much. 

All the clicking may feel tedious, but the story is worth it and the art is beautiful.

首先吧，来谈谈我对这款游戏的感受，第一个就是开场那丰富的剧情吸引了我（我是一名极其注重剧情的人），可以看出这款游戏内容很深，进入游戏玩了之后我感受其中的剧情更加是典型.....咳咳，不剧透，总之剧情很赞，好评。
      其次，就是画风了。能够决定一个游戏的好坏，画风往往能够占据观众评价的上风，画手那细腻的手法也是让我觉得这游戏好评的其中一个原因（在下是一名美术生）
      最后，就让我们来谈一下玩法吧。如果你进入了游戏，那么你将不难看到这款游戏里面引用的其实是经典的点击解密手法......唔，感受在这里就是有些一般了，毕竟是沿袭前辈的做法，再怎么评论，也只能挤出五个字——“经典不做作”
      总之呢，我个人是很推荐这款微恐怖的解密游戏的~

很短的游戏（当然没我的游戏时长那么短，因为我是离线的没有统计），智障也可以快速全成就（只要有提示）。
优点：
1.漂亮的作画，如果有偏爱这种风格的尤其可以加分。
2.BGM相当优秀，大概是因为故事本身与乐章有关？
3.故事水平没有大纰漏，个别心理洁癖可能有本能反感，不过对丧失们无疑有加分。
4.免费啊，免费，做工这么漂亮的玩意居然免费！
缺点：
1.个别角色配音出戏，不点名了。
2.许多，注意，许多线索根本没有严格联系，是强行凑成一条线的。卡关不是你的错，可能只是没对上作者的思路。
3.本游戏无法离线解锁成就，明明是极为适合没网无聊时玩一玩的。

总的来说，还是推荐的，耗时不多，相当值得。想进一步支持的可以买DLC。

32974256.review: Y'see it's really hard to recommend this game to anyone unless they enjoy good graphics and can ignore the gameplay. The gameplay isn't nessecarily bad, but it can at times be a little unfair with objects with hitboxes that are too small to notice or items that don't appear unless you trigger another event unrelated to it. There are many times where there are huge jumps in logic and it gets annoying trying to deal with it. However, if you can get past that, the game is quite charming. You can tell this was a passion project rather that just another game a company pushed out for the cash. The art is really beautiful. It fits the somber tone that it sets out to portray. If you're into nice graphics, please complete the game. You don't start seeing the truly nice art until near the end portions of the game. Speaking of the ending, because the game is so short, it doesn't annoy you as much. Ivry figures out things very fast; things you were probably thinking of while playing. He might even figure out something you weren't thinking of. So you don't have to go through the dull slog of getting annoyed at the main MC for not figuring out something relatively obvious. The writting could still use some improvement with it being a little smoother, but that's it. Either way, it's a very charming game. (I want to know if the artist(s?) for this game has a blog 'cause I'd follow them....)

32958328.review:
Ich habe das Spiel zufällig entdeckt und bereue es nicht!
Adventures mochte ich schon immer und je schwerer die Rätsel, umso mehr Ansporn gibt es mir! x) 
Es waren auch einige knifflige dabei und leider muss ich zugeben, dass ich den Guide 2x benutzen musste...

Man merkt, dass sich bei diesem Spiel richtig viel Mühe gegeben wurde und dann ist es auch noch kostenlos, da finde ich es schon fast ein Must-have für jeden Horror-, Gothic-, Anime- und/oder Adventureliebhaber.

Die Horror-Elemente sind ganz hübsch gemacht, und die Zeichnungen an sich gefallen mir schon sehr. Anzeig verwirrend fand ich am Anfang die Steuerung (und damit meine ich nicht nach rechts oder links laufen): die zwei verschiedenen Inventare haben sich mir nicht sofort erschlossen... 

Vielleicht für alle, die ähnliche Probleme haben: das obere Inventar kombiniert Erinnerungen miteinander zu einer neuen. Das wird im Spiel ja auch erklärt wie es funktioniert, damit hatte ich dann nicht so die Probleme.
Aber beim unteren Objekt-Inventar wusste ich erst lange nicht, wie man es richtig benutzt. Nämlich das Objekt, dass man mit einem anderen im Raum benutzen will, muss man auswählen und dann das Inventar wieder einklappen...ja, gut, nennt mich blöd, aber da ichs aus den ganzen anderen Mainstream Point&click gewöhnt war, das Item am Cursor zu sehen bzw. es zumindest irgendwo "hinziehen" oder es gleich im Inventar untereinander kombinieren konnte, stand ich hier mächtig auf dem Schlauch und durfte auch prompt schonmal im Guide nachlesen -.-" *ich bin Doof auf die Stirn kleb* 

Nachdem ich diese Hürde dann aber mit ach und Krach gemeistert habe, stand dem Rätseln, Gott sei Dank, nichts mehr im Weg! 

Die Musik fand ich auch sehr gelungen fürs Ambiente, wenn ich mir den O.S.T auch nicht unbedingt kaufen würde ^^"
Finde es aber für alle anderen schön, die sich die Stücke gerne öfter anhören möchten. 

Wie auch schon ein paar mal erwähnt, mehr als 1-2 Stunden braucht man leider nicht für das Spiel. 
Mir sind Ivry und Iva aber so ans herz gewachsen, dass ich es bestimmt nochmal durchspielen werde, wenn die Rätsel wieder vergessen wurden (und ich wieder Probs mit der Inventar-Handhabung bekomme xDD)

作为一款免费游戏可以说是十分良心了，不仅游戏自带中文字幕及中文配音，而且剧情算是比较完整，至少还算是完整地讲述了一个故事，美中不足的就是前期铺垫略少一开始有点突兀，作为一款微恐怖微解谜的游戏，游戏难度可以算是十分友好了，至少仔细观察都会在游戏中发现相关提示，不会出现一脸懵逼摸不着头脑不知所措的尴尬情况，而且游戏中并没有jump scare，基本都是场景渲染，即使是对恐怖游戏有排异反应的玩家也可以放心食用。

32754700.review:
I would most likely give this game a 7/10, if it were necessary. And I don't even like horror-related things that much.

I completed the game in little over an hour, however; with a certain puzzle I ended up looking at a guide, and then continued to reference the guide throughout the rest of the game. I feel that completing the game would have felt more fulfilling had I not used a guide, but I would have spent far too much time on the one puzzle that I was stuck on and probably would have given up. 

The controls are simple, once you get used to them, but could be described a bit better. (It may just be a translation problem, since I'm assuming the game wasn't originally made in English). There were some actions in the game that I could not complete, but they were neither game breaking nor prevented me from obtaining all eight of the achievements. They were just a bit frustrating. 

The story itself was very interesting, and I enjoyed how the player can start to piece together the bits and pieces of the past together as they play along with the game. 

I ended up playing the game on a whim, with the art style having caught my eye. The music is pretty good too, though since I'm not much of a horror person I ended up playing without my headphones. I'll probably end up buying the DLC, since I'd like to see some more of the design of the game as well as listen to the music without having to play through it again.

32732307.review:
I really wanted to like this game. Let's start with the pro's.
The artwork and graphics in this game are amazing. Some real effort has gone into the art.

Now the cons.
I found the music annoying. Sorry, not really my taste, had to mute it after a while.
A difficulty curve was non-existant. I found the first room really challenging, seemed to take me forever to make progress. The drawer password took me a million trys before I figured it. Then the second room, seemed really easy and obvious and I flew through it.
Yes, you read correctly. TWO rooms. That is the entire game.
The plot didn't really appeal either. Since the game kinda expects you to work out what has happened in the plot as part of a puzzle, the conclusion didn't shock or surprsie me.
The inability to combine inventory items stuck me as odd too.

But hey, it's free. Maybe I shouldn't be so critical. I enjoyed the time I spent with it, but I was hoping to become fully invested in the crazy fiction the game was telling and regretfully, it ended poorly and way too soon.

I am sorry YETU GAME. But you lit an impressive looking firework and it just kinda fizzled out. :(

32588596.review:
注意啦注意啦，是吐槽向啊，我只说我觉得不好的部分，好的部分一笔带过啊，不爱听的现在可以跑路啊
哦，还有，这玩意儿涉及剧透，请考量后再阅读
咳咳
首先，我是不推荐这玩意儿的，因为作为一个解谜向的东西——它的谜面一！点！都！没！意！思！
难度有吗？我可以告诉你有的，但是难度完——全不在解谜上！全TM在找东西的难度上！
而与之对应的，解谜的难度却一点，都，没有，所有的解谜逻辑都是直球中的直球，其逻辑难度大致相当于“人被杀，就会死”
关于其找东西的难度，也不在“找”上，而在于操作上
同一个触发点根据游戏进程不同做到不同的开启度是很多解谜游戏都在做的事情
但是你！得！给！点！征！兆！啊！一个已经经过反复调查的触发点竟然会在一次剧情触发后就不声不响的开启了，而且所有触发点都是这样的（这直接导致我在第一个房间卡关超过半个小时——我总游戏时间只有一个半小时——）
这也就算了，线索物品与场景的无关联性，物品使用方法与现实的无关联性，在这份游戏中得到了非常具体的体现，比方来讲，在地毯式炮轰搜查之前我怎！么！也！没！想！到！小刀竟然是用来挖眼球的！这和墨水瓶里的螺丝钉，以及迷之原理被烧了会出字的花瓣构成了我整个游戏体验中最糟心的三个部分
除此之外，游戏系统的设定非常不友好，有很多触发点之间浮标并不产生变化，就比如书桌上的墨水瓶和碎信，这种操作方法非常直接导致了地毯式搜查成为最有效的方法，而在解谜游戏中本人最讨厌的就是地毯式搜查
然后我们抛开操作系统和检索整合调查取证的不友好性
本游戏的文字说明极其令人深思，我们举个例子，物品名“部件2”，说明是“似乎是什么的一部分，像是发条”大概是这个感觉，然后他竟然是一个独立的物品！！！不需要合成使用！你敢相信一个顶着“部件2”这样名字的物品是独立的！这种类似的文案也体现在游戏的其他部分，比如说“烧花”和“烧花瓣”——是有区别的——诸如此类我就不再列举了
而游戏的剧情是我不得不吐槽的地方
整个游戏文案的特色完美体现在了剧情之中，你可以深刻的从剧情中理解到“不明觉厉”“不知所云”和“哥特黑暗”原谅我第三词出现的突兀，因为它就是这么突兀！！！哥特不存，这是我的口误，黑暗元素被以一种强硬的方式糅合进了剧情之中
我说这游戏的本体是个骨科吧！！！那为什么要设置这么庞大的世界观！设置了也就算了！剧情的叙述让我的感觉就是云里雾里！剧情撰写者似乎是想通过蒙太奇的手法碎片化揭露整件事情的真相，但是！蒙太奇有一个关键！那是文本量够大的情况下才能使用的手法
像这种“兄妹自幼丧父相依为命，哥哥是个音乐天才，妹妹是个重度兄控，之后哥哥得了肺痨于是为了救哥哥妹妹和地狱使者做了个交易”就能解释的剧情根本！不能！用！蒙太奇！
这只会让玩家在结束整个游戏进程后产生一种“你就想讲这个？”“你是不是在逗我”“你是不是把我当智障”的错觉
况且单从剧情本身上来讲也有诸多极度影响观感的地方
首先是光有人设没有人塑，这点在妹妹身上体现的淋漓尽致，恕我直言这种虽然不知道为什么但我就是重度兄控的模式在多少年前的恋爱喜剧中已经被抨击的体无完肤了
其次就是后两个角色出现的突兀，关于他们的出现，没有铺垫，没有过程，没有结尾，他们的存在只是为了解释剧情，只为了剧情而存在名字的角色就是空壳，所以看着以“死神”和“地狱使者”自称的两个角色我只想笑，因为我在他们身上看到的是剧情撰写者的影子，他迫不及待地想参与进这个故事说两句
这点在中间的念白上也有体现，我可以认为p1结束进p2的念白是在劝退吧，是在劝退没错吧，什么叫做童话故事就是这样的，你是在做恐怖游戏啊！恐怖游戏没人会半途而废的啊！这种对白的插入只会让人觉得尴尬啊！！！
而从设定的角度上来讲，为什么身为地狱使者连固定灵魂都做不到啊！！！这种事情某个一米六的小矮子炼金术师都会吧！而且什么叫做“直到他醒来为止的永恒”，这句话是前后矛盾啊！要不要我跟你解释一下什么是有时限的时间段，而什么是永恒啊！你的语文是小学体育课上学的吗！不是把看起来矛盾的两句话放在一起就是深刻啊！你这是消费欺诈啊！而且片尾似乎地狱使者又有了新技能，那你能制作人偶就给我再做一个啊！收藏只收一半是什么心态！你是正太控吗！说起来你这也好意思号称地狱使者啊！西蒙woody席徳撒旦都是你的同行啊！你就不觉得羞耻吗！复活不会，灵魂定着也不会，好不容易会做个人偶眼线竟然还要自己画！那你干嘛不去练练操偶术啊！那若干年后也能和迪达拉一起进攻木叶啊！这总比你这种只有一个“地狱使者”空头衔的无价值人生好多了吧！！！
况且结局迷之残念，反正我是不能理解“永世徘徊在地狱”“死掉”和“能永远在一起”算是哪门子的实现以及这是哪门子的公平交易——妹妹似乎完全是为了死而死的，哈哈哈...
那么以上是我针对这个老游戏的吐槽，这么突然的收宫是我怕再说下去要忍不住开始吐脏字了所以咱个说到这里就停吧——
喂干嘛这么看着我
我是不会因为是国产游戏就嘴下留情的
坦白的讲这种剧情和文本就是心灵之粪啊，好评如潮给的都是原画吧岂可修，编导你不要太自信了啊给我从头修炼一百年啊！
（逃）

32556072.review:
It's free. lol. Anyway: 
PRICE is a short, point-and-click, puzzle game with nice art. It is however, not the most ambitious.

[b]Pros and In-between: [/b]
+ Art
+ Music
Good to a degree. Serves it's purpose. The small amount of soundtracks is understandable.
+ Horror elements 
Just doing what they do.

[b]Cons: [/b]
- The controls. 
They're finicky. It might be hard to progress the story because despite knowing the answers, you have to excute actions properly e.g. (puzzle component answer)  [spoiler] The way you have to burn a petal, trying to input the tarot cards, etc.[/spoiler] 
It's all doable but you have to sort of feel for the game's mechanics and work with it.

- This is just me being picky now lol but if you wanna know:
[spoiler]Accessibility. The type setting/fonts used. Not the best choice. Even Constantia would've been better. The subs are serviceable as is. Pacing...a little sporadic and random which isn't bad since it adds mystery but not like this. [/spoiler]


Good but no, I wouldn't recommend the game to everyone especially if you really want a story. If I really had to, I'd recommend it to those new to the rpg-horror genre. It wouldn't be the top game I'd tell them to try out though.

32555822.review: I really loved this game, short though it is. The story was well written, I enjoyed the game mechanics, and the soundtrack was beautiful and suited the game well. The art is wonderful, and is the main reason I installed PRICE, but the story was well worth it. Definitely fits my aesthetic of creepy but cute. The puzzles were fairly easy to solve, so if you're looking for a challenge in that department, it may not be for you. I would definitely say it's worth your time.

I don't feel the need to replay it, but for a game that is so short and free, you have nothing to loose by downloading it.

32413486.review:
骨科！骨科！骨科！重要的事情说3遍！
最初接触这个游戏是被PV和配乐所吸引，剧情线根据搜索线索可以缕清，画风美且带伤感，黑童话，不要被人物纯良的外表所欺骗。推动故事情节发展的人物也都在塔罗牌中以唯美的形象出现，猫（他其实是...)的声音刚解锁的时候，被萌一脸。
“Kill the Author" 是我最喜欢的成就，但是想到主人公解开一切的时候，感觉有什么已经为时已晚，作者还是给我们发了一份含着玻璃渣（？）的糖，嗯，笑着玩下去。
总体来讲PRICE,还是ECIRP都是很精心的解谜游戏！期待之后更好的作品！【这个游戏的勋章很可爱的！

32390488.review:
Una joyita. Tiene una bonita historia al mas puro estilo romántico de los realtos de Poe. Bastante densa para ser un juego tan corto. La simplicidad de sus decorados y su inventario algo ortopédico (al principio tendrás que buscarte un walktrough para averiguar como va) casi no importa gracias al suspense y lo que promete la histora. Además los dibujos de los personajes y la música están bastante logradas. Es una suerte que lo tradujeran al inglés.

Aunque se hace corto y como point a and clik no es gran cosa no lo dudes en jugarlo, es una preciosidad gratuita.

很棒的RPG游戏！，看介绍的时候是被画风吸引，点进游戏开始玩的时候瞬间就被游戏开头动画和音乐惊艳到了，虽然语言渣听不懂在唱什么2333，但是BGM的风格和营造出的氛围结合游戏画风，给人感觉相当精致。
作为一个横版RPG解迷游戏，画风好的没得说，谜题设置不算难，虽然对角色形象设计的不是很丰满但是有颜值啊啊啊，（对我就是冲着又美又受的男主和萌死人的女主去的）重点是还有配音而且感觉还挺不错，（娇喘好评23333）
这么不错的游戏，还免费，不夸一下感觉有点过意不去2333
BGM真的很赞啊，超喜欢的！
不过操作上有时候还是感觉有点蛋疼的，其它时候都还好，就是在按顺序放塔罗牌那里，放一张出去一次，选另一张牌，来来回回还是挺麻烦的，其它感觉都还好， 可能我是那些一般道具栏在物品查看栏下方可以显示，可以直接把道具拎进去用的游戏玩多了，有点不习惯这种操作吧。

32152440.review:
J'ai beaucoup aimé (comme l'indique le pou-pouce vers le haut). Un univers plutôt sombre dans lequel on se plonge assez facilement je trouve le tout sur fond de musiques mi-angoissantes mi-trop mignonnes (avis personnel)

Un ptit point'n'click vraiment joli et agréable à jouer (la façon dont le "héros" se déplace par exemple, jtrouve çà magnifique mais çà n'engage que moi encore une fois). Il y'a de la difficulté mais rien d'insurmontable, au pire il y'a des guides sur le hub très bien fait. Par contre il est très préférable de manier la langue de Shakespeare pour avoir une experience agréable, à moins que vous ne compreniez le mandarin.

Je n'ai que deux choses à reprocher à ce jeu:

* La première fois que j'ai joué, le jeu a freezé au bout de 30 min à peu près et je ne pouvais plus accéder a mes sauvegardes ( :D *joie*). Certains ont réussi en changeant leur language non unicode, çà n'a rien changé pour moi. Enfin, après de bons pétages de plombs j'ai trouvé un moyen donné sur le hub conseillant d'effacer ce qui se trouvait dans la partie "savedata" [steam<steamapps<common<price<savedata] et çà a parfaitement réglé mon problème même si du coup il me fallait recommencer du début.

*Deuxième chose : C'était trop court T^T j'en veux encore. A part le petit couac du dessus, tout m'a plu. Mais bon, çà reste un jeu et donc un avis personnel. Mais bon c'est gratuit...pourquoi ne pas lui donner une chance ;)

32147074.review:
不给力……真的不给力……
虽然游戏画面剧本跟音乐都不错，但是游戏体验确实十分糟糕的
虽然是类似密室逃生游戏的玩法，但是又做的太奇葩
同一个东西需要多次调查
游戏里信息提示让人很懵（例如音乐盒那里）
物品的使用方法更是奇怪，要进到物品栏里把他放在第一个再去调查相对应的东西才有用，而且在此之前并没有任何说明或提示这样的用法（最开始发现原来要这样用的时候是烤花瓣）
这个定义是解谜游戏，但是这个解谜是让玩家自己到处乱摸或是只能看攻略才能通关，而不是通过推理跟分析
总之虽然是个免费游戏，但是如果不是真的闲得慌的话建议别玩
——————————————
因为之前卡了没弹出成就于是又打了一遍，无法跳过的过场动画与十分出戏的配音即使是通过一遍的我都没法接受……

32070287.review:
should  you get this well the price of price is good it is free and I do recommend it for the interesting story however Really it depends on What type of games  you like  Price  is a point and click puzzle game With a unique mechanic  So outside the box and mathematical thinking is required    the puzzle elements of this point and click game are very   difficult  Hints are given but they are not your typical big fish game type hints   where it glows when your In  the area of a certain object  It does do that but  unlike your typical point and click puzzle game  just finding the  object will not help you solve the puzzle ,
 Their is an interesting hidden story hints of the story are given in the song . Finding out the story is key to solving the puzzle .    
  
  
if Your like me and hate math and are not a puzzle game fanatic .Then you will end up  watching the video which shows the solutions  to the puzzles .  two of which require you to count certain objects shown in the the game and come up with a math formula to input  mathematical codes to open certain drawers to progress in the story .  so you most likely will end up watching a lets play video or reading a walkthrough  which is what i did .   
  
hopefully that give you some idea as to  what your going to get  when you download  price  To decide if this game is right for you   So you will not be frustrated or disappointed when you play this game.   Price has good art 
A good story  As well  as  a   new type of   game mechanic  and    a uniqe  mental challenge .

32002907.review:
К сожалению, игра настолько коротка, что её практически невозможно описать без спойлеров. Поэтому скажу только, что это - короткая и довольно мрачная китайская адвентюра о любви и смерти. Бесплатная. Мне понравилась.

Странно, что игра китайская (и переведена на японский и английский), а все тексты на картинках - немецкие. Видимо, в этом подразумевается какой-то глубокий смысл.

Портит игру только довольно дурацкий неинтуитивный интерфейс использования предметов (используется только тот предмет, который выбран в меню предметов - при этом никак себя не проявляет, пока не наткнёшься на ситуацию, где он нужен).

Рекомендую к прохождению. Но она реально короткая. Я справился за два часа - а можно было и существенно быстрее.

31991563.review:
This game is beautiful, the art style is simply lovely. For a free game, it is quite impressive. The music is very nice but also eerie at the same time, it really works for the style of the game. 

I had some difficulties with the clues in the game however, as it is not always clear on what you are supposed to do some times. The English is quite broken at times as well but that's not a huge deal. I found the actual storyline to be a bit confusing but I could get it enough to appreciate it. Don't expect to be playing for a long time, it's only pretty short but it's free, so what is there to complain about?

31966790.review: I decided to try this game in order to see this surprise ending everyone was talking about. Some even said the ending is the best part of the game. Sadly that may be true, but since the ending is rather stupid don't waste your time on this game just to see it. The basic story could have been good, but felt undeveloped or perhaps just not thought through. Gameplay will leave you scratching your head, even with a walkthrough to tell you what to do. Some objects have to be searched or visited several times to get what you need, then you have to figure out what to do with it without clues directing you. Combining objects is guesswork at best, and feels totally random. Using items isn't easy and can sometimes take several tries to work. And I didn't find any actual horror in the game other than the setting being a bit creepy at first. I just can't understand how this game has overwhelmingly positive reviews unless lots of people gave it a positive just because it's free. I appreciate when devs give us free games, but not being honest doesn't help the devs learn or help improve their future games. This could have been an awesome game if it were developed more and clues were incorporated to help with what mixes with what/what to do next. I look forward to seeing what the devs come up with next.

31927773.review:
Game is only 1-2 hours, but that's okay because it's free.  Very atmospheric, and the story is sweet,  The visuals are nice and the "cutscenes" pretty strong.  I recommend playing it if you like puzzle/point click games and have an hour to get sad.

If you get stuck, try clicking on all of the interactable objects again.  You'll be able to examine everything at first, but many actions will be unavailable until after you solve a clue.  There are two levels.  After you pass the first you will be booted back to the main menu.  Just click start and select the next level.  The game did freeze once, so just be aware and save if you don't want to repeat puzzles.  All together, PRICE was fun and I'd like to see a full length game developed by these guys.

31768997.review:
这是一个主人公在妹妹与自己房间中，寻找自己的记忆与妹妹的真相的故事。

简短（1小时游戏内容）但是精致的解密与脱出游戏，分前后两章，第一章是妹妹的房间，第二章是哥哥（主人公）的房间，画风是哥特日漫的风格；UI设计低血腥但是合乎主题；人设不错，哥哥的英俊文弱，妹妹的坚强讨人怜，剧情与人物的设置虽说并不算超脱与新颖，但听这个故事的你，依旧会融入其中。可能你在第一章中就已经隐约意识到了真相，那将自己代入角色，你依旧会想要证明这不是真的，真实总让人望而生却不是吗？
最后这篇作品最让我惊艳的，是第一章BGM-妹妹清唱的《安魂曲》，剧情环境下的确让人紧张生异，但是闭上眼睛听，曲调如此舒缓，妹妹的音色那么空灵，你能体会到吗，脑海的安静与妹妹的爱怜，那么真挚，令人感叹。

31587720.review:
Price ist ein Puzzle/Point and Click Adventure in dem es um zwei Geschwister geht. Der ältere Bruder, Ivry, erwacht aus einem Alptraum im Zimmer seiner jüngeren Schwester Iva. Ohne Erinnerung wie er da hingekommen ist, versucht er aus dem Zimmer zu entkommen und seine Schwester zu finden. Im Verlauf findet er dabei verschiedene Hinweise und Gegenstände, die er kombinieren muss um das Rätsel zu lösen. Das Ende lässt auch ein paar Interpretaionsmöglichkeiten offen,
Das Spiel hat ein paar leichte Horror Elemente, aber die sind recht harmlos und es gibt auch keine wirklichen "Jumpscares".
Auch die Musik ist hevorragend und sehr passend für die Atmosphäre (vorallem das Intro Lied hat es mir angetan :3).
Hin und wieder hängt man vielleicht an einem Rätsel, da man alles sehr genau untersuchen muss, aber es ist durchaus schaffbar. Die Spielzeit beträgt ungefähr 1-2h. Davon abgesehen ist auch die Grafik sehr ansprechend und erinnert an Anime. Zudem sind mehrere Sätze/Dialoge (auf chinesisch) vertont.
Ich kann das Spiel nur weiterempfelen und wenn man bedenkt, dass es kostenlos ist, kann man ja auch nicht viel falsch machen.

Ich wünsche viel Vergnügen beim spielen!
LG Himikko

Price - Gra horror z słodką aczkolwiek podkreslającą nastrój grafiką.
wykonanie jak i grywalność mają sobie wiele do życzenia, ale to ze względu na problemy ze sterowaniem.

A teraz szybko o grze: (bez spoilerow)
Gra polega na rozwiązaniu tajemnicy - przyczyn i skutków -> dlaczego obudziliśmy się w pokoju siostry oraz gdzie ona zagineła.
podczas rozgrywki nasza postać odczówa siły nadprzyrodzone ( Paranormalne) które nękają go i utrudniają rozwikłanie zagadki.
sama gra dzieli się na 3 części bodajże. w których widać starzejące się otoczenie ,a gra z każdym krokiem fabularnym nabiera klimatu.
pomiędzy rozgrywkami można trafić na pewne cutscene'y które posiadają naprawdę ładną kreskę.
cieżko jest zrecenzować grę o gatunku horror bez podawania szczególnych spoilerów więc zakończę szybką oceną i opinią:
8.2/10 - lekkie zniżenie/zaniżenie wartości oceny ze względu na wkurzające sterowanie i problemy z doszukiwaniem sposobu rozwiązania dalszej historii.

31391705.review:
PRICE ist ein Point and Click Adventure, wo es um zwei Geschwister geht und ein Rätsel, welches den männlichen Protagonisten Ivry vor Problemen stellt. Hier werden Items, wie auch Hinweise (Clues) anders miteinander kombiniert, als es vielleicht aus manch anderen Spielen bekannt ist. Als kleiner Hinweis (ohne zu spoilern): Das zuletzt angeklickte Item ist jenes, welches Ivry ausgerüstet hat, damit kann er Dinge im Raum kombinieren, jedoch kann nichts, was sich innerhalb des Inventars miteinander befindet miteinander kombinieren.
Das ist insofern wichtig, da sich manche Leute aufgrund dieser Mechanik vielleicht zu lange mit etwas aufhalten und nicht weiter kommen.
Grafisch ist das Spiel aufgrund seiner Anime/Manga-Optik doch sehr ansprechend und wird noch einigen Jahren kaum schlecht dadurch gealtert sein. Die Musik ist sehr schön und gefühlvoll. Die meisten Texte sind vertont und das von unterschiedlichen Sprechern, jedoch in japanischer Sprache.
Für jene, die sich nicht anders behelfen können, gibt es im Zweifel genug Handbücher. Ich persönlich empfehle das Spiel für alle die gerne Point and Click Spiele spielen, etwas Rätsel haben wollen, jedoch ohne das es zu kopflastig wird. Es sollte nur darauf geachtet werden, dass die Mechanik verstanden wird (da unter anderem Gegenstände unter Gegenständen sein könnten, also ist sich Umsehen sehr wichtig).

Viel Spaß mit dem Spiel wünsche ich!
Liebe Grüße
Toffyfox

31369067.review:
想了想可能没有一点剧透成分不太好评价这款游戏，毕竟，解谜游戏讲的就是故事嘛！
  从操作上来说，道具要先点上再使用无可厚非，但是物品栏收起来先点开再使用给操作上造成了一定的复杂性，刚开始不知道要这样的我懵逼了很久。第二关那个放塔罗牌的相框也是，试起来十分繁琐。
  故事内容上制作组讲的比较隐晦，需要玩家通关之后自己细心去思考才能理解这个游戏讲了个什么故事从而得出自己的思考。
你是愿意停留在一周目结局的美好还是愿意进入二周目探究事件的真相？这么哲学的问题当玩家通关之后开始回想真是......不过，首先我得有个妹妹。做什么事情都要有代价的，妹妹也好，哥哥也好，只要最后不要偏离了自己的初心就好。人鱼公主的故事其实告诉我们的是不要跟那种老神棍级别的人物做什么乱七八糟的交易，按照自己的方式去对待事情才是最好的。
  游戏上有很多地方看出了制作组非常非常的用心。就如游戏名称PRICE一样，大家都知道是代价的意思。但是拆开来说又有一种的含义。
Piccolo短笛
Recorder直笛
Iva艾娃人偶
Clarinet单簧管
Englishhorn英国管
  背景音乐这五个声部，以及最后变成安魂曲这样的用心的BGM（话说开场音乐大赞！剪辑超棒），没有一些音乐知识的人可能就像我一样查资料才能了解到。
  然而不是所有人都是抱着设定集玩儿游戏的，有些细节也不能说是制作组太高深或者玩家不用心，只是如果没体会到，会有一些惋惜吧。

overal a good game to play if you just want to kill some time with a good story.

31247094.review:
Good story and stylization! Since it's for free, it's definitely worth your time. 

The cons, however, are that the puzzles can be exceedingly difficult without a guide, very much so in the first portion. I actually restarted the game a few times, uninstalled, reinstalled, trying to get a piece that was meant to be found in the hearth - hint: turns out there are multiple areas to select on the hearth at any point, not just one. Also, during the second portion of the game, I came across a bug which prevented me from loading and saving, as well as one before it which forced me to restart from the second half. Though, since the game in its entirety isn't too long, I finished it without really needing any saves.

IF you can get past all that, however, it's a truly enjoyable experience. The story is sad and sweet, just vague enough for speculation. I'm halfway convinced to wanting a sequel.

首先，支持国产作品！
这款游戏的BGM真的赞！
免费免费！
好了不扯了，这是一款微恐怖向解谜游戏，也就是说胆小的骚年们也是可以玩的，不必担心什么高能（滑稽）。剧情也很赞，price，意思是代价（不是价格！！不是价格！！不是价格！！重要的事情说三遍！！），一周目的时候还看不出什么，以为是HE（虽然有点突兀），但二周目的时候，PRICE才真正显现出来，也显示了兄控和妹控之间和伟大爱情（滑稽）。就是合成线索的时候，有些线索有点牵强，需要开脑洞。当然你要是一个个试的话当我没说。最后，作为一款免费国产游戏，这个游戏还是值得入手的。

31083850.review: Came in expecting something closer to a visual novel, but the point and click puzzle aspect was nice. There wasn't much direction once you got items or clues so you'll end up just trying to combine everything to make a solution. Controls aren't the worst but could have used a tweak or two. It's pretty short, so it doesn't drag on at all although it could have used a little more meat to make it more substantial. The art's nice, though the music loops a looot. For a free game and 8 pretty easy achievements, I'd recommend it. Only quip is that the achievements don't show up when they pop and after 1.5 hours of total play + idle there are no card drops despite having them listed on the store page.

30934393.review:
作为一个免费游戏，price拥有着很高的素质：包括游戏中的谜题，剧情，以及其中的线索和物品系统，这些都足以使这个游戏归为优秀的解谜游戏。而其中最为出彩的莫过于本作的音乐，空灵优雅有渲染力，乐曲风格与画风相当匹配，评主为了游戏op买了dlc了。
本作新手上路思维快的只用半个钟出头，可谓短小精悍。评主前段时间曾经在朋友那里玩过一周目，感动之余记忆颇深，这段时间偶然看到steam免费，用了将近一个小时再来了两遍（解谜游戏二三周目真不算解谜。游戏剧情主要只发生在一个场景中，却从这个场景映射出来许多角色的心理活动和回忆，这样的角色性格塑造也理所应当的指向了一个引人思考的结局。
个人认为，这个游戏映射出这样的问题：能带来美好的逃避真的是一无是处的吗？人们一定要用悲伤和痛苦为残忍而不公的现实买单吗？

30934230.review: Lo que deberían de ser muchos juegos: Corto, rejugable, intenso y que no se anda por las ramas a la hora de contar la historia. Puede llegar a tener finales distintos y expone retos interesantes. Una hora y media de aventura clásica Point & Click que en un par de escenas te pondrá los pelos de punta, así como su bamda sonora,

30931041.review: Very fun and creepy game. I'm glad it was more of a slow build-up of being scary than adding jumpscares. The art style is exellcent and beautiful as well as the soundtrack; although the constant singing sometimes overshadows the instrumental score so I wish I could've been able to turn it down. And also it is kind of easy to get stuck considering sometimes you have to do a certain action first and then go back to something you've already clicked on, even if you have all the parts. Overall I would defnitely play this again.

30910796.review:
[h1][b]Kurzfassung[/b][/h1]
PRICE ist ein kurzweiliges und unterhaltsames Puzzlegame das dem Prinzip eines Point & Click Spiels folgt. Es reiht sich in die Kategorie der Horrorspiele. Persönlich habe ich die Story mehr bedrückend, traurig und stellenweise auch etwas unheimlich aber nicht angsteinflößend empfunden. Die musikalische Untermalung ist sehr gut gewählt und passt zur Storyline. Wer sich 1-2 Stunden beschäftigen möchte ist hier gold richtig.

Das Spiel hat die Möglichkeit die Lautstärken anzupassen, den Spielstand zu speichern und man kann es sowohl im Vollbild- als auch im Fenstermodus spielen. Achievements sind alle an die Story angeknüpft und werden mit einmaligem durchspielen freigeschalten. Betreffend der Sammelkarten - diese können derzeit durch die Zusatzinhalte nicht erworben werden, sondern ausschließlich über Boosterpacks oder am Steam-Markt.

30903730.review: PRICE is in my opinion an interactive fiction that's definetly worth playing it. It takes just a few hours to complete. It categories itself under horror-games but don't expect any jump scares, it's more a horrific story. I have never played nor completed a game like that before, so I didn't expected anything and I got positevly suprised. It threw me back in times when I watched animes with an unforgetable storyline.

30672102.review:
잔혹성과 애절함이 절실하게 감미되어 있는 아름다운 게임이었습니다.

게임을 하는 내내 한 편의 잔혹동화를 보는 듯한 느낌이 들기도 하고 때로는 묵묵하게 사람의 감정을 울리는 그런 분위기를 개인적으로 잘 표현했다고 저는 생각합니다, 무료게임이라는 것이 믿기지가 않을 정도로 꽤 수작이라는 평을 받을 수 있을 정도의 스토리와 작화, 그리고 배경음악, 심지어는 중국어 더빙의 정도까지 너무나 잘 조화를 이루었던 것 같아요. 아, 그리고 2개의 파트로 분담하여 하나의 스토리를 전달한다는 것이 여러 시각에서 스토리를 전개한다는 부분으로 적용되어 꽤나 성공적이지 않았나라는 생각도 듭니다.

하지만 여기서 너무나도 아쉬운 점이라면 결과적으로 '조사를 하는 부분'에 있어서는 상당한 어려움이 존재했다고 합니다. 조사 위치가 약간만 달라도 나올 수 있는 이벤트가 다르기 때문에 세심하지 않으신 분들에게는 상당히 어렵게 적용될 수도 있는 부분이겠죠. 이 부분에 대해서는 조사 부분의 대한 수정이나 조사 방법의 개선으로 좀 더 편리화되었으면 좋겠다는 생각이 들었습니다.

이외에는 한글화가 아직은 되어있지 않다는 점도 들 수 있겠지만 개인적으로 게임을 하면서 그렇게 어렵게 다가오는 영어는 없었다고 생각합니다. 그리고 많은 분들이 아이템 사용방식에 대해서도 지적을 해 주셨는데 저는 개인적으로 나쁘지는 않았다고 생각합니다. 오히려 상황에 맞게 아이템을 사용하며 퍼즐 방식으로 풀어나가기를 좋아하시는 게임 유저분들이시라면 오히려 선호할 수도 있는 부분이 될 수 있겠네요.

개인적으로 전체적인 평을 내려보자면 저는 이 게임이 무료가 아니라 유료로 구매하여 플레이 했다고 하더라도 나쁘지 않은 평을 내릴 것 같습니다. 그만큼 게임의 완성도가 높고 한 편의 스토리를 잘 써내려간 것 같습니다.

30445077.review:
The game is nice, from an esthetic point of view. Artistic visuals, decent soundtrack, and you have to appreciate the intro as well. Not many indie developers would be willing to put in the extra time and effort to create a decent intro, so I appreciate that the creators of this game did that. It really makes a difference. 

The problem I have with this game is the gameplay itself, in Part 1 especially. The puzzles are too difficult to solve without using a guide, and that just shows a flawed game design. It looks like the developer just didn't put enough thought into how the clues were organized. Not only does the game not offer sufficient clues to point you in the right direction, but some of the clues are in fact completely misleading. For example, you find a code, which you would rationally think that you can use to open the only thing you found around that required a code. But no, in fact this code is for another thing, which you can only find after you open the first thing... Oh, and the code turns out to be only 3 characters, even though you have to enter it in a dialog box that accepts 4 characters. WTF. And by the way, to add to the confusion, when you do find the code, there's a hand flashing you 5 fingers in the window, leading a rational person to think that the code should be 6665. But no, it's not. 

Also, the Chinese voiceovers are a real setback for this game. Simply because they don't match with the characters, who  are obviously not even Asian (the story suggest Austria or Germany as the setting of the game). The text also suffers from a few grammatical errors. 

Anyway... Long story short: decent artwork, but just poorly designed gameplay.

Even though I think this is a beautiful game, a few things really need to be noted. 

Inventory: Items in the inventory only work when you have them selected in your drawer and happen to click on the correct item to interact with. This is frustrating because until you realize this, you can click around with no indication that you are actually attempting to use an item from your inventory.

Ending: The ending is quite abrupt. Even though it is a free game and thus expected to be short, it left me wishing for a bit more. 

That being said, I really enjoyed the game otherwise.

30372678.review:
Привет! Думаешь, стоит играть в PRICE или нет? Попробую ответить на этот вопрос, попутно рассказывая о чём тут вообще речь.
Это небольшая Point and Click игра, где все декорации и сами персонажи представлены в стиле аниме. В центре внимания находятся брат и сестра дворянских, как я поняла, кровей. Подобно тому, как мальчик из Limbo разыскивает своего близкого человека, тебе предоставится возможность найти сестру главного героя и узнать, что же произошло в их доме.
Всё показано в виде сказки на ночь. Так что у одной истории два конца: милый и мистически пугающий. Они и называеются соответственно: ECIRP и PRICE. 
Само прохождение займёт не более двух часов, так что терять особо нечего - игра-то бесплатная. Но жуть какая интересная!
Ну а если ты хочешь "срубить карточек", то тут явно не по адресу. Чтобы их получить, потребуется также приобрести официальный саундтрек к игре.

1.剧情做作，无聊= =
2.游戏性真差，两个相似的图里点来点去，玩类似密室逃脱的游戏，但很可惜的是解密层次做得并不好，像ROOM这种逐层展现线索来控制游戏流程的体验就别想了，这个游戏给我的感觉就是一股脑把大部分的线索直接放在第一层上，然后让玩家自己去捋清线索关系……

30223233.review:
我知道这是一款国人免费游戏。说实话国人的独立游戏我一般都会支持的但是……

这游戏的操作实在是反，人，类。
我进游戏差不多花了十分钟才彻底弄懂，然后退出时不知道如何调出菜单所以我以为这个游戏是即时存档。。。
于是，第二次进游戏我又重看了一遍开头动画。
然后，开头动画还不能跳过。
而且，某段动画在整个游戏过程中重复放了三次。是的，都不能跳过。

其次，解密。
解密和剧情比例失调，逻辑牵强生硬，特别是线索组合，基本靠猜，每张依次组合就好了。
线索提示方式奇特，比如八音盒那里，我第一反应居然是摩斯密码……
道具的工具栏查看顺序是反的，不是很懂为什么要这样设计。
同场景的谜题调查必须按剧情顺序才能触发。比如有个衣柜是输入密码的，但是在看到某段过场动画前它只会告诉你被锁上了。于是我非常智障地拿各种钥匙零件依次试了个遍。【额】

第三，剧情。
首先一点都不恐怖。说实话可能我脑洞能力不够，通关下来除了兄妹恋和某些黑暗交易其他什么都没看出来。
游戏的叙事方式凌乱，虽然开场动画确实很酷。
所以当我看到好评第一的剧情剖析实在是佩服得五体投地。。。

第四，CV。
出戏。

不过，这游戏画风很好，虽然是日漫风，但吃的人挺多。
当初在商店界面看到介绍视频和好评率我的期待值真的很高。但游玩下来。。。很抱歉，长期玩解密游戏的我实在无法给予好评。
也希望作者多看看差评，有批评才有进步。因为大家对国人游戏包容度很高，容易过誉。

最后，向大家推荐一下惊悚猎奇向解密游戏[url=www.cubeescape.com]《Cube Escape》 [/url]系列。
且支持安卓和IOS。同样是免费游戏，画风简易但代入感强，开脑洞的同时逻辑连贯。

30205274.review:
One effective way to grasp the player’s interest right off the bat is having an amazing opening to introduce the game's cast and story. That is what exactly what P.R.I.C.E has done.  

The intro was amazing, beyond that a free game could afford to have included. It had a whole orchestra of effects (blood splatters, flowers and other materials) that flow through a rope of transitions, with many symbolic scenes and notes appearing ever so often. You’re introduced with lines, the cast of characters, and the music made the video all the more amazing. It goes from soft whispering, to the climax of crying where the animations would become heavy and intense. Both elements synced to create a masterpiece.

Now getting into the game play, the controls are simple: attempt to find anything that is click-able. It is a Point’N click game after all. Much of the click boxes I found were of decent size, meaning none were so large that I could click on a surface outside of the target object to select, but also not too small so I am unable to select the target area. The cursor also changes to a paw whenever you could interact with something in the game. The objects are pretty scattered however, so you may want to search every point of the room, beyond what needed to be found. 

The art and fashion is likely based off of the Victorian era (?). Judging by the character costumes as well as the style of furnishings. It’s relatively clean, not too messy or clustered with tones or shading. The latter is what best describes the setting we are in though, due to the lack of light. This aids in creating an eerie environment as well.

As for the story itself, it was certainly as grim as how the setting was, and what we’re introduced with from the opening. I had an itching feeling that the story itself was shrouded in mystery. Our character started off in the dark for a reason. This created a nice build to a rather shocking ending. (No spoilers here.)

There are also cut scenes, but the English version does not include this feature unfortunately. The translation was decent, though with a few grammar errors here and there.

Overall, my experience playing this game was certainly one I enjoyed. I don’t even know if I’ll ever be able to find another free game similar to this one. I would definitely recommend trying this game!

30183298.review:
首先你问我推不推荐这个游戏，我的回答一定是不。（虽然我把这个游戏推荐给过我的朋友），但是我个人认为，这个游戏实在是显得有些弱，出色的地方确实有很多，但是游戏这个东西，个人觉得并不能瑕不掩瑜。有缺点往往都是致命的。）

对于这个游戏我能给出的分数是4.3/10分（因为不收费的原因，给的可能还有点高，因为比起其他的我玩过的类似的作品虽然是rpgmaker做的，但是这个游戏显得还是有些太弱）。
但是！作为一个免费游戏还是有很多值得称赞的地方。（并不能改变我的看法）
例如：出色的音乐（如果你在探索的时候卡关，一直听这个音乐绝对会是一种无与伦比的享受）
出色的演出（演出真的是没得说，无论是人物的走动还是探索时带给人的美感）
PV也十分的丰富（能看到很多动画，但是真的是太多了，虽然没什么不好，但是为什么不多多用心增强这个游戏的可玩性呢？）
人物的立绘（每一画都是一种美感）

以下是缺点和个人人为的不足
游戏性实在是太差了，但是这是个免费，嗯。（只能这么安慰自己）游戏主要是分为两周目进行展开的，一周目开篇为引，二周目进行游戏内容的回收。
但是我觉得如果做成用RPGMAKER做的话可能效果会更好（但是这个制作组叫夜兔AVG，注定了形式只能做AVG？)
关键性内容给的提示不足（解谜性体现出来了，呵呵。）
两张卷轴式的地图，随意的点（跑）吧。总能找到的。（忍不下去了，去看攻略吧）

以下批判内容涉及剧透（不过这么短的故事，也没什么可透的）

就是一个兄妹恋的故事。（个人觉得并不出色，反而觉得无聊，简短的故事并不能给人带来什么精神上的特别感受，反而显得十分的做作，而且令人觉得有点不是很自在。）

30167705.review:
쯔꾸르 공포게임에서 즐겨 사용되는 고스로리풍 의상과 배경들이 적절한 횡스크롤 형식을 통해 만들어져 시각적인 즐거움이 배로 증가한 게임! 중간중간에 나오는 애니메이션도 아름답고 훌륭합니다. 스토리 또한나름대로의 개연성과 자그마한 반전들을 통해 재밌게 잘 짜여져있는 편. 무엇보다 깔끔하게 끝나는 편이라 만족스러웠습니다.

가장 큰 장점은 수려한 그림체. 갑툭튀같은 요소가 하나도 없는건 아니지만 밤에 혼자잘때 생각날만큼 기괴하거나 무서운 부분이 없어 공포나 호러게임에 매력을 느끼기는 하나 직접 플레이하면 그날밤 잠을 설치곤 한다 하시는 분들도 부담없이 즐길 수 있는 게임이라 생각합니다.

단점은 오브젝트 클릭이 생각보다 어렵다는 점. 정확히 말하자면 조사할 수 있는 오브젝트들이 다닥다닥 붙어있는 경우에 하나의 오브젝트만 조사하고 다른 하나를 조사하지 못한채 넘어가기가 쉽다는 겁니다. 오브젝트를 찾는데만 실제 플레이타임의 절반을 사용한 같네요.  덧붙여서 퍼즐과 그 퍼즐의 해답 사이의 연결고리가 부족해  너무 없어서 하나하나 노가다로 클릭하고 다시 조사하는 식인경우가 꽤 많았습니다. 플레이 하는 내내 이러한 부분이 너무 답답했습니다.

횡스크롤+짧지만 조금의 반전이 있는 스토리+고스로리풍 그림체가 취향인 분들이라면 꼭 해보시길 추천! 다만 오브젝트 조사를 꼼꼼히 해야한다는 것과 스토리를 진행한 뒤 같은곳을 다시 조사하면 다른 반응이 나타나기도 한다는 것을 미리 알고 하면 저처럼 조사부분에 낭비하는 시간을 줄이실 수 있습니다.
