30151785.review:
Surprisingly creepy - I originally got it because it was free and the artwork seemed nice, although the plot didn't seem to promise much. But it's quite dark without revealing where it's headed too early. The artwork, too, matches the situation, occasionally lightening the mood with chibis before abruptly diving deep again - always the dolls. The dolls are really the main fright, along with the third person I can't give away without spoilers.
A small minus for the music, which gets a little annoying after a while, especially when you're trying to concentrate; the game allows you to turn it off, though. And the actual item inventory is explained a bit too curtly, at least I had to look it up in the forum to use it right.
The idea to separate item inventory and evidence inventory is really nice, though, and makes a change from the general notebook of Point'n'Click. The riddles are good, too, especially in the first part of the game (with me getting stuck one time because I didn't expect a password to actually be numbers).
The ending is plain mean. And gorgeously cynical.

魔性的背景女声吟唱，很快就让人感觉不舒服。

最后，支持国产，支持制作组。

30052569.review:
游戏通关了，习惯性来写评测。

先说说感觉可以稍稍改进的几点：
第一，在游戏过程中的动画播放和进行演出时，可以设置背景音乐关闭，不然会觉得有些吵，有些地方[spoiler]比如一周目敲窗户看镜子什么的[/spoiler]不能很好的代入。
第二，游戏中有一个小小的bug，在二周目调查床头桌子的时候，男主手里的蜡烛会消失。
第三，感觉魔术师和黑猫的关系并没有叙述的很清晰，不过故事主线仍旧很明确，将这两个人（猫）物当做npc，不做深究的话也是可以说的通的。

然后就是夸奖时间啦~
游戏的美术做的相当的到位，各种演出、游戏过程中的动画、人物塑造都相当的精美，开始界面的设置旁边的人体透视大提琴和读档画面的弹琴指骨也颇具美感。
正式进入游戏之后从始至终只有一首曲子，开始的时候感觉有些单调，但是并不会厌烦。不过感觉设置背景音乐的时候，考虑到演出会有更好的体验。
op、ed做的都是相当出色，个人十分喜欢op的风格啊~

整体游戏流程算是比较短的，成就方面也不需要太过留意，顺着游戏发展也就可以都收集齐了，没有什么隐藏要素，不过最后作者用成就来调侃了一下自己也算是个小小的彩蛋。[spoiler]顺便作者你还知道我们想寄刀片啊！[/spoiler]

感觉如果做成一个更大型一些的游戏也会十分好玩，期待下一作。

29864718.review:
[h1]PRICE[/h1]

Hier erwartet euch ein kleines Point&Click Puzzle-Rätsel im Manga-Style, mit einer spannenden und teils "gruseligen" Geschichte.
Du bist [i]Ivry[/i] und erwachst gerade aus oder in einem Albtraum im Zimmer deiner Schwester.
Ohne Erinnerungen und eingeschlossen, machst du dich auf die Suche nach [i]Iva[/i] und löst das Rätsel um deine Vergangenheit.
Mit ca. 2 Std. Spielzeit, ist [b]PRICE[/b] genau richtig, um sich mal eine kleine Auszeit vom Alltag zu gönnen.

• Manga style, mal wirr und psychedelisch, mal niedlich und Detailreich.
• Ein schöner Soundtrack, der sich im fortlaufenden Spiel immer mehr aufbaut und komplettiert. [spoiler]Das komplette Arrangement ist so erst am Ende des Spiels zu hören.[/spoiler]
• 8 Achievements, die in [i]einem[/i][b]*[/b] Spieldurchlauf einfach zu erhalten sind.
• Steam Sammelkarten werden optional mit dem Kauf der DLC´s freigeschaltet.

[b]*[/b]
[spoiler]Man wird nach jedem Chapter wieder ins Hauptmenü geworfen und muss einfach wieder auf Play drücken, um das nächste Chapter zu starten![/spoiler]

29813864.review:
Jogo incrivel, merece continuação. Eu baxei esse jogo esperando nada demais dele, joguei sem nenhuma expectativa, mas com o passar do jogo eu me envolvi com o mestrério por trás dos acontecimentos, e a expectativa foi so aumentando. É um jogo surpreendente, vale muito a pena jogar, recomendo.

This short game messed me up, man.

This is similar to a hidden object game, so if you play a lot of those (I do), then you will "get" this game fairly quickly. If you don't, then it may be trickier to get the hang of it.

As you uncover the story, it becomes more morbid and sadder until finally, at the very end, you just want to stare at the wall dejectedly. That said, it's a great story.

The art is pretty decent. It definitely has an anime vibe to it. The music is pretty, but it started getting on my nerves after a while. I think the first room should have been the instrumental part and the vocals should not have been added until the second room. That would have given it less time to play, thus making it less annoying.

Also, there are a few grammatical errors that come from translating this game from Mandarin to English. However, it's still understandable.

Overall, I recommend this game, especially since it's free. It's worth the couple hours of gameplay. PRICE is a fairly simple point and click mystery game that, despite its length, manages to build up an amazing atmosphere with its artwork, fantastic music, and plot. The storyline consists of two parts: E.C.I.R.P and P.R.I.C.E, each revealing something deeper, and it's executed fantastically. 

The game is definitely one worth checking out. PRICE went above and beyond my expectations. The soundtrack really was fantastic. The perfect amount of beauty and scary pulled together. I highly reccommend giving it a go. It's free, so what are you waiting for?

至于DLC，我两个都买了，个人认为音乐的那个DLC更值得买，设定集的那个还是有点不尽如人意。音乐那个，我最喜欢PRICE那首了，可惜没有一个MV，不然效果会更好，更有代入感。还有requiem那首歌，真的好像在教堂听一样，很喜欢这种风格，神圣又带点悲悯（不知道到底是不是这个感情，个人听后感）

总之，还是一个挺赞的游戏。

PRICE is a fairly simple point and click mystery game that, despite its length, manages to build up an amazing atmosphere with its artwork, fantastic music, and plot. The storyline consists of two parts: E.C.I.R.P and P.R.I.C.E, each revealing something deeper, and it's executed fantastically. 

The game is definitely one worth checking out. PRICE went above and beyond my expectations. The soundtrack really was fantastic. The perfect amount of beauty and scary pulled together. I highly reccommend giving it a go. It's free, so what are you waiting for?

29734051.review:
[h1]这是一个解密向的小游戏，其中恐怖元素只是起烘托的作用。[/h1]
解密方式是以，[u]线索[/u]和[u]道具[/u]两条线同时进行。
线索可辅助玩家理解剧情，同时推动道具的使用和收集。
游戏存在二周目，全成就可在二周目后达成。
只有完成两个周目，玩家才将游戏所叙述的故事理解。
流程极短适合在无聊时打发时间玩[strike]顶多打发俩小时[/strike]
[h1]优点[/h1]
[list]
[*]精美的图像
[*]难度适中的解密
[*]优秀的故事叙述
[*]CV声音好听，配音相对自然，只有一两句略显生硬
[/list]
[h1]缺点[/h1]
[list]
[*]流程过短
[*]动画无法跳过
[*]游戏过程中无法截图，只有在播放动画时方可截图
[*]存在些许BUG，虽然并不影响游戏
[/list]
[h1]后记[/h1]
游戏本身是适合一玩的，但它并不适合收费，还是因为流程过短的原因，游戏体验不到两小时。
俩DLC分别是原声和设定集，如果想要支持游戏可以买DLC。

What to say about this game?
Well, the game is a pretty nice puzzle game, not the best, but actually nice. It isn't much hard, but the puzzles aren't the only focus of the game, as it have a history, and that's said, the history isnt that good.
Why? Well because it's just a small history. What happens could chain a big history, but it just doesn't, at the same time it's puzzles begin to be more obvious. It evens try to do a "jumpscare", but can't really scary you, cause the "jumpscare" was so forced that it use a thing that doens't even apear in the history of the game.
And why i do still recommend it? Well, first because it's free, so even bad games could be a nice experience, but second, even with a "bad history", when you play you want to know a little bit of what happened.

29708325.review:
P.R.I.C.E is an incredible game where the visuals, sounds/music and story keeps you on edge. As you progress in the story, you discover the terrifying truths with every new clues and items sending chills down your spine (at least it did to me).Adding to this are the sounds and music which doesn't calm you down at all. But watch out, you have to listen extra-carefully and I do mean extra-carefully if you want to avoid clicking evrything on the screen for several hours (it happened to me on the first part). All in all, P.R.I.C.E is an excellent psychologic horror game, definitely worth a try, and I would consider it as a gem.
I wish for more games like this one from YETU GAME.

29634479.review:
This is a very good game, which I heartily recommend, and yet I can see why it's being given away for free.  The actual gameplay is driven with a very simple point-and-click adventuring engine, with a somewhat clumsy inventory system, though it's adequate for the purpose.  The real shining star here is story, the nature of which is such that any spoilers would detract terribly, so I won't discuss it.  The game is also quite short, and, like most single-path story-driven adventures, has no replayability at all.  Despite the intensity of the story, it would be hard to justify much of a price tag.

All that being said, [b]play it![/b]  It asks only about an hour of your time, and is so very, very worth it.

29598407.review:
It's a nice little game with beautiful artwork an interesting story.
Not to mention cool opening.

Though the repetitive in game music and translation errors can be quite annoying, as well as 'equipping' things from the inventory was confusing and took a while to figure out how to use it.
You use it by choosing the inventory item, then clicking off the inventory and then choose on an item or object in the room for the item to maybe work. 

Some of the cutscenes aren't that obvious to let you know what you're supposed to do next, so a I took a few trips down to the walkthrough page.

Though some may argue the cons outweigh the pros of the game...
It's free and you'll only spend an hour maybe two from your life, so why not when you have nothing better to do with your life.
Give it a go.

29363714.review:
《PRICE》是一款相当棒的游戏，精美的画面搭配空灵的BGM可以看出制作组花了不少心思，加之作为一款短篇FREEGAME还配上了OP和ED简直良心！画面和音乐都打满分。
游戏采用收集/使用道具、合成线索的方式进行，且没有分支，解不开的题完全可以用排除法[spoiler]这对于我来说还挺友好的[/spoiler]，部分线索和线索之间的联系有点生硬[spoiler]这时排除法就派上用场啦XD[/spoiler]，导致玩到最后也只了解到大致的剧情。
不足之处有两点，一是开始游戏看完OP后会有操作提示，不要手快快点过去，因为它只显示一次并且OP不能跳过。二是游戏中调出STEAM界面会卡住，算是BUG吧。
总之，冲这画面和音乐，《PRICE》十分值得一玩XD

29318625.review:
Highly recommend.

Firstly, the art style is gorgeous, you can only see these types of things in Visual Novel games, and I'm delighted to see them in a puzzle game. Secondly, the story is pretty engaging! It reminds me of some classic short stories from Vocaloid songs from my High School days. Lastly, the game is FREE. I honestly wish it wasn't and I would gladly throw money at these developers.

Some cons is when the music overlap unharmoniously, like the ceasless doll singing. I'm not sure if it was a bug or not, but it clashed horribly with the protagonists' narration and the other music instruments. The voice recording could also use a bit more polish and I wish it was longer, but this game is free so the cons are dismissable. 

tldr; Good story, great art, wish I could buy this instead of getting it for free.

29261656.review:
This short game messed me up, man.

This is similar to a hidden object game, so if you play a lot of those (I do), then you will "get" this game fairly quickly. If you don't, then it may be trickier to get the hang of it.

As you uncover the story, it becomes more morbid and sadder until finally, at the very end, you just want to stare at the wall dejectedly. That said, it's a great story.

The art is pretty decent. It definitely has an anime vibe to it. The music is pretty, but it started getting on my nerves after a while. I think the first room should have been the instrumental part and the vocals should not have been added until the second room. That would have given it less time to play, thus making it less annoying.

Also, there are a few grammatical errors that come from translating this game from Mandarin to English. However, it's still understandable.

Overall, I recommend this game, especially since it's free. It's worth the couple hours of gameplay.

发现这款作品是在探索列表的时候。第一眼就被封面的画风所吸引，以至于看了视频介绍后，立刻就下了游戏。
今儿有空说好久没玩解密游戏了，便点开了这款作品。
之后就被惊艳了，作为一款免费游戏。这个开场画面，这个人物设定，这整个游戏的画风，这BGM。我的天，真的很惊艳。质量真的很高。虽然中间稍微卡关了会。【因为不知道有线索合成这玩意Orz我的天，真的是卡关到崩溃。所以还是被逼无奈，小看了下攻略HHHH】游戏内容不多，顺利不卡关的话，很快就能通关。具体内容就不剧透了。
作为一款免费的恐怖解密游戏。真的可以说，是一部各方面都非常惊艳的作品。值得你抽一个小时左右的时间去体验一下。
————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

29140976.review:
Когда устанавливала игру, даже и не предполагала, что буду писать по ней негативный отзыв - настолько интересной она казалась. Начало было вполне хорошим: красочный опеннинг, многообещающие кадры, достаточно легкая лексика (немного переживала, что мой уровень английского помешает пониманию сюжета) и не особенно сложные головоломки. Из-за особенностей рисовки было особенно приятно смотреть катсцены. Так что же тогда, собственно, не так? Персонажи и сюжет плохо раскрыты, многое остается непонятным, а какие-то вещи/информация кажутся попросту лишними. PRICE больше похожа на  демо-версию игры, после нее осталось ощущение незаконченности, словно бы разработчики выложили только начало и конец, оставив все основное за кадром. 
Карточки здесь не выпадают, к сожалению, но купить их, я думаю, стоит. Значки, смайлики и фоны выглядят неплохо, пожалуй, единственный ощутимый плюс игры.

The game is beautiful, and the story is interesting, but comes with some drawbacks:

Normally, a game this short would get a negative review. If it were any less well-written and done, it wouldn't have been enough to want more. But it was, and it is. I wish there was more.

Also, the music. <3

There's two things that did bother me, but I'm probably just crazy:
1. The voice audio didn't quite match the music and sound effects audio. It was like it was part of something different and added in....
2. The mish-mash of languages. The audio was Chinese(?), the subtitles and in-between scenes written in English, the music varied but noticably some Latin, and the writing during the scenes switched between English and German.

28977734.review:
This game is okay but even with the cutscenes in it isn't always obvious what you're supposed to do.
The graphics are good.
The music got annoying within a minute for me, thankfully you can turn it down.  Except it randomly turned back up a couple times, like when I went from fullscreen to windowed (because I after clicking every item like 6 times I went to look for a walkthrough) or when I started the second chapter.

The first time I tried to play it the game crashed completely upon trying to open the door and I didn't know how to save (push esc durrr) so I had to redo the first room.

You watch the same cutscene from the beginning (walking down a hall and hallucination butterflies) like 4x

The broken english and continuity errors really killed it for me.
For example you wake up and say "why am I in my sister's room?" (paraphrasing) but then later you find a weird puppet ("What I thought was something weird is just a puppet" - actual quote, no the puppet it still weird, but I digress) and you say "When did I start to have this in my room?" .......it's not your room?? huh

Some quotes
[list]
[*]All I have to do is leaving this room right?
[*]How careless am I to have swept off a petal
[*]Why have my bed turned into this
[/list]

Also things like *sigh* and *huffing and puffing* are written in the same manner as the spoken/thought? text, with nothing to denote them as being emotes rather than part of the sentence.  Maybe that's nitpicky but it threw me when reading it.

I didn't find it scary at all but maybe it's meant for a younger audience.  Maybe the language barrier just made immersion in the game too difficult.  Maybe the fact that there wasn't a lot of sound other than the annoying music.  I don't know, but it just didn't do it for me.

28969100.review:
This game has the most confusing plot I've ever seen.  I had to look up an explanation after beating it (check the forums) to understand what happened.  I had literally NO idea what the story was about.  Apparently there are missing cutscenes in the English version, although I have the feeling those still wouldn't have helped much.  Even after the explanation, I have trouble seeing how it fit in with what I played.  It doesn't help that the brother and sister look near identical, and have very similar names (Ivry and Iva).

There are a few bugs.  The game won't run at my native resolution, it doesn't always select what you click (that only happened a few times), Steam Overlay caused crashes, and the volume settings were reset to 100% every time you started the game or loaded a save.

Overall I give it 2.5/5 stars, mostly because of the confusing plot.  If it wasn't free, I wouldn't recommend it.  You also don't actually get trading cards from this game, so don't play it for that.

佳作。

解谜AVG，全程鼠标操作，解谜有一定难度，但并未跳脱出这一类游戏平均水准。

音乐与声优的演出非常棒，契合氛围但又不至于喧宾夺主，配合上唯美的立绘和精致的场景，非常符合这种略带恐怖和诡异的暗黑系哥特风格

28854124.review:
A poorly made "click on every object in the room until you buble your way to the solution" simulator, thinking and puzzle-solving skills optional, made unnecessarily obtuse by poor translation.

Point-and-clicks are notorious for being either mind numbingly obtuse, or intelligence-insultingly easy, this one is the latter. Few games in the genre have found a happy medium between trying to figure out what hallucinogens the designers were on, and baby's first point-and-click. In this game you can just click on everything and combine every item to stumble your way to the solution without any idea what you're doing.

The art style is alright but the animation is terribly choppy. When the character isn't fading into position the walking animation looks rough and just weird. Meanwhile there's this female voice singing which gets grating fast. It was so annoying I turned the music off, which didn't persist after saving and reloading. The silence suited the mood much better and I cannot fathom why anyone choose to add the music in a moody horror game.

The intro sequence looked promising at first, but about ten seconds in it started looking like an anime intro. That and the 3spooky5me imagery was too much for me to bear, so I left to brush my teeth.

I stopped at what I estimate to be 75% of the way before getting out of the first room because I felt no motivation to continue. The "spooky" atmosphere building sequences were pathetic. Oh no, a hand in the window with absolutely no context, how horrifying. The text is very Engrish-y, so I doubt there will be much in the way of coherent plot. Maybe it gets better later, but I cannot understand why this is getting so much praise.

28760024.review:
Великолепная и по сюжету, и по графике игра, хоть и невероятно короткая.
Графика выполнена в стиле некоторых клипов, не побоюсь этого слова, вокалоидов, с примесью викторианского аристократизма и легкой вуали некоторой нуарности или хоррора.
Что касается геймплея, то скажу честно, по началу можно слегка призадуматься над управлнием, а точнее, над взаимодействием между предметами. Так что, если будет позволительно, сразу же предупреждаю: выбираете предмет, сворачиваете инвентарь со спокойной душой, после чего нажимаете на предмет, к которому, как вам кажется, это необходимо применить. Никаких перетаскиваний или вроде того.
Сама же игра рассказывает о весьма трагичной жизни брата и сестры, что с каждой минутой игры становится все более загадочной и в итоге может даже довести до слез чрезмерно впечатлительных особ...
Внимательность в этой игре - самое важное. Пожалуй, сами загадки вполне логичны, так что решить их не особо сложно, не считая того, что некоторые места и предметы начиают работать лишь со временем.

Предупреждение: ВЫКРУТИТЕ МУЗЫКУ НА МИНИМУМ, ОНА ОЧЕНЬ ГРОМКАЯ, но красивая, так что полностью выключать не советую.

П.с.- любителям игр, вроде Ib, должна понравится.

28648650.review: PRICE is a short puzzle game that drags you in from the start. You can't help but come up with your own theories about the story as it is slowly unveiled through each clue and item found. The ending, which is a perfect example of the writing principle of "show, don't tell", doesn't disappoint; and rather than relying on jumpscares and the like, the horror element is built through creepy ambience and the mysterious story. The lovely art and swift animations add even more to an already excellent game, and though the English translation presents a few grammar issues at times, it's nothing that may disrupt your experience. Definitely recommend it.

形似潘多拉之心，以恐怖渲染背景，以兄妹之爱为主题，同一场景两个世界观组合起来的的短片故事。
说白了，就是兄长身染重病，无法治愈，妹妹为了救兄长，愿以放弃生命灵魂永坠阎罗为代价，直到兄长觉察，才能解脱。
构思是不错的，主旨配乐配音还是可以的。
但是，操作系统非常的糟糕。游戏说明也是很马虎。例如怎么装备物品并使用，说明帮助并没有这点。说明帮助也只是在开头出现，游戏途中你到是找不到的，不能随时调出，然后片头不能强行跳过很尴尬。就是说你不读档的话，那么你每开一次游戏就要听一遍片头。
毕竟免费作品，毕竟14年老物，毕竟国产，立意也不错了。
另外徽章也就是卡牌好像是没有的！这是哪方面的BUG，游戏本身还是steam官方? 并不是很懂。

28552404.review:
Not bad at all, especially for a free point-and-click horror game. PRICE is a little over two hours worth of gameplay, perhaps an hour if you use the guide, and an easy way to get a full set of achievements if you play the game all the way through.

The game takes place in a macabre Victorian setting, perhaps somewhere in Germany. Spooky atmosphere is what this game does well, but it's unfortunate that the errors in English translation sometimes break the immersion.

Nevertheless, PRICE is still worth at least a few hours of your time.

28415266.review:
Eu salvei esse jogo ou esse jogo me salvou? 
PRICE é um puzzle muito rápido de concluir se o jogador assistir aos walkthrough, mas isso tiraria TODA a graça do game. 
É um visual novel/adventure com um design tão lindo puxado mais ou menos para aquele estilo pastel gothic. 
Os puzzle são fáceis de solucionar mas é preciso quebrar um pouquinho a cabeça, entretanto não é nada que torne o jogo estressante, é só manjar das combinações e de clicar em todos os lugares possíveis e plá.
A trilha sonora é MARAVILHOSA! É tudo maravilhoso nesse jogo, inclusive o menu de config. 
O enredo é sensacional mesmo que o plot twist em si não chegue a ser uau (fazer o que, né nom?), só que nem isso tira a perfeição desse game. Principalmente se for levado em consideração que ele é free. 
Fala sério! Uma belezura dessas de graça? Que sorte, porra! 
Jogar esse game é mergulhar em segredos e descobertas tão profundas que quando o jogo acaba fica aquele sentimento de "é isso? acabou? e agora?". 
Acabou, e agora? Please remember, I can't escape... I love you. 
10/10 ♡

28323357.review:
While searching through the list of free games on Steam, I ran into this rather interesting little came. Since it was free, I decided to try it out and was not disappointed in what I found. P.R.I.C.E. is a pretty amazing little game that when I first opened it, I thought it should have been a paid game. There was an amazing opening that drew you in and the art was very well done. 

The story is really very simple but because of this and how short the game is, I may dive into a little bit into spoilers. A poor musician dies leaving his two children as orphans. The two love each other very much and want to stay together. You play as the older brother, Ivry, who wakes up in the middle of the night in his sister’s room with no memory of anything before. The only thought he has is to find his sister Iva. It’s only through the game that you figure out what all was going on, and I do have to warn you that it is a very sad and messed up story. I do have to say that the game feels way to short, leaving me wanting so much more. I hope they do sort of follow on the strange story they left at the end of this as it would be rather fun little series.

The game play is… well its really simple. The problem I had was that they don’t explain it to well in the ‘tutorial’ mode, I ended up having to open the game once again, go through the opening cut scene (which I found you can’t skip, or if you can, I couldn’t find it) and read the tutorial again. I even took a screenshot and had to keep it open while I was first learning them. It’s sad because the controls are so simple; it was just that I couldn’t really do what I was trying to do. The point of the game is finding clues and items to help you through your play through. What made me confused was that you can combined the clues to make more clues, but you can’t combine objects. The objects will only combine when certain things come into place to be used. Ya, I know that sounded confusing but so was the game play there. I had to look up the tutorial twice for the areas, both times were things that I had the right thought for, but was doing something wrong so be prepared to be stumped at times. After getting the controls down, I didn’t really have much of a problem.

The artwork, much like I said before, is very beautiful. The designs are anime based and the dark atmosphere kept it with a rather creepy feeling which fit well with the story. Although your character can only see what is within the candlelight, the whole room is exposed so you don’t miss anything. I did have some trouble at times trying to figure out what I could and could not touch in the rooms though even with the small paw cursor to help me. The stuff just blended so well with the background (yes, I know it’s drawn onto a single background). On the other hand, I give the creators amazing props for making the character able to move freely. His movements were fluid and he had different poses for weather he was kneeling down or reaching to a high shelf.

The music is very beautiful, but they seemed to have a hard time keeping the levels right. When I went in, I changed the volume of the music and the voices; it didn’t stay the volume I set it. The cut scenes were really loud and I had to actually go into my volume settings of my computer to turn it down. The music has a good haunting feeling to it and was perfect for the mood along with the voice acting from what I could tell. The Voice acting was in Japanese so I don’t know if I truly got the full feeling of it but I could tell feeling was being put in.

The story is amazing, the music is beautiful, the voice acting is rather nice, and the game play is pretty well designed though slightly confusing at first. For a free game, I was pretty blown away by how well it was designed and translated to English. I say you definitely should check it out if you haven’t already.

28223395.review:
[h1]PRICE	[/h1] es una mezcla de juego de puzzles con novela visual, en la que encarnamos las desesperanzas de Ivry, y lo ayudaremos a descubrir los misterios tras su misteriosa amnesia y porque está encerrado en la habitación de su hermana Iva.
Estamos ante un juego gratuito muy bien logrado, con una historia sòlida, así como personajes entrañables. Màs que de horror, diría que es un juego de suspenso, 
La trama se desarrolla en 2 partes, aunque en el mismo escenario, cada una nos muestra elementos diferentes en forma de puzzles y enigmas por descubrir.
El juego en si no es muy complejo, funciona cual HOG, buscar pistas e items con los que se pueden resolver  y acceder a los distintos puzzles que encontraremos en la habitación en la que estamos prisioneros. A base de ensayo y error, iremos avanzando a lo largo de esta aventura.

[b]PROS[/b]
-La música es genial, realmente vale la pena escuchar el ost.
-Gran historia, ambientación y desarrollo de personajes.
-El arte es gran calidad.
-El sistema de puzzles está bien, no es ni complicado ni demasiado simple.
-Genialmente es gratuito, así que todos lo pueden disfrutar.

[b]CONTRAS[/b]
-En general es un juego muy corto, sin replay value alguno.
-Completamente lineal.
-Igualmente, algo predecible la historia, pero eso no la demerita en absoluto.

En general, un muy buen juego, recomendado para los que les gusta el género, igual es muy sencillo de completar, todos los logros salen completando el juego 1 sola vez.

28188149.review:
PRICE is a free puzzle game in two parts. E.C.I.R.P being the first and finally P.R.I.C.E being the conclusion. They're each set in a room, filled with objects to discover, combine, boxes to open, and clues to combine to figure out the story, which I won't spoil, because I think it was pretty good.

You play as Ivry, in what I'm guessing is supposed to be set in Austria, given the many classical music references as well as German flavor text ingame. He's looking for his sister Iva. They're very close. Perhaps Lannister close. The game plays like your typical point-and-click, so if you've ever played those in the past, you'll fit right at home here.

Despite it being free, it had some pretty high quality stuff going here. The music was hauntingly beautiful and fit the mood perfectly, the graphics are very good, with the manga style going, and it even has Chinese voiceovers, and that you don't get to hear everyday. I'm not a native, so I don't know if the voice acting was good or not, but it sounded alright. 

It's also really short. Like a couple of hours tops, assuming you don't get stuck anywhere.

Recommend this in a heartbeat.

C'est une très bonne puzzle dans une histoire assez sombre que je recommande chaudement de jouer, et il y a pas d'ennemie dans le jeu vous pouvez vous rassurer.

Le jeu est gratuit pour tous.

Point positive :
- Les décords et les personnages sont bien travailler ainsi que l'ambiance des couleurs.
- L'histoire est assez classique (je dois avouer) mais on comprend certains des parties.
- Combinez les objets et les associers dans des souvenirs sont des bons systèmes :)
- La musique de l'ambiance est très bien encrée dans l'histoire.

Point négative :
- Les voix d'acteurs (j'aime bien mais il y a un négative dans le jeu d'acteur.) On entend bien le son du micro qui vibre qu'ils devraient adoucit un peu cette fréquence.
- J'aimerai avoir un long jeu car il mérite :)

Mais je sens qu'on va revoir ce mystérieux personnage dans un autre jeu. :) Vivement qu'ils fassent une autre jeu de ce genre.

最先吸引我的是酷似Pandora Heart的畫風，觀看完PV更是有這種感覺。中世紀服飾與場景、塔羅牌、歌劇式的OST和BGM，無一不戳中我的喜好。

遊戲故事分為兩周目，必須完成一周目E.C.I.R.P.才會出現P.R.I.C.E.章節。遊戲標籤含微恐怖，個人認為故事並不恐怖，只是帶些黑暗元素。雖然小女孩清脆哼唱歌聲的BGM莫名令人感到略陰森。

流程略短，一周目花半小時合共剛好一小時完成。劇情內容可以更加深入開拓，解釋先前兩周目伏筆設定。劇情雖套路但遊戲過程當中解開線索後配合影片享用感覺頗佳。

另遊戲中不能截圖，只有影片播放中才可。整體來說是一個有點可惜的解謎遊戲，以遊戲質量其實可以上架收費。

Esse jogo é surpreendente!
A jogabilidade é simples, clique em um local e explore as possibilidades.
Os enigmas são muito bons, e vão fazer você pensar diversas vezes e em várias possibilidades. 
A história tem uma progressão bem interessante, mas um tanto confusa. 
As músicas do jogo são muito belas, principalmente a abertura que é muito bem feita, mas a música ingame, eu recomendo deixar bem baixa! Depois de meia hora, ela não empolga mais.
O final, é algo extraordinário!! Aberto a multiplas interpretações, no melhor estilo Serial Experiments Lain.
Um ponto chato, nem é o jogo, mas sim a Steam que exige a compra da OST e do Artbook, para fornecer cartas ao jogador. Isso não atrapalha, mas é uma bela sabotagem!

27651977.review:
TL;DR: This game is gorgeous. And free. Just play it.

Well, after playing for the first time i was confused af and i did have to look at the guides. Then it got updated because the cutscenes didn't show up. After playing it again from start to finish i must say it all makes sense now (i do recommend replaying it once you know what happens, to better understand the story).

+++PROS
+Beutiful soundtrack
+Voice-acting (although it isn't in english)
+Thriller feelings
+Amazing presentation of the story through dialogue and cutscenes
+Good graphics
+Minor details have gameplay objectives or story meanings
+Just the right amount of horror

---CONS (the best term would probably be frustating things)
-Unlike most point and click games where you have many "clue-paths" and they converge onto the ending, this game is pretty linear and the clues get "unlocked" for you to get them only after certain points in the story. This is more a warning to change your mentality for this game rather than a con.
-You need to revisit the places you already searched to get clues. If a place doesn't have clues maybe you don't have everything to "unlock" it or maybe it really doesn't have any clues (i haven't found any bug relating this so if you don't find that clue you have missed something. go to the amazing guides if you get too frustated).
-The two mechanics (clue combining and object selection) seem a bit odd until you get used to them but they are extremely important to finish the game. Just as a reminder an object is selected when you have it highlighted at the object selection, if it has a bright border don't hesitate to close the "objects" tab, if they don't work you are missing something or you haven't found the right place to click.
-The hints and the clues in this game are NOT STRAIGHTFORWARD. Most hints have two or three steps that you need to [b] think	[/b] (/imagine/guess/get inspired from a tiger-shaped cloud that passes by) to get the next clue. Other hints and uses of objects seem a bit odd logic-wise but are always understandable once you do get them. You can spend time thinking and getting a strong feeling of acomplishment or you can look at the amazing guides to fight frustation, it's entirely up to you. Lastly, remember that everything that seems like a hint can surely be a hint later on for something you don't expect.

To sum up, be aware that this is not the typical straightforwad pixelhunting game: the places are hidden but they are easy enough to find, the difficulty is knowing where, when and what exactly you need to to do in order to progress. The game is free and it's totally worth your time (and maybe money). A solid 9/10 for a free game.

26731029.review:
嗯，又是个续命失败的故事。naive

昨天被甜大佬安利来。
真的真的是个好游戏。

解密作为游戏的核心玩法，难度着实不低。
也有可能是我脑残。
反正弄得我挺痛苦的。
还是看了攻略。

不过我觉得玩法并不是游戏的亮点啊。
我不喜欢解密，咳，因为傻。

给我更深的印象的是美术风格，以及音乐一类。
作者将很多细节隐藏在游戏中探查过程中。
甚至不惜设计成，不探查到这些细节无法进行下一步，不知道是不是有意的。
比如，花的盛开和凋零之间，有一副画叫生与死之间。这种的。

游戏里的UI设计成文艺复兴时期的家具雕饰的样式。
有明显的古罗马建筑的涡卷饰、植物叶饰，后来被雕刻师沿用到家居雕饰上。
加上背后的木板贴图加重了家居雕饰的感觉。
算是别出心裁吧，指向性相对上没有传统的那么清晰，倒也不是很难辨认。
加上室内装饰配色上的鲜艳跳脱。大概故事背景时发生在文艺复兴之后。

BGM都是同样的。大概有四首。
OST里只有三首，好像八音盒的只有打开八音盒那会和结局黑猫和魔术师对话时播放过，哦，还有标题界面。
主要切换bgm的地方在探查女孩人偶、拿到乐器、男主探查到真相时。
有个小细节，切换BGM时歌曲的播放音调是一致的，前一首的没播完的部分又新的BGM补充或者替代。
整体过渡很平滑，使整体氛围得到升华，也没有强硬的打断感。是很出彩的小细节。
可能那两首管乐的只能算是BGM的一个补充。主要还是以小姑娘和大叔的咏叹调为主。

说到咏叹调，包括OP和ED的唱法也是。我不是很懂音乐。大概是咏叹调吧，来源于歌剧，随文艺复兴兴起。
和美术上时期是一致的，我不知道是不是有意为之，反正我注意到了这点，为它的讲究而惊喜。
不过相对cg上加的老电影的胶片播放的艺术效果就不是很合适，要做Grunge也有很多比这很得当的方式。

故事剧情有浓厚的哥特色彩。歌颂死亡和绝望中的一丝希望，着重渲染神秘和恐怖的氛围。
包括原画也是。设定集里棺材葬礼的图与哥哥的巨大盆骨拉这用妹妹做的小提琴的真的是被哥特了一脸。
不过还挺好看就是了。

总体来说，剧情老套但是精彩，音乐出色，美术比较有思想。总体风格复杂却相对统一。
是一个精品游戏，关键是免费！

对与ost没什么好说的了。
但是设定集有点不满意。
内容太少，想要的歌词没有（真的没有听懂！）。
还有很多没有弄懂的地方指望设定集解释。
比如一周目结束后脖子后面的哥特体P字母是什么。
还有二周目哥哥房间里那些骷髅画像的寓意。
我不相信这些只是单单为了渲染哥特式艺术氛围而作的。
但设定集也没有解释。

很期待前作和续作登陆steam，我会支持的！

26680854.review:
When I first started out, there was a bug apparently (some cutscenes were missing, and those were important because they contained clues to solve a particular puzzle - so I waited about a month before replaying the game).

I didn't expect the game to be as deep as it turned out to be (at least, from my perspective).

The moment I launched the game and heard the intro music, I wasn't impressed. I found the tune rather derivative and lacking in originality, but I did find it suitable and fitting for this game (which is a crossbreed between a visual novel & point-&-click).

Meaning, it is story-centered (so there's a bit of reading, but most of the story-telling is done thru the gathering and combining of clues & visual scenes - with the latter being typical of the VN genre).

The story touches upon several themes that are portrayed quite well in my opinion. There are references to what I would consider emotional incest (which is rather taboo, but mistifying nonetheless), abandonment (or at the very least, a fear of it), separation & sacrifice.

Especially the former (i.e. emotional incest/enmeshment) is rather difficult to portray without it appearing distasteful, but I have to say the developers really pulled it off graciously.

Project PRICE feels very tender and poetic.

The crew created something that felt very emotional, sentimental, delicate, frail & fragile. 

Somewhat twisted & quite tragic as well.

Surprisingly, the game really did speak to my heart (I was very touched by it). And for that I am grateful.

PS I found the drawings to be of very good quality. I wouldn't mind investing in the artwork :)

PPS there is an original twist regarding the title of the game, but I'd rather let any potential players discover this for themselves :)

NB there was one particular puzzle (involving a code - in the first half of the game) that I had difficulty solving - the solution was right in front of me, but I somehow couldn't see it (admittedly, it was a bit cryptic and the wonky narrative confused me a little).

NB2 please bear in mind that the developers are not English native speakers, so there are some erroneously constructed parts of text, but overall the game is comprehensible and the developers do seem to care about using proper spelling and grammar to the best of their abilities (the text was quite literally translated from Chinese to English, so that elucidates why this is the case).

NOTE: the game consists of two parts (in the second part, the music was much more to my liking, and I found it a bit more original than the opening soundtrack)

This game definitely has a lot of potential. The art and music are beautiful, and I love this kind of creepy story. The voice acting also sounded good to me, although I can't judge it too well, seeing as I don't understand Chinese.

Now, as I read some reviews before playing, I was prepared for not getting too many clues and the missing cutscenes. I think even without the scenes it's not too hard to get at least a rough picture of the story. And I suppose veteran point and click adventure players will not give up when mostly you just have to click objects several times. The two menus are also not too bad to get used to. But as far as I could see there wasn't even a hint on how you have to "equip" items from your item menu sometimes before interacting with something. To be honest, I used a walkthrough to complete the game, because I ran out of patience to try clicking on everything without any progress.

Overall, I still think this game is worth a try, at least if you like point & click games and creepy stories.

26514268.review:
通关撒花：PRICE，一款短篇恐怖解谜游戏，画风精致，片头曲也很优美，第一次听到就喜欢上了。由于是短篇游戏，因此流程并不长，分为2个周目，合起来才是一个完整的故事。又由于是恐怖解谜游戏，因此带有惊悚元素，气氛营造的非常到位，但不算很吓人。

在游戏的开始，一名少年醒来，发现妹妹不见了，而房间里也有诸多诡异之处，自己的记忆更是断断续续，到底发生了什么呢？

游戏的玩法很简单，在设定上有点类似于密室逃脱游戏，玩家需要点击房中的各项物品，获得线索，解开谜团才能离开房间。值得注意的是：有些线索需要装备上特定的物品才能获得，打开物品栏，选中相应的物品，然后正常和房间内物品互动即可。

获得了多项线索以后，可以利用穷尽法进行组合，关键的线索可以推动剧情发展。整体难度并不高，而攻略网上也有给出，不用担心卡关。调查房间需要仔细耐心，有些时候两件物品挨的近容易遗漏。

游戏的整体氛围偏向于黑暗，但又莫名的戳中人的萌点。PRICE这个名字起的也非常好，代价可以说是一个关键词，在这对兄妹的故事中占据了重要地位。通关以后细细回味，不胜唏嘘。

PRICE由国内制作组夜兔AVG打造，另外一部作品尘沙惑也登陆了steam平台。同样精致的画面和艺术风格，让人眼前一亮。

同样推荐乙女向文字恋爱游戏尘沙惑： http://store.steampowered.com/app/520850/

Сейчас уже не 2001 год, чтобы так легко прощать такие выверты с непропускаемыми анимешными опенингами с музыкой качества ниже среднего. Если создатель не уважает время игроков, то зачем нам уважаеть его время? Игра-то, конечно, бесплатная, но время дороже денег.

26448630.review: Well, this one has this thriller atmosphere and combines some elements of point & click adventure with the "escape room" theme. Although it's a short run, it can surely keep you busy for a while. The puzzles and complexity aren't really that huge, either way, some of them can prove to be quite tricky. My only complaint with this title is the music which is constantly played on the background. Sure, I understand that it's there to involve the player on the plot but in that case it doesn't take long to get old (luckily you can turn it off on the menu). Overall, it's a fair game, has some achievements available and it's free so why not give it a try?

26415670.review:
我不知道大晚上十二点我为何要点开带有微量恐怖元素的小游戏，大概是因为op非常棒第一眼我还以为是双子出了新歌


-流程较短，画风很棒，剧情很赞
-微量恐怖元素醒目，毕竟玩偶一惊一乍还是蛮吓人的
-解密要素也比较简单，我这种[strike]智障[/strike]都二周目全成就了还怕啥
-游戏没有bad end，[spoiler][strike]毕竟本身就是个BE[/strike][/spoiler]，手动存档以防电脑抽风
-一周目调查镜子有惊喜，科科


我特么开始还以为是个拯救妹妹骨科的故事，虽然一周目过了后的独白让我觉得哪里不劲，然而二周目终于撕开了治郁向的面纱，不说了打开某宝买刀片了
流程很短感觉有些情节还没有解释清楚，[spoiler]比如作为死神的猫为何被关在了柜子里，妹妹为什么断了头[/spoiler]，以及我很好奇一周目后那个读故事的是不是魔术师，还有他怀里的小孩子
能看得出作者有用心的去设计细节，并且运用了线索这一选项代替了大部分的对白旁白独白各种白来推动剧情

26402785.review:
I want to like this game. It has nice graphics, nice enough requiem that I'm not too irritated with it drowning all other sounds my laptop is making, seems like a nice story. But that's the keyword: "seems".

I actually have no idea what to make of the story. I saw several pieces of dialogue that didn't make sense. I saw things I couldn't understand why existed. Who's the cat? Where did the magician appear, ever? Tubercolosis? Then stabbing? So what happened to Iva, really? I understood nothing. Why? Because it seems the cut scenes didn't play. I saw in the discussions that there's a fix, but really, this kind of thing isn't something that your players have to find a way to fix. As a developer, that's you're job and I'm holding you responsible for whatever glitch your game decides to show on a multitude of computers.

In it's current state, if you can't speak any other language other than English, I do not recommend this game. Devs should fix up the missing cut scenes issue first. Otherwise, go right ahead and try it, I suppose. Probably wouldn't give you the same unsatisfied feeling it gave me.

26293695.review:
[h1]Impression[/h1]
If you're into creepy point-and-click puzzle games, you should definitely keep this game in mind. PRICE is a challenging game with a mysterious plot and a wonderfully eerie atmosphere. Sadly, the game is also very short, and you'll probably beat it in a few hours. On the other hand, the game is entirely free to play, so you've got nothing to lose!

The only thing that you'll probably need to get used to is how you can use items in your inventory to interact with your environment. It's a bit annoying at first, but after a little while you'll get the hang of it. The clues system is also really neat as you have to combine specific clues to unravel more secrets and make progress. However, I found that some combinations of clues were a tad far-fetched. Because of that, you may get stuck at some points. Nevertheless, it's an enjoyable game.

[h1]Pros[/h1]
+ Creepy point-and-click puzzle game with challenging puzzles
+ Mysterious yet intriguing story
+ Beautiful art style and soundtrack
+ Neat 'clues system'
+ 100% free to play!

[h1]Cons[/h1]
- Very short
- Controls for using items in your inventory may be frustrating
- Some clues and puzzles are a tad illogical

26290741.review: 真的真的不错，如果作者继续出作品的话我还会购入的

26284667.review:
I love this game!

The artwork looks nice, I'm into this type of drawing rather than the real-life-looking-3D games. It's just my preference.
Music is good, I love the hauntingly beautiful and high-pitched songs, though I did have to reduce the volume a bit while playing because it takes a toll on the ears after a while.
The story is sad, sick, twisted, and a touch of horror, which may turn off some audience, but totally my type. It has some twists, but not so hard to predict. One of the endings still got me though, when I thought it's gonna be a happy ending, it just blew my head off, seriously. And I say endings because it has 2 parts with 2 endings, and the last one after credits.
I see some complaints in the reviews about lost cutscenes, but it seems to work fine for me, so I think they fixed it.

This is more of a hidden object game, with some puzzles. It requires to carefully search every small areas and objects, many of which are close together, which may make you think that you clicked already. The puzzles are not hard, but player must pay close attention to the details, well I did have to consent the guide on the tarot because I didn't. Some clicked areas/objects will have new features after new items/clues/unlocks are found, so a little back and forth, but the area is small so not that bad.

Overall, it's a great short game, and it's free to begin with. So if you're into this genre, give it a try.

在steam上的第一篇测评就交给这个游戏了。
要我评分的话：画风（画面）：9/10虽然是国内的小工作室，但是这方面诚意满满，如果全都是自己画的那我得给32个赞。

                         剧情：6/10中规中矩的微恐怖，真想体验恐怖剧情的恐怕要失望了。一二周目加起来也不长。有点轻虐。
                         解谜：7/10这种程度的解谜对我这种休闲型玩家难度都不算太难，如果是冲着解谜来的那可能要失望了。不过休闲而言相当不错。
                         配音：6/10看在纯中文配音给个6分，实际上配音问题很多，不过这和国内大环境有关，也不必过多吹毛求疵。
总体而言作为一款国产的免费AVG小游戏而言，实在是没有拒绝试一试的理由。推荐玩一玩，反正也不过一个小时的游戏时间而已。

26273955.review:
This was a good hour I burned.

So, to try and avoid spoilers, I'll just say this is a decently done puzzle game that is totally worth the hour I put in.

I do enjoy the subtle twists, the building of the mystery, and the puzzles itself are quite nice.

Now, this game isn't perfect, of course. This version is a bit bugged, so the fully animated cutscenes actually aren't there, and they are what fill in the gaps to the mystery. There IS an online patch to fix that, but you should know this going in, the game needs a patch that wasn't here.

Also, the soundtrack is very limited. Like, one track limited. But as you progress, that track starts to fill up. It's a nice sign of progress.

All in all, the fact the core is decent and the game is free means I'm giving this a thumbs up.

Give it a try if you like spooks.

26233109.review:
[b]此评测无剧透[/b]

[h1]基本信息[/h1]
首先，因为是国产游戏而且好评如潮，所以认认真真去彻底玩了一遍才来的。[spoiler]其实是为了多一个全成就达成的游戏。[/spoiler]

点击类解密游戏，比起常规的找物品逃出密室模式以外，多了线索拼接的机制。还增加了一共11段短视频的剧情。Hanser的声控一本满足。

[b]有5张卡牌（由于是免费游戏又没有内购，所以不会有卡牌掉落，想要徽章的建议去市场购买。），8项成就。定价为免费游戏。[/b]

[h1]优缺点[/h1]
CG和动画片段很良心，音乐部分也很良心，但是游戏过程中的BGM太短而且单一，重复久了有点令人厌烦。（并且即使在触发剧情过场有念白时，BGM也不会停止或者至少自动变轻）

微恐怖的气氛塑造地不错，在开头动画和游玩过程中都体现出来了。反而是柜子里的猫出来时主人公的反应不太合逻辑，有点让人出戏。同样令人出戏的还有不算很专业的中文配音、在调查物品时的可爱风格的猫爪以及人物说话时对话框边上萌化的表情。

简笔画+老电影风格别有一番风味，但是总觉得作者有一种想把各种元素都拼在一起全部展示给大家看的感觉，有些不适合这个游戏的东西也都放了进来，有点违和。

关于游戏的过程，部分线索的拼接有点难以联想（或者说有点牵强），不看指南的话感觉会有点难玩（在社区指南有中文、英语以及俄语的全成就和游戏通关指南），不过东西不多，一个一个尝试拼接过来应该也能通关。不过看着指南然后过一遍剧情，就当看了一个短片动画（漫画？），还是可以的。

设置里没有分辨率的设置，即使全屏了，分辨率也并没有变高。设置里同样也没有语言的设置，可能是根据下载区直接帮玩家自动选择了？

游戏只有单线，没有支线，不知道数个存档位的意义是什么（反复看同一段剧情之类的？），不过这种东西聊胜于无。相比之下，一个自动存档功能可能更为好一些。

在两个篇章的开头和第一章结尾都有跳不过的相同的片段，有点恼人。（就算不能跳过的话，至少是做成不同的也好啊！）还好片段长度不是很长。

ECIRP篇章中我记得看到的乐器是长笛，到了PRICE篇章一开始拿到的乐谱上是单簧管，最后人偶吹的没看错的话是双簧管，有点奇怪。

讲了这么多，最后说点比较关键的吧：这游戏免费！有成就并且很好拿！很容易通关！有卡牌！还想什么呢？快开玩吧！

[h1]关于全成就[/h1]
需要的技术：普通
需要的时间：短

如果要自己走流程的话，走完以后基本就全成就了。实在需要成就以及通关方面的攻略的话，以下这篇社区指南可以参考，个人觉得这篇写得比较详细。
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=772879322

[h1]推荐人群[/h1]
+喜欢解谜游戏的玩家
+喜欢微恐怖元素的玩家
+成就党
+支持国产游戏的玩家
-胆子小得一塌糊涂的玩家
-希望玩到一款制作成熟的的玩家

[h1]评分: 7/10[/h1]

点击页面内右侧绿色的关注按钮，关注[url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Seniorplayer#curation] 电玩狂热爱好者 [/url] ，以获取更多游戏评测、资讯、攻略。

26188862.review:
It's not too bad, and as it's free I feel kinda bad giving it a negative review, but... well, 

- the soundtrack gets annoying very quicky 
- the puzzles are illogical and confusing, only solvable by try and error 
- the story is one of those where you have to fill in huge parts yourself, some may like this, some not. 

So, the game is not good either, as these issues strongly distract from the gloomy and creepy atmosphere the game is trying to create. If the developer of PRICE should ever stumble upon this review, here are some further tips for her/him: 

- the basic concept of the puzzle is putting some hints together and combine them to the story. But you would have to know the story in advance to get this right. Always remember, the story is only in your head, not in your player's, so we need additional hints. 
- don't re-use your assets. It's sort of ok for this free game, but never do this if you want to sell something, people would get very annoyed  
- the basic idea for the story is great, but it's just that. It needs much more details and consistency

26144011.review:
Point’n’click + мистика + драма в аниме стилитике

Игра встречает шикарным опенингом. В процессе геймплея предстоит собирать историю событий, произошедших с братом и сестрой, по небольшому объему информации. Остается место для фантазии и некоторые моменты придется додумывать. 
Сам сюжет средний. Он есть, но ничего необычного в нем нет и в целом его несложно предсказать.
Музыкальная составляющая на достойном уровне. Задания совсем несложные.

Квест, за которым можно интересно провести час времени. Все достижения получаются по мере прохождения сюжета.

26121514.review:
(This review has been edited following updates to the game which fixed some significant problems)

Originally there was a problem with the game.  There were several scenes missing from the game, at least in the English version.  I was unable to recommend this game at the time because of this flaw.  However, that has now changed, and assuming you're playing on the latest (at the time of this review, which will not be updated again) patch I can recommend this game with only some minor caveats.  This review will focus pretty hard on those caveats, but do remember that they are just that.  Problems, but not game ruining issues, at least for me.

The main draw of this game is definitely its artwork.  Simply put, it is gorgeous.  It has a distinctly anime style to it, though it certainly isn't the super cute "moe" aesthetic that this might bring to mind in some people.  If that isn't your thing than you might not agree, but certainly the artwork is pretty incredible, especially for a free to play game.

Gameplay wise this is a pretty barebones point and click adventure game in an "escape the room" style.  The puzzles aren't very numerous or difficult.  For the most part the task is to just click on items with something selected in your inventory (the interface for this is weird, giving very little indication that an item is selected before you try to use it, but you will get used to it quickly).  Most of the time these puzzles are well designed, as you can either intuit what is meant to be used based on common sense or a clue found in the game.  Such clues range from a literal "clue mechanic” (in which you find information about the "mystery" of the game which you are then tasked to connect the dots on, which are usually obvious), to some cutscenes (especially in the latter half of the game).  So as you can imagine in my original review I had some harsh words at the removal of certain scenes, which made the puzzles into pure guesswork.  This has (apparently, according to the patch notes alone) been resolved, and should no longer be an issue.  Overall though, I would say the gameplay is at best "serviceable."  There's nothing especially revolutionary or interesting to be found her, and almost no real challenge.

The second biggest draw of the game is probably the story.  I have mixed feelings about this.  The game itself is about two hours long at most, and while most of this is spent "discovering" the story through various clues, you don't get very much in the way of exposition until the end.  With the scenes restored the story is simple and easy enough to understand, though you may be left with a few details missing even so.  Nothing to scratch your head and frown over.  However, despite the game presenting its story as mysterious (there's even a previously mentioned mechanic for piecing together clues from your environment to get more exposition, which btw is not optional) a savvy player familiar with these kinds of ghost stories will probably figure out at least 90% of the big twist within the first fourth of the game, about fifteen to twenty minutes.  This isn't helped that, despite adventures games like these often being driven by plot, this game is simply so short that there really isn't room for any kind of plot twists other than the "big reveal" at the end, so most of the information you do get isn't really misleading you into being shocked by the ending.  Nevertheless I like the story.  It’s sweet, in an appropriately disturbing way.  It’s a tragedy the player can see coming, but wish they didn't.

If you had to pay even a dollar I don't think I'd recommend this game.  Everything about it is just shallow.  The mechanics are shallow, the puzzles are easy, and if you want a good story in the same amount of time you're better off watching a movie.  But as a free game (truly free!  It is unfair to compare it to a game with a cash shop!) this game has much higher production values than you would expect.  The writing for what's there is usually on point.  And again, the artwork really is beautiful.  If you're looking for a simple little experience that won't tax you or your wallet, definitely give this a try.

26121473.review:
PRICE is a short and simple point'n'click with an interesting concept and an unexpectedly good execution. It's also free, so you should just play it.

Pros:
+ Great art.
+ Great music.
+ Great story (for such a short game).
+ Horror-like atmosphere without the use of screamers and monsters.

Cons:
- Using items is unintuitive.
- Translation. It makes me happy though. It's not every day that I get to look down on other people's English.

8/10. [spoiler]Objectively.[/spoiler]

26117050.review:
PRICE攻略
一周目E.C.I.R.E

写在开头的P.S.攻略没提到镜子，调查镜子保证不后悔，制作组之用心，好好感受，绝不坑你-3-
1. 调查衣帽架旁地上的花瓶得到物品”部件三”。
2. 调查墙上右边数过去第三个相框得到线索”小孩涂鸦”。
3. 调查娃娃得到线索”沙发上的人偶”。
4. 调查壁炉上的画两次，第二次提示”生与死之间”。
5. 调查壁炉左或右边的雕花，左边开花，右边枯萎，左生右死。
6. 调查壁炉中间两次，得到物品”部件二”。
7. 调查壁炉上的八音盒，发现八音盒坏掉。
8. 调查八音盒左上的小相框，镶着一幅被火烤着的花朵的画。
9. 装备”部件二”，调查挂钟，得到物品”塔罗牌二”(倒吊人)。
10. 调查书桌上右边的书，发现其中一本上锁了。
11. 调查书桌上中间的香炉，得到线索”香炉”。
12. 调查书桌上左边的书，得到线索”迷惑的法术”。
13. 调查衣橱，发现上锁了。
14. 调查衣橱旁抽屉上的天鹅型花瓶，得到物品”花瓣”。
15. 调查抽屉上的篮子，得到线索”粉末”。
16. 线索”香炉”与”粉末”合成，得到新线索”香味”。
17. 线索”香味”与”迷惑的法术”合成，得到新线索”迷幻之香”。
18. 调查抽屉上的小熊玩偶，得到线索”小熊玩具”。
19. 线索”小熊玩具”与小孩涂鸦”合成，得到新线索”爸爸的礼物”。
20. 调查抽屉第一格，得到物品”刀”。
21. 调查抽屉第二格，发现需要密码，暂时跳过。
22. 调查抽屉第三格，得到物品”塔罗牌一”(情侣)。
23. 调查床底，得到物品”齿轮一”。
24. 根据被火烤着的花朵的画的提示，装备”花瓣”，然后调查床头小柜，得到”烤过的花瓣”。
25. 装备”刀”，然后调查很像艾娃的人偶，得到物品”齿轮二”，并根据”倒吊人”的提示得到”小钥匙”。
26. 调查八音盒，把得到的两个齿轮装上后，得到八音盒里的密码提示”3725”(即每一行的点点数)。
27. 装备”小钥匙”，调查书桌上右边的书，得到线索”复活的法术”。
28. 线索”沙发上的人偶”与”复活的法术”整合，得到新线索”艾娃”。
29. 调查抽屉第二格，输入八音盒上的密码3725，得到线索”半张乐谱”。
30. 线索”半张乐谱”及”爸爸的礼物”整合，得到新线索”童年”。
31. 调查衣橱两次，第二次根据花瓣上的提示，输入”666”，得到物品”部件一”及线索”衣柜里的猫”。
32. 线索”衣柜里的猫”及”迷幻之香”整合，得到新线索”真实”。
33. 线索”艾娃”及”真实”整合，得到新线索”完整的钥匙”。
34. 调查门。
一周目通关。



二周目P.R.I.C.E.

1. 调查床，得到物品”带血迹的钥匙”。
2. 调查抽屉上男主的照片，得到线索”肖像画”。
3. 调查抽屉第一格，发现需要密码，暂时跳过。
4. 调查抽屉第二格，得到物品”塔罗牌四”(死神)。
5. 调查书桌上方空画框里左下角的信，提示”对称的秘密”。
6. 调查壁炉上左及右边的花瓶，根据提示”对称的秘密”，花瓶上的刻字合起来是”4659”。
7. 再度调查抽屉第一格，输入花瓶上的数字4659，得到线索”处方签”。
8. 调查跟男主一样的人偶，发现少了一条手臂。
9. 调查书桌上的墨水瓶，得到物品”螺丝钉”。
10. 调查书桌的抽屉，得到物品”螺丝刀”。
11. 装备”带血迹的钥匙”，调查门旁书柜顶上的长方形盒子，得到线索”树叶书签”。
12. 调查书柜右边第三格，得到物品”塔罗牌三”(魔术师)。
13. 调查书柜右边第四格，看到童话故事人鱼公主。
14. 调查书柜左边第四格，得到线索”艾娃的收藏册”。
15. 线索”艾娃的收藏册”与”树叶书签”整合，得到新线索”艾娃的过去”。
16. 线索”艾娃的过去”与”肖像画”整合，得到新线索”曾经”。
17. 调查钢琴，得到线索”陈旧的血迹”。
18. 线索”陈旧的血迹”与”处方签”整合，得到新线索”阴影”。
19. 装备”塔罗牌一”(情侣)，调查壁炉上方的画，放进左边第一格。
20. 装备”塔罗牌四”(死神)，调查壁炉上方的画，放进左边第二格。
21. 装备”塔罗牌三”(魔术师)，调查壁炉上方的画，放进左边第三格。
22. 装备”塔罗牌二”(倒吊人)，调查壁炉上方的画，放进左边第四格，得到物品”人偶手臂”。
23. 装备”人偶手臂”，调查人偶，得到线索”沾血的人偶”。
24. 装备”半张乐谱”，调查抽屉上左边的书，提示乐谱最后一页不见了。
25. 装备”半张乐谱”，调查书桌上被剪碎的信，得到线索”安魂曲”。
26. 线索”安魂曲”及”沾血的人偶”整合，得到新线索”代价”(PRICE)。
二周目通关。

26114566.review:
怎么说呢，作为一篇免费的略带一点恐怖元素的解谜游戏，操作上虽有一点不方便，还有一些小BUG，但是感觉诚意还是挺足的，从线索一点点合成一点点触发新的剧情，让玩家把整个故事的结构轮廓慢慢描绘出来，真的已经是非常棒了。当然个人感觉有一些问题比较大的地方必须说一下。
提一点声优的问题，不得不说这个哥哥配的声音太尴尬了，全程完全没有起伏和代入感啊，no offense，只是实在忍不住吐槽两句，相比而言，妹妹的感觉好多了。
主要想说的是剧情，整篇剧情略俗套，太过简单，感觉铺垫了好久到最后讲两句剧情发展就单纯的咔嚓一下断头再见，瞬间有点懵逼，明明可以更努力把剧情上也变得有吸引力才好啊。我来扯淡两句，比如说[spoiler] 妹妹在没出生的时候其实有个哥哥，但是因为体弱在襁褓中就死去了，【线索是墙上的照片早期是父亲笑着抱着襁褓里的哥哥用胡子茬去蹭婴儿，后来却只有父亲和女儿俩人的照片，父亲脸上冷漠的表情和妹妹无助的样子】父亲丧子心痛，又逢生意失利，酗酒家暴，妹妹从小就受尽打骂折磨，【线索是桌子上的信件，写着商船沉了云云，妹妹画画中父亲脸上的愤怒，手中血迹斑斑，地上的盘子碎片，哭泣的太阳】幻想自己死去的哥哥一直活在身边陪着自己，虚构了很多哥哥的长相和行为，幻想中哥哥是接近完美的人，【线索是照片中兄妹长相相似的不正常 PS：妹妹年纪不大脑补不出真正哥哥男孩应该长啥样所以以自己为模板】但是玩家第一眼觉得很正常或者以为是画师的锅，然后剧情再介入这个游戏的所谓魔法师，妹妹与魔法师签订契约成为马猴烧酒然后···咳咳，嗯上面当我没说，然后就是妹妹与魔法师达成协议，妹妹主动用肉体和灵魂交换一个真实存在的哥哥，魔法师答应了但是这个魔法师根本没本事复活或者塑造一个活人出来所以他欺骗了妹妹，妹妹自杀后灵魂不得宁静被魔法师所困，强烈的怨念和思念制造了一个梦境，也就是游戏本身，玩家到最后发现自己是早就死了的，不存在的人	[/spoiler] 这么一搞事，感觉剧情一下子B格满满啊有木有【其实是我脑洞太大然后胡诌玩玩2333】最后，表达一下对作者的感激，毕竟在steam上玩免费的国人游戏还是非常开心的，GLMF

26090072.review:
It's a point and click puzzle game, with an awkward interface and limited animation.  The art isn't bad the music is mildly mood setting, but the poor translation, minimal plot (that tries to aspire to far more than it is), and missing cut scenes doom it to mediocrity.  It could be beat in about 2 minutes if you didn't have to fight the interface or wait for cut scenes, and it might take an hour or so because of those obstacles.

It was free so I don't regret anything other than the time spent, which in hindsight would have been better used on a Flash room escape puzzle from some other gaming website.  This really has no business being a stand alone .exe at this point.

26081569.review:
PRICE is a creepy point & click indie puzzle game about a boy, Ivry, trying to find his missing sister. When he awakens in the beggining, he finds himself locked in his sister's room and must look around for clues in order to get out. Aside from his missing sister, there's still a mystery going on here. Why was he locked in her room? What were those strange shadows following him? Why is there a talking cat that he doesn't seem to be afraid of? And seriously, what's with the creepy singing doll?

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
As stated, it's a point & click game, so it's pretty basic in that sense. However, it's a little more complicated than just "pointing and clicking"; a lot of the items and clues are hidden extremely well, so it's good to be thorough! Another thing is you have to combine certain clues with each other in order to progress the story. You might get stuck a few times, but don't be discouraged! If all else fails, try going through the room again to see if you missed something.

[h1]Pros:[/h1]
[list][*][b]Graphics[/b] - The art style is quite detailed and lovely, which adds a beautiful quality to a game like this.
[*][b]Audio[/b] - The sound effects and voice acting are done really well! Some of the sounds made me a little jumpy, which added to the overall experience.
[*][b]Music[/b] - Some of the best music I've heard in an indie game! It was quite catchy :)[/list]

[h1]Little Flaws[/h1]
I wouldn't consider these "cons" just because they shouldn't affect the overall experience, but these are little things I've noticed:
[list][*]There are some minor grammatical errors, which don't appear too often, but when they do it's still easy to understand.
[*]If you try to progress through the dialogue while the character is talking, the physical dialogue will skip, but the voice acting will not. I only noticed this because I read too fast. If anything, you can just wait for them to finish, but it's not too bad.[/list]

[h1]Final Thoughts[/h1]
Overall, I thought this was a charming little indie game. The story was interesting, but kind of tugs you around a bit, then finally gives you an ending that you may or may not care for. Regardless, it was still a satisfying experience and doesn't leave any loose ends. It's a rather short game that you can finish in less than 2hrs (even if you get stuck); I only wish it were longer because it was just that enjoyable :)

26069997.review:
PRICE is a free short point and click puzzle game with beautiful gothic-like art and music.
Even though this game is free and the name is called PRICE. XD (you'll figure it out why if you play the game)

At the beginning it took me some time to figure out how to use the items. But after I figure it out it was fun for me to solve the puzzles. Each puzzle will give you hints about the plot. So you have to solve the puzzles to progress in the game or else you will be stuck. Not all puzzle are easy to solve and my hint is to click on all items in the room as many times.
I like the way that the plot is divided into two parts. The cutscene voices are in chinese mandarin.

26061578.review:
作为一款免费游戏，无论是画风还是情节都可圈可点，人设也属于唯美向，游戏BUG几乎没有，很不错的一款“免费”游戏。但是，并不能掩盖游戏体验缺失的错觉，但是就一款短小游戏来说，还是可以接受的。但是就游戏设计来说要做的更精致一点会更好。

7.5的精品游戏，可以一试。

以下是剧透情节，建议没玩过的玩家不要观看









首先是游戏剧情的硬伤，魔术师的剧情根本没有，到最后莫名的冒了出来，而且说的很隐晦，从关键机关，陈列塔罗牌的剧情来说，显得莫名其妙。并没有达到应该有的震撼。
其次是游戏的BGM，为了增加应有的渲染气氛而开始一直吟唱的女声确实很不错，但是放了两遍之后给我带来的无与伦比的厌恶感，且不说唱功如何，但是重复的手法已经感觉无法忍受删掉游戏的冲动。改成八音盒或者用其他的音乐替代都可以，BGM做的非常差。
最后就是游戏的框架，完全没办法理解分屏幕的感受，每次寻找谜题都要切换，做一个追焦的键盘移动应该不难，但是这导致游戏体验很蛋碎。

当然，一款免费游戏做到这种氛围感觉，依然是玩家的天堂了，在免费游戏中，我给7.5分。

26061530.review: 不错的黑童话，解密不是很难，故事很好。

26060435.review:
A short and sweet story about a brother and sister. The music and atmosphere kept me on edge the whole time. It's very satisfying when you figure out the next piece of the puzzle; a few of the puzzles got me pretty good! The game does a great job of not directly telling you what to do.

There are some strange spellings/grammatical errors (I played in English,) but they do not detract from the story at all.

If you're going to play this I recommend you download the K-Lite Codec Pack (or codec pack of your choice) otherwise you may have issues with the cutscenes not playing. The game warns you about this as well. Another thing to keep in mind (which I didn't do originally >_> ) is that in your Items screen whichever item is selected is the one you are using to interact with things. So try changing items and checking out everything you can interact with again :)

I love stories that have some room for interpretation and this is one of them. Beautiful! Definitely recommend this game.

26058032.review: Short, free, creepy, with beautiful music and art. Quite frankly it could've gotten away with crappy music and art considering the price (badum tsh) but the fact that those aspects are so polished is just the icing on top. Price is a point and click adventure game, with some of the same problems of the old point and click adventure games including lots of clicking on everything and trying to use every object you collected on everything else. But it's still a simple game with a pretty good horror story to go with it. No jump scares, just that sort of creeping dread you find in a nightmare. Personally I much prefer that type of more psychological horror to begin with. And it's free. Come on, I would've paid MONEY for this game and you can play it free so go do it.

26049979.review:
这是一款免费的恐怖向解谜游戏，国人制作，支持啊~

+ 游戏完成度达标
+ 剧情完整，做出了讲一个好故事的尝试
+ 有CG，棒
+ 立绘等美术元素风格统一，体现出了人物与故事的冲突感——主人公的美好与故事的阴暗
+ 音乐音效也烘托了阴森诡异的氛围

- 剧情太短了，其实很简单，还达不到“故事”的标准，因而感人程度有限
- 虽然看得出在努力营造恐怖诡异的氛围，不过由于剧情深度有限，显得不够自然
- 还是有点小bug，有时鼠标会乱跳

* 解谜内容中规中矩，谜题不算困难，不借助攻略基本可以完成，不过快结束时还是卡了一次关
* 由于游戏流程不到两小时，因此只能作为免费游戏了，从免费的角度来说还是良心游戏吧

看得出游戏作者的用心。希望这类恐怖解谜游戏能够有更优秀的剧本和更丰富的素材~

This is a very short game, I finished it in less than an hour I believe. It's a bit confusing, I more so just jammed clues together til something worked, but that doesn't mean it's not worth the playthru for puzzle lovers out there. Unfortunately a lot of the cutscenes are missing/don't play and the game skips over them, with them the story makes a lot more sense so would have combining of the clues I bet. Go look at the two main guides for links to the cutscenes on youtube plus help if you need it, I'd say follow the guides just to play the missing cutscenes along with your game so you get the complete story.

Reminds me a lot of Vocaloid videos, which is what initially got me interested in trying it out, and as a fan of Vocaloid made me happy to be able to play something that felt like an interactive Vocaloid video. I kinda wish there wasn't any voice acting or that I could mute it, but there wasn't that much of it anyways so no biggie.

26044190.review:
P.R.I.C.E. - я не помню как и когда нашла её в Greenlight. Однажды одинокое уведомление напомнило мне о релизе и я уже не могла выбросить мысли об этой игрушке из головы.

   И хоть обзор мой небольшой, как и сама игра, P.R.I.C.E. определенно отныне мое сокровище.

   Каждое написанное мною слово - потенциальный спойлер.

   Цена, она же жертва - преступно короткая и трогательная история о брате и сестре, которая зачаровала меня настолько, что пробудила от оцепенения.  

   Небольшое приключение длинною в две жизни.

   Несложные, но интересные загадки, единственная цель которых восстановить события прошлого для нас и для героев.     Начиная свой путь в пустоте, мы постепенно заполняем картину красками, каждая ниточка неотвратимо ведет нас к истине, узнать которую и боязно, и необходимо как воздух.

   По пути Иви и Иври сопровождает нас не музыка, а магия, вплетенная в ноты. 

   Экстаз от музыки сменяется холодом по спине, когда мелодия сменяется реквиемом.

   Миловидность соседствует с ожившим кошмаром, чудесная рисовка с трагедией, что скрывают загадки.
 
   И снова у меня возникает вопрос - почему это чудо бесплатное?

   Спасибо, что можно приобрести волшебный саундтрек.  :3

26040124.review: It's a very small game, i would say between an escape game and a grapic adventure and yet, even with less than an hour to complete the game (2 if you sucks at escape game like me) this game as leave me so sad i was almost crying (i'm still on the verge of it while writing). This game only has two negative side, the first, if we can talk of it as such, being it a far too short game, much alike some online flash game you can play on your browser; the second problem is what i think to be a mistake from the writer: adding a small horror oriented content, since it does not feel right in the opera, and leave you with more question than anything. That being said, the generall quality of this title overcompensate for any downside, especially if you can appreciate the developer choice of leaving a short gameplay story rich instead of choosing a longer gameplay with diluted story and useless gameplay part.I feel like this game is one of those very gem able to leave the gamers with real feelings, which is not something that happen often today. In conclusion i totally recommend this game, since is not so hard even people with no experience in escape game will be able to solve it while enjoing the plot.

26001740.review:
PRICE - короткий, мрачный, печальный, запоминающийся и очень атмосферный хоррор-квест в стилистике анимэ.

1) [u]Сюжет[/u]: наш герой - молодой пианист по имени Иври просыпается после кошмара,  запертый в своей комнате. Чувствуя что в комнате что-то изменилось и что происходит нечто странное, он пытается выбраться из неё, а заодно найти свою сестру с которой он вроде бы общался совсем недавно, но воспоминания о которой вызывают у него смутное беспокойство. В процессе наш герой сможет вспомнить свое прошлое и понять что же его привело к такой жизни, и какую на самом деле цену иногда готовы заплатить люди за свою верность. Сюжет в игре красивый, грустный и можно сказать поэтический.

2) [u]Геймплей[/u]: визуально по геймплею мне игра после запуска напомнила Neverending Nightmare, только без чернухи. Но на самом деле эта игра это сборник относительно несложных паззлов в одной комнате - разбитых на два эпизода. Механика поначалу несколько непривычная - при обследовании локации мы находим предметы и улики (clues), первые можно применять предварительно поставив нужный предмет в инвентаре (а не перетащив как привычнее),  а вторые комбинировать дабы развернуть цепь догадок нашего героя. При этом уже обследованные места часто надо перепроверять после нахождения новых улик. Игровой процесс довольно интересен, игру реально пройти за час, а все ачивки получаются за одно прохождение.

3) [u]Графика и звуки[/u]: картинка в игре сделана в приятной анимэшной стилистике (в том её типе когда рисуют европейских персонажей викторианской эпохи), плюс есть качественные ролики в том же стиле. Так как сюжет про пианиста - в игре большую роль играет музыка, и саундтрек здесь очень хорош. Плюс есть озвучка на китайском, на слух звучит приятно, насчет остального сказать не могу, ибо китайским не владею.

[u]Как итог[/u]: один из тех немногих случаев когда в Стиме можно найти маленький бриллиант среди кучи мусора. Игра очень приятна, и оставляет после прохождения хорошие воспоминания. Любителям квестов, головоломок, анимэ и просто хороших игр, категорически рекомендую!
10 реквиемов из 10.

十分制的话我会打7.5分。
杰出的音乐，优秀的作画和动画，场景风格也很有味道。魔物的设定似乎参考了《魔法少女小圆》？颇有剧团咖喱狗的风格。解谜要素也做得不错（我觉得上篇比下篇难……）。唯一的遗憾就是情节了，有些单薄，总感觉可以做复杂些。虽说是bad end，但感觉刻画更多在死神上而非兄妹情，稍稍有些怨念。
再说一遍音乐太赞了，画风太赞了，血腥效果也很赞。但恐怖倒只有突然吓你一下的那种……
游戏时长约一小时。稍稍有些短呢……

25997570.review:
两年以前吧，看了这个游戏的实况,那时就打算要买了，但是想起来的时候淘宝已经不卖了。那时在我的印象中这就是一部非常好的游戏，于是在网上查到了制作组，想要看看其他作品，但是其他作品的面向群众好像有些问题。
本来看结局以为这是一个系列的游戏，但是看来也是销量问题，没有下文了。
我又去淘宝搜这个游戏有没有周边，不过是二手的，也就不了了之了。
一年以后，突然想起这个游戏，又看了一遍视频，然而发现就连up主都因为视频没人看而消失了。
突然迷上了这里的bgm，但是可能太小众了，无论如何也搜不到。
这成了我最大的遗憾，我以为我和这部游戏就到此为止了。
直到几天前有人问我这部游戏好不好玩，突然勾起了我的回忆。
我觉得能再看到这部作品，甚至买到DLC，可能是我近半年来最幸运的一件事了。
现在看来，这部作品并不像当初想的那样完美，立绘略简单，除了我老婆（Hanser)以外的声优不太入戏，就连我老婆也有些瑕疵，但是这依然是一部好作品，无论是情感的刻画，还是内容的铺垫都是亮点。
最大的缺点就是太短了，也没有续集，不能形成一个完美的世界观构架。
我决定花钱支持一下作者，希望作者能有这个系列更好的作品问世（希望男女主还是兄妹）。

25994022.review:
今天突然在steam首页看到了这部游戏，再加上之前票圈里惨淡到几乎被人忽视的安利，所以冲动了一秒，下载了这部游戏。

原本以为故事会叙述很长，和很多很多日式游戏一般，大段的文字叙事，大段的情绪描绘，以及大段的日常对话，《PRICE》的流程精简到我通关之后简直难以置信——“这就完了？”——感觉还有很多很多背后的故事可以叙说，还有很多很多的悲伤被浸泡在浓厚的血液之中，[spoiler] 死神和魔术师的背后一定掩藏着更为黑暗的交易[/spoiler]。塔罗牌只讲述了四张的故事，幸好看到SweeTnT大佬的文章，这部作品还有其他系列，简直松了一口气。[spoiler] 故事不说完什么的强迫症要死的啊喂！！！[/spoiler]

《PRICE》对于全成就党非常友好，只要通关了就可以拿到全部成就，像我这种文字阅读强迫症患者根本不会错过开头的教程指导【因为看见另外几个评论的以及隔壁群的大佬都在操作和解谜过程中卡关啊什么的】。游戏本体为免费，幸好还有原声以及设定集DLC付费让我没有一种“我在免费玩一个挺不错的游戏”的负罪感。

《PRICE》以男主艾弗里的角度展开剧情。高贵清秀的小少爷从噩梦之中醒来，对着早就不转动的时钟，已然失去了对于时间的判断。他四处找不到自己的妹妹艾娃，只找到了和妹妹一样的人偶。这便是游戏的第一章《E.C.I.R.P》。主角能够从房间的各处细节中得到妹妹的回忆——“嗯，是这样的。”——但是自己的记忆中似乎并不存在这些，窗外一闪而过的影子、花朵在火焰中煎熬、死和生的壁炉雕饰让他恐慌，但是那只黑白的猫却让他安心了下来。从猫那里拿到钥匙之后便进入了第二章《P.R.I.C.E》。接下来会涉及剧透www大佬们可以通关之后再看或者现在就看然后打死我[spoiler]【(｡･∀･)ﾉﾞ反正打不到】[/spoiler]。

通关之后，我一如既往开起脑洞，有了如下的疑问：

[list]
[*]安魂曲贯穿全文，一张乐谱慢慢拼凑起来，慢慢解锁声部，结局通关的时候是死神的《真·安魂曲》，我真的很想知道，主角的父亲是什么人，能够留下这样一部安魂曲，或者说，父亲是这一切的主导者？
[*]“[i]禁术的代价是艾娃的灵魂与生命，但是这个代价只有在哥哥得知真相以后才会触发。触发以后，被禁术所救的人也无法继续活着。[/i]”那张被火焰焚烧的花的手绘，是暗指艾娃已经身处地狱了吗？但是明明那个时候，她还没有付出代价啊。如果要让哥哥不知道真相，那么和往常一样地生活下去便好了，为什么要躲在窗外偷偷地看哥哥，为什么要假装自己已经死亡？难道和人偶一样，眼睛被挖掉了，不愿再见到哥哥？或者是已经看不见了[spoiler]【已断头】[/spoiler]？
[*]身份实际上为死神的猫，为什么会被锁在柜子里？房间的钥匙为什么会在猫那里？
[*]主角在OP和过场动画之中，旁边都有一群灰白色的影子，那些又是什么人？明明这个故事里面没有更多的人了啊……
[*]主角第二次梦醒之后，为什么房间的场景变得血腥而悲凉？说是梦境，如果这全是梦就好了……为什么场景变了？中间又发生了些什么？妹妹的头颅掉落，诡异到让人心疼。如果按照寂静岭的表世界里世界来说，先前的是里世界，是主角记忆当中的，而第二章《P.R.I.C.E》才是表世界，是这个世界真实的样子，那么塔罗牌道具是如何从里世界传递到表世界的？[spoiler]【寂静岭的好像是手电筒？我还不敢看来着qwq】[/spoiler]或者说，哥哥从未复苏过，而他只是徘徊于LIMBO之中？
[*]哥哥明明是一个钢琴演奏者，为什么他的玩偶拿着管弦？[spoiler]【我不太清楚是竖笛还是英国管】[/spoiler]
[*]结局的时候，哥哥的躯壳已经腐朽，隽秀的容颜还依稀可辨，怀中抱着妹妹的头骨。哥哥怎么拿到妹妹的头骨的？？
[*]魔术师从未露面，但是无疑已是大BOSS系列。身份是死神的那只喵，既然是你促使了这一结局[spoiler]【虽然这个结局无论如何都不可能走到Happy Ending的】[/spoiler]，为什么会唏嘘感叹呢？
[/list]

这是两个倔强到让人心疼的孩子的故事。

凡事都是有代价的，正如游戏的标题一般。妹妹交出了性命和灵魂，交换了所谓的永恒，但是两个人自此再无交集。一人在地狱中经受着红莲业火的煎熬，另外一人成为飘无所依的游魂，或许便成为了魔术师的收藏品罢。

由此得到的人生哲理[spoiler]【小学生观后感作文套路】[/spoiler]：
[list]
[*][spoiler]做交易订契约签条款！！你TM的看清楚内容！！别一听结果就说“我签”“我签”！！！[/spoiler]
[*][spoiler]跟你make a deal的人越是和蔼可亲平易近人！！越TM的不能信！！！[/spoiler]
[*][spoiler]果然理智的人生无懈可击www[/spoiler]
[/list]

总结：我是一个并没有买设定集的穷人，以上皆为自己闲扯www如果相信了，说明我的胡编乱造能力又提升了hhhhhhhhhh

The game/story is broken down into 2 chapters. The ECRIP and PRICE. First chapter is kinda fast paced for setting the mood of the game while the Second chapter is a bit slower but still manages to hang onto that mood until the end.

Personal Note:
I would have loved to see more in depth story about the two siblings. The little tid bits here and there in both chapters were small in really giving you feel for how these two loved each other so much.

从独立游戏的角度出发，这个游戏已经算是很良心的了。
· 短剧情 · CV质量参差不齐 · 立绘普通 · 解谜向

有几个套路吓人的地方，其它还好（jump scare的话有一处大概算，不过不能剧透）

最后一句话：游戏值得入手，社团持续关注。

从游戏性上说，这只是一个游戏时长只有一到两个小时的游戏，但是解密以及气氛都做得不错，不算太难，也有一定的趣味性，线索合成能够让玩家更好的体会游戏剧情。

25929279.review:
[h1]Маленький шедевр...[/h1]
Сразу же нас встречает психоделичный опенинг, а после этого анимешно-викторианская стилистика рисовки. Геймплей в целом прост, квест с пиксель-хантингом. Даже пришлось поднапрячь логику для решения пары головоломок.

Сюжет мал, но интересен...до конца не было ясно, что же происходит....ибо скудные на информацию намеки рисовали разные пути развития. Но это очень трогательная история, вдохновленная сказанием о русалке и "любовью близнецов".

Отдельно стоит упомянуть ОСТ...он шикарен, можно просто слушать и слушать!

[h1]Итог:[/h1] Уделите игре время, она отнимет у Вас лишь час, но может подарить интересный букет впечатлений. Причем бесплатно.

25926497.review: 游戏挺短的，但值得一玩！

25924999.review:
流程很短，1.1小时全破。游戏的音乐和原画是加分项。

但游戏的脚本比较单薄，不能很好地把各个元素串联起来融为一体，有些生硬。角色配音功力不够，没能驾驭好角色的感情，个人认为这和脚本也是有一定关系的，过低的文本量难以塑造足够立体的人物，也就更难从配音层面表现。游戏部分动画也显得比较生硬，比如树叶落下和Iva头落下的部分。游戏引擎方面也造成了一系列问题，比如steam界面打不开，F12截图失败。游戏操作比较麻烦，主要体现在两个控制左右方向的按钮上，切换道具如果能够用鼠标滚轮进行操作应该会更好，画面的卷动如果能跟随鼠标的位置或者跟随人物也能更流畅，减少操作对游戏内容的割裂。

可以看出制作组还不是很成熟。虽然游戏本体免费，但是的确很难说这款游戏做得足够好。作为一个免费游戏，游戏评论好评如潮不能说明太多。还是希望制作组再接再厉，多多提高一下自身的制作水平。

相较于[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/434680/]Lamia's Game Room[/url]，一样作为华人游戏自带祖国buff，一样有各种各样的问题，至少Lamia在讲故事的水平上是要高出PRICE不少的，这点PRICE还不够。

[b] 总评6/10。[/b]

25899158.review:
Должен сказать, что данная игра произвела на меня сильное впечатление!
Жутковатая, местами пугающая, но в большей степени печальная история брата и сестры, которые волею судьбы оказались сиротами в достаточно юном возрасте, но то было лишь началом большой беды...

Если решите обратить внимание на сей бесплатный Point and Click проект от YETU GAME, то я настоятельно рекомендую "освоить" сюжет, а не "бежать галопом" по гайду только ради ачивок, не поленитесь потратить час-два на самостоятельный поиск вещей и комбинирование найденных улик (даже отсылка к произведению "Русалочка" Г.Х. Андерсена тут неспроста).
Помимо запутанного сюжета отмечу прекрасный вступительный ролик с динамичным, цепляющим OSTом, рисовку героев и комнат, стандартное/удобное управление для игр такого жанра, озвучку и, пожалуй, мораль:

Никогда не заключайте сделок с подозрительными личностями, иначе, рано или поздно, обязательно заплатите свою P R I C E самым дорогим, что у Вас есть, а бездумно подписав договор, осознаете - Please Remember, I Can`t Escape.

25899067.review:
It's was alright and pretty creepy at times but my main gripe was that alot of essential cutscenes are missing from the english version. Just finished the game and I had no idea what was even happening the whole time. I had to look up on the forums just to figure out what the storyline was. Another problem with this is that some of the puzzles are meant to be solved by using the cutscenes as clues. So yeah, pretty essential to the gameplay...

3/5

EDIT:: The developer has contacted me and let me know the problem with the cutscenes has been fixed. I've updated my review from a 2/5 to a 3/5.

Has plenty of issues but, hey, it's free.

For anyone confused about the storyline;
[spoiler]Ivry and Iva had always been together after their father's death. Ivry adored his sister and Iva admired her brother. 

Unfortunately Ivry got sick and was dying. 

Iva kept hoping there was a way to save her brother and then the magician appeared. He couldnt revive dead people nor bind the soul to a puppet as long as the person was still alive. Which is why Iva recieved a magic dagger and had to stab Ivry. Which made it possible for the dollmaker to bind his soul to a puppet in order to live with Iva forever.

However if Ivry finds out the truth then the dream world in which they both lived in will disappear and Iva has to give her soul/life and end up in hell.

In the 1st part the siblings lived a normal life. While Ivry slowly started to realize that something was off, (since the Iva would burn incense in order to make him think everything was fine.) At the end of part 1 Ivry wakes up with Iva in his room and you get start to see how the PRICE mark is starting to appear on her neck since Ivry's realized that something's off.

In the 2nd part Ivry starts to realize that he doesnt remember certain things from the past. He then finds out that he was sick and that he had been killed eventually by Iva. Which is where the game ends, when Iva appears after him realizing that he's a puppet. Because of this Iva has to pay with her life and ends up in hell while Ivry becomes a spirit. In the end, the doll maker is there to collect the Ivry puppet while also giving us players the impression that this isnt the 1st time that he's revived someone through a puppet. [/spoiler]

25876983.review:
"Price" is a point-and-click puzzle game with an anime inspired style. With eerie music to set the stage, it becomes apparent there is something the protagonist, Ivry,  is missing. The puzzles are varily easy, with a few being difficult. The mystery unfolds as each puzzle is solved. As you learn what has happened, everything seemingly wraps up, not staying longer than it needs to be. 

The only negative is that some cutscenes can be missing depending if your codecs is updated as a puzzle requires you to them (but you can find missing cutscenes in the discussion forums), and the English translation can be a little awkward at times, but nothing major.

Overall, give this a try. With Price being free, this eerie point-and-click game deserves a chance.

PRICE es un juego bastante interesante para aquellos que les guste las escape room, ya que el juego es basicamente eso, dos escape room.

Tambien hay que decir que en alguna parte puedes quedarte atascado, pero aqui en steam hay una guia bien montada para que puedas desatascarte sin spoilers :)

25855545.review:
本作是天朝夜兔工作室的作品（有中文，需下载后手动选语言），算是略带恐怖元素的flash密室逃脱。话说这个工作室在国产乙女游戏圈似乎小有名气，最近的作品是《尘沙惑》，一个“明明都是典型乙女向角色非得说是和尚还要和他们谈恋爱”的AVG……好吧，立绘还是可以选择是否光头的。

说回游戏本身，本作除去价格因素可以给到7~7.5/10，非常良心。价格方面，游戏本体免费，美术和原声分别是19和17软妹币，喜欢的可以支持下；不过由于不到9刀的原因本作即使买了全部DLC也不掉卡（这点制作组在公告栏里有说明），卡只能通过宝石合成，敬请注意。

画面：8/10。画面整体走哥特路线，质量非常不错，画师很有功力，没有立绘与CG中常见的走形问题。由于题材原因，本作画面有血腥惊悚成分，不知道英文版是否和谐过，个人感觉年龄定级应该在17+左右比较合适。
音乐与配音：7.5-0.5/10。游戏只有一首BGM，不难听，但深更半夜有点吓人……而且这种高音较多的BGM听时间长了之后很容易烦躁。配音还好，虽然有点板读但不至于烦，个人感觉还可以。
解谜：6/10。本作解谜基本没有难度，除了部分位置互动点设置不合理（几个互动点放在一起，大部分玩家无法判断）外没什么难度。游戏中解谜分为物品和线索两类，但实际解谜中线索的剧情意义远大于解谜意义，这点可能还需要向寻物游戏学习下。
剧情：不打分。本作剧情分为两部分，二周目的PRICE篇是一周目的后续，完整通关大约1h。由于故事本身有虚构成分，世界观与人设相对简单，外加个人对这类型的故事不太感冒的缘故，剧情不做评价。剧情分析评测里和微博上都有，喜欢的可以自行寻找下，说实话，还挺德国骨科的。

总的来说，本作是不错的密室逃脱AVG，适合喜欢这种风格的玩家。攻略请戳下方链接（喜欢麻烦点个赞=w=）：
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=772879322

25855009.review:
PRICE uses puzzle and adventure game mechanics to piece together a short story that doesn’t outstay its welcome. This is split into piecing together memories and using items on objects. This short free to play game excels in its gothic, creepy and ominous feel through the artwork, sound and story. You know that that something isn’t quite right….

The artwork is good with an anime influence that looks more handrawn or classically styled. I suggest you take your time with all the information you are given to put together this compelling story. The music and sound is also a very notable The opening theme tune for the game is very catchy and the haunting singing, classical sounding pieces and appropriate sound effects are fitting choices.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=774536854

Some of this playtime is from being away. I also personally experienced technical issues with this game. I encountered scripting errors, freezing and black screens but I felt that this game was worth completing. After another install I finally managed played the whole game through with no issues.

After completing this I felt that that some of this game might be obtuse for players who aren’t so familiar with adventure/puzzle mechanics and thinking. I checked the hub and there is guides available if you are stuck.Despite my two issues this is a great, quality free to play game. All the achievements are straight forward if you just play through the whole game naturally and complete it.

这是一款非常不错的国产AVG游戏，而且还是免费。
不得不说这款游戏真的做的还是很精良的。
单单那个开场动画就已经震撼到我了，我玩过很多国产的文字AVG，这个开头算是

做的非常好的了。
之后是音乐，第一章刚开始放的那段BGM真的是有吓到我，因为突然出来还以为要

闪图之类的呢，不过BGM真的有些大声了，希望这个也可以改善一下。
游戏的画风也是非常精良，不管是人物的绘制还是场景的，都很棒。
不过有个扣分项，那就是CV，感觉读起来还是太生硬了，虽然知道这是小制作，但

还是希望做的好一些，还有配音的音效，感觉是在用一个很渣的麦然后在一个小房

间里录得，有点喷麦的感觉，这是我觉得最不足的一点。
里面的解谜难度，不算很难，只要动动脑筋，这游戏的解密没有太多的套路，更多

的是想衬托剧情。（实在不会可以百度攻略）
然后就是重要的剧情了，这个游戏用了这个游戏独特的找线索，合成线索特点来阐

述这个游戏剧情，剧情有些小虐心。
最后是结局，结局很凄美。至于是什么，我也不多剧透了。
喜欢的朋友们可以玩玩，要是真的很喜欢的话，可以买一下DLC，算是支持一下我

们的国产游戏。（反正我是买了）。
对了，提醒一下，这游戏是有两章的，不要玩了第一章就以为没了，错过了真结局

。

终上所述，我给出的分数是8.5分

25834454.review:
首先这是一个免费游戏，流程大概在一个半小时内。
结局很黑，我想寄刀片，通关完1，2章节后就可以去看评论区大佬们的解析。
画面5/5，对于一个免费解密游戏来说，只要画面符合主题的风格就很好了。
BGM4/5,游戏途中全程只有一首曲子...可能会很压抑。会随着剧情进展变化，依旧很符合主题。
游戏性4/5，解密游戏也不会有太多游戏性吧....解密元素恰到好处，不会太难，比较简单。
通关完毕后可以全成就，最后一个成就介绍是I`AM ANGRY,这是最吼的。
个人小评：值得一玩，流程简短，不仅免费，还能全成就装X，何乐而不为？

25822495.review:
[h1]剧情：[/h1]
流程不长，也没有什么深度，不过考虑到游戏内容是以耗费脑力的解谜为主，我想这样简单又容易理解的剧情其实是比较适合的。
我打完两周目还有不少不懂的地方，可能设定有写，不过我还没买

[h1]谜题：[/h1]
也许是因为魔幻题材的缘故，个人认为部分谜题逻辑性不强，缺少必然联系。
[i]举个例子：电脑锁定了，需要输入密码，壁纸是基友拉裤链，请问密码是什么？答案是006，因为源氏大招持续6秒。[/i]
大概是这样的感觉
我认为其他的部分都不算难，一顿瞎点能解决很多问题

[h1]音乐&配音[/h1]
背景音乐不算我喜欢的类型，不过很符合游戏的气氛。
国配我也听得不多，感觉男主偶尔有棒读的感觉，大体上都不错

PS：游戏实际上并不恐怖，没有尖啸、没有扑脸、没有闪现、没有陷阱、没有死亡，还是上帝视角，只能说是气氛比较诡异，轻度猎奇
