第一次写评论有点小紧脏XD
感觉这游戏是自己玩过的恐怖解谜游戏中最精致最细心的了！！！
游戏的主要操作就是点点点点点，谜题的难度也刚刚好，少部分有点烧脑但是总的来讲还是很棒的！！
画风细腻得完全超出了免费游戏的范围，而且有十场以上的动画！没有一帧是崩掉的！画师大大我要表白！
cv们都是在ACG界很有名的大大！！hanser的软妹音直戳我小心肝！！！（捂心）
原创的BGM简直美炸！！！就好像其他玩家说的，听一天都不会！！！觉！得！烦！！反而！超级！洗脑！！
这么良心的游戏不玩简直对不起制作组的诚意！！！虽然是短篇！但是感觉制作组肯定花了很多时间，才能这样把每一个细节做得完美无缺！！
毕竟免费游戏多了去了，但是像PRICE这样不弃坑不烂尾的却很少。。。
剧情也是蛮深入人心的，个人很喜欢合并线索这个设定XD，强迫症一本满♀足
唯一比较可惜的就是结局比较虐，虽然艾娃也算是。。。实现她的愿望了。。。QWQ但是还是好心疼他们俩啊。。。
嘛恐怖游戏大多数不都是BE吗。。。。QAQ
最后还是要感谢作者大大以及制作组！！谢谢你们能做出这么好玩的游戏！！
今后也要一起努力哟！！
（比heart❤）

25816596.review:
[h1] A Short Review for P.R.I.C.E [/h1]

This is such an amazing puzzle, horror game! Despite that it is short, I literally spent a few hours just to solve all the puzzles in the game. No kidding. I hope there is a sequel or maybe another of this type. The catchy opening theme song is still stuck in my head.  

[list]
   [*]Story - 10/10 (I wonder myself what the game is really about until I got to finish it. It's short but amazing)
   [*]Characters - 8/10 (Not much said about Ivry and Iva but it is interesting to know that these two characters share a great sibling bond. The clues you find in-game gives you a story background of their relationship)
   [*]Graphics - 10/10 (The art is fantastic. It's perfect!)
   [*]Gameplay- 10/10 (Good game mechanics and puzzles are quite a challenge but solvable)
   [*]Atmosphere - 8/10 (It's creepy!)
   [*]Audio - 10/10 (What can I say? The opening theme song is great! The music and sound effects are beyond awesome!)
[/list]

I definitely recommend this!

25814897.review:
超短篇。人设很赞，男主我要了，其他你们分~

-----------------------------

认真说一点。游戏做的十分精致，但是在精致里却处处有点粗糙。比如看画时候，画框是模糊的。再比如，对于故事的推进，基本都是通过一段插入的视频这样的手法。插入视频没有问题，但是多了，就会让人感觉很剧情仓促。这也是这款游戏最大的问题，也是我觉得最最最遗憾的地方。不可否认的是，这款游戏绝对是用了心去做了。而对于同人社团来说，PRICE已经很棒很出色了。人设、音乐，还有解谜元素都非常棒。但是，篇幅过短、结局仓促都是不容忽视的缺陷。如果可以的话，希望夜兔的dalao们能重置PRICE，多多丰富故事情节（比如把背景丰富下？）。真心喜欢PRICE，希望夜兔能做出更多这么精致的游戏。

25794499.review:
首先画风和背景音乐点赞啊。不过背景音乐确实稍微大了点，盖过了人物声音。
我最开始玩第一关的时候真的有点吓到了，因为我本来就怕惊悚类的电视或者游戏，但是我还是坚持下来了。
离线时玩通了第一关，昨天看了点剧透图，画风真的赞赞哒！！！剧情也不错。
第一关的结局真的很美好，通话的结局就跟第一关结局说的就该这样：
兄妹2人永远幸福的生活在一起。但是从第一个结局来说我们都可以猜到第二关可能会是残忍的结局，游戏名也叫作代价，第一关复活一词就能看出代价不是那么简单的，很吸引人继续玩下去。

但是我感觉第二个结局更真实，可是这个真·结局真的很虐。关于线索整合，有的看不出来联系，只有乱点，感觉游戏里面还是有提示的，比如第一关燃烧的花，密码就是花瓣烤了之后才出现的；第二关那个对称秘密也是提示。
第二关的4张卡片拼接我拼凑了半天都不对/(ㄒoㄒ)/~~，后来终于对了才出发剧情。
看到最后真的觉得好虐。集体给作者寄刀片！！！
成就已经全部解锁！欧耶！

总的来说，剧情有点短了倒是真的，不过整体真的是个非常不错的游戏！作者加油。
推荐啊！！

25794495.review: 提醒那些说强行结局的人，这游戏有二周目

25794104.review:
画风、设定、台词以及剧情，整个游戏都洋溢着青涩的日轻气息——可以的，这很日呆。不算特别精致，但绝对能体会到满满的用心。（还是免费的，难道不该来玩玩玩么）

流程较短，以至于剧情无法饱满的展开，信息的展开缺少了一些铺垫，使得整个故事太易引发懵逼，而且感情渲染也不是特别给力——作为一个初通全程并没有反应过来真相，看到某人头落地时都还以为是Happy Ending的人，如上控诉着。

然而，一个日呆的故事以avg的形式展现很是有趣，二周目剧情颠覆前半部分的设定也相当出色。剧情开始前哥哥看见的迷之涂鸦级蝴蝶让人流连往返，当下抛去查看这游戏的表情里有没有它们（并没有，叹气），而优雅的背影君也让人遐想连绵。最令人惊叹的，则是通关后得知配乐和剧情主旨的关系，当下重新下载又听了一遍（原谅我……第一遍时嫌音乐太吵把它关了）。

至于互控的哥哥妹妹什么的……请记住，秀恩爱，死的快，no zuo so you not die！╮(‵▽′)╭

25742928.review:
A really great game with an unique art style, good gameplay and a great storyline that is almost like a dark fairytale. I was really impressed how well done the graphics and the cutscences were, especially  because this game is for free. 
With only an hour or two of gameplay, this game is really short but it knows how to tell a good and closed story with the right amount of mystery and a little bit of creppiness. 
The puzzles were fine as well, not that easy and not too difficult, so you can enjoy the story without checking a guide every second ;). 
Furthermore, I really like the flow of the story, how the mystery is building and how the character learns the truth bit for bit. This small adventure has also a sad (and a little bit creppy) but beautiful soundtrack, I loved how perfect it matched with the atmosphere and the storyline.
So if you like a little puzzle-game with a creppy but moreover really great presented story (the visuals are more than fantastic), give it a shot, you definitely won't regret it. 

Hope to see more games like this from the developers, and I wouldn't mind to pay for this quality :).

25739630.review:
Vale, he acabado el juego por fin.

Sinceramente, es un juego bastante oscuro y bien pensado. Hay algunos detalles a la hora de investigar que se pasan un poco con la lógica a seguir, pero en general esta muy bien.

La banda sonora es sorprendentemente buena, y el detalle de que dentro del propio juego la BGM va añadiendo más instrumentos a medida que avanzas da una sensación de "Oh, se acerca el final" muy conseguida.

En cuanto a los gráficos del juego, consigue lo que se propone. Una ambientación oscura, pero con personajes bonitos de ver, y algun que otro sobresalto. Efectos gráficos quizas mejorables, pero no le pongo mucha importancia.

La historia... ¿Que decir sin spoilear nada? Llevas a un chico rubio que despierta en la habitación de su hermana, y no sabes que haces ahí. La puerta está cerrada. Sal. Poco a poco la trama va adquiriendo profundidad.

En resumen, si sabes inglés y te gustan los juegos de puzles, este es tu juego. Y es gratis ^^

25736554.review:
总的来说，是一部游玩后能有一定印象的作品。
良心：
1.	BGM点赞，阴郁疑窦甚至有些怪诞的旋律渲染效果很棒，代入感强（听了一个多小时好洗脑）；
2.	合成线索的模式很有趣，如果基础线索可以反复使用，和其他不同线索再合成出新线索可能会更有意思；
3.	个人很喜欢男主画风啊；
不足：
1.	男主的cv还是有些生硬，听得出想要表达出惊愕、疑惑的情感，但是有时候有些跳戏啊；
2.	操作有些繁琐，特别是取放塔罗牌的时候，进入-点击-退出-换牌-点击。可能是我没有找到更简便的方法；
3.	剧情有点短，就两个房间的探索解谜，剧情有些单薄，回忆杀比较零碎，期待更长的故事线。

总之作为国内的独立开发作品，免费上架，真的挺良心，有点暗黑童话风格的主题也很能抓住眼睛，丰富了对国内市面上解谜游戏的感知，期待作者日后的新作。

25734531.review:
Dunno, it could've been a pretty decent, [i]almost faultless[/i], hour-long diversion, if it wasn't for two moments that completely confused and annoyed the hell out of me, and a few control hiccups.

It's a pretty standard point 'n click, and most of the puzzles weren't along the crypticness of King's Quest V's pie, and a few were actually pretty clever, so that's good.  There were a lot of weirdness with the controls, a lack of polish, but nothing game breaking.  Art was also nice, and while there were some horror elements, there was nothing truly "shocking".

What I didn't like though, were this couple of puzzles that I just couldn't do, and both were close to the end.

Without spoiling, upon putting an item at some point, Ivry would say "What's up there?", even though there was nothing "up there", not even above the object in question, I was confused and I seriously thought if there was some weird Engrish that prevented me from solving it.  It didn't helped that that item led me to think for a long time that it would've been a connect the dots game, which it wasn't, and there was another item with a hint that was for something that you couldn't interact with until later, so I thought the two were connected, but that's still not the case.  So I had to look it up...

Oh well, I might've been an idiot here, or at least thinking too far, but the very last puzzle really stumped me, there was no way for me to solve this, because apparently [u][b]2 cutscenes that would clue me in weren't in the game, as of late[/b][/u].  That was really douchey here, I had to look at a guide again, which of course didn't pleased me.

Still though, if you could manage to find out what these two puzzles I mentionned are, I guess you would spend a less miserable time going in circles around the room like I did.  It was a nice session, despite all that.

25715900.review:
Neutral:

I found it very confusing. IT's a free game. You get a decent menu and all that. You start the game and you get a wonderful animation cutscene. Then you have the game. You can't move around. You click on everything you get an icon for. The icon is a bit confusing at times since its hard to tell if there is more than 1 item to click on since the click boxes are so close together. Then you spend some time figuring out how the game actually works....how to combine items...how to use items in your inventory. Once you figure that out you'll probably solve 10 more little things and then you some ingame dialogue and cutscene and the game is over......

Why.....would they make all the title screens and options menu and the lovely opening cutscenes and all the other nice things if the game is literally 1 room!?!! WHy is there a save/load feature with like 6 or more slots in it?!?!? So confused.


Also the game crashed first time and I had to restart...you cant skip the opening animation cutscene i l earned (boohoo). Also when it crashed I had to kill steam to get it to close properly.....then go back into steam and reopen it. Also after completing the game I had to once again close it by closing steam....which involves using ctrl alt delete and manually stopping steam since steam won't close when a game is running and the game can't be stopped (ime anyways).

Overall: putting the bugs and lack of english text in places and the crashes and inability to close the game......putting ALL THAT ASIDE the game got alot of love from  its creators it seems and it shows. Hopefully this is a promotion for their future games (I doubt this game is gonna get a sequel even though it definitely could have used one).

I don't even know if this is really a full game given how short it is and how it ends just as soon as it begins. I literally thought the first room was just the start, an introduction, and the rest of the game would be another 2-3 rooms and cutscenes. Nope....just 1 room though. I mean I had leftover items in my inventory i didnt even combine/use and the game just ends....so confusing.

 It seems like an extremely very well done school assignment. I would play it again. I'd seriously consider buying it if it offered enough content for the right price. I hope they make more 'longer' games. It's a nice little game to play over a cup of tea or whatever....im just amazed they ended it so suddenly. also when the game ended it just went black and i had to fidget alot to get it to go back to the opening menu...and like i said it wouldnt' close properly from there so more fidgeting.

25707332.review:
A nice little puzzle game with a disturbing hint to it. It does horror in more of a classical sense, avoiding jumpscares almost entirely (there is one, but it's not that bad) and instead builds an atmosphere of tension. You can tell something is wrong, but you don't quite know what. By solving the puzzles you slowly learn what happened and piece it together yourself, leading to a fairly satisfying conclusion. The puzzles are logical for the most part, although the fact that objects have multiple points of interaction makes it sometimes difficult to tell if you've done everything there is to do. The first part is a little rough because of this, but the second part avoids this issue almost entirely.

The game has one track that plays on repeat, but it doesn't bother me that much because it's a nice tune (reminds me of Lilium from Elfen Lied) and the game is only about an hour long if you take your time, so you won't hear it for overlong.

[strike]As others have mentioned, there appear to be some video codec issues with the game so if you play the English version of the game you miss out on almost all the cutscenes. Thankfully one of the Chinese community members was kind enough to upload the videos to Youtube, so you don't miss out on those.[/strike]

EDIT: The codec issues have been fixed now, and the game can be fully enjoyed as it was intended to be.

25687569.review:
[h1]简评[/h1]
[code]国产AVG游戏，很有sound horizon感觉的暗黑童话解谜游戏，有一点惊悚和恐怖要素，人物立绘很漂亮，音乐也不错。而且故事设计也挺巧妙的。流程很短，解谜不看攻略有一点难度，建议有机会玩玩看，值得一试。期待新作，如果登陆steam一定支持[/code]

[h1]亮点[/h1]
[list]
[*]不要以为通关一次就是真的通关了，自己玩玩看就会知道其中的精妙
[/list]

[h1]优点[/h1]
[list]
[*]立绘很精致，也很符合游戏这种略带恐怖和诡异的哥特风格（大概？）
[*]女主和猫的CV很棒，特别是那只恶魔猫，完全匹配！
[/list]

[h1]缺点[/h1]
[list]
[*]相比其他人，男主的CV显得逊色不少，有不少地方有捧读感
[*]解谜有一定难度，而且线索间没有太直接的提示，有时候卡住的时候就只能到处点
[*]流程很短
[/list]

[h1]As the majority of the others, yes, this game is great, and I'd recommend it.[h1/]
The game has nice art, nice music, it's all good.  
Although that the game is pretty hard to beat, but it's a rather short game on the other hand.

[b]I've seen people finding the ending lackluster, and I can see the reason as to why.  [I]Infact, I know why.[/b][/I]
The original translations of the game actually have more cutscenes than our english translation version on steam, which actually adds quite the story and explains a lot as well.

It's quite a problem for those who want to actually understand the story better, as that our current english version looks like a cheese with holes.  

On and all, I just hope people who made this game actually notices this issue, and I hope that it'll be fixed soon.  For the sake of the enjoyment of the english players.

25677893.review:
PRICE to wbrew pozorom gra darmowa - twórcy dali nam tutaj ciekawy, bajkowo-koszmarny klimat oraz interesującą oprawę audiowizualną. Ale chociaż ta gra nie ma ceny, to jednak nie jest bezcenna, bo PRICE zawodzi na poziomie interfejsu i mechaniki rozgrywki, odbierając nam po prostu chęć do grania.

Plusy:

+ piękna, rysowana grafika w stylu japońskim
+ dość klimatyczna muzyka
+ całkiem niezłe muzycznie agresywne intro
+ fajne sugestie ukryte w grze
+ gra jest za darmo

Minusy:

- niewygodny interfejs 
- interakcja z przedmiotami jest wyjątkowo nieintuicyjna
- mało czytelna czcionka w menu
- ubogie opcje ustawień w menu
- blokada na 30 fps
- brak głosu głównej bohaterki
- gra jest dość krótka
- wprowadzenie fabularne jest dość niewystarczające
- w PRICE łatwo można się zaciąć 

Podsumowanie: 

Jednym zdaniem:  PRICE mogę polecić graczom, którzy lubią łamigówki i bajkowo-koszmarne klimaty. Także tym, którzy lubią komiksy i azjatycką wizualność. Odradzam natomiast tym graczom, którzy szukają gry przygodowej, w której można skupić się na fabule oraz tym którzy szukają gier z dobrze dopracowaną mechaniką rozgrywki. Bo PRICE taka nie jest - pewnie dlatego, że jest za darmo i zabrakło funduszy na jej porządne zrobienie.

Rada: 

PRICE nie ma ceny - więc śmiało, sprawdźcie sobie tę grę, gdyż pomimo mojej oceny nie jest to produkcja zła, jedynie irytująco niedopracowana. Ale może przymknięcie na to oko, biorąc pod wuagę, że ta gra jednak jest za darmo. Może akurat Wam przypasuje.

This game was plagued by translation errors, and if I understand the walkthrough correctly a lot of the in-game cutscenes never played. Consequently, I feel like I barely understood the story. 

The item-and-idea combination system was awkward to use and no instructions were given for the game's interface. 

It's a shame, because the production values behind this (free) game are excellent. But I cannot recommend a product that did not give me any satisfaction.

25676703.review:
Originally when I found this game I was browing the steam store in one of those dazes where one is bored and none of the owned games were really tempting.  That's when I found this (though I installed it then didn't touch it for a week). 

Initially when I started playing it I had very low expectations and wasn't even sure if I wanted to get "into" it but what REALLY caught my attention was the opening, which in turn made me keep play it instead of giving into my assumptions. I adored the art work throughout the entirety of the game and the music was to die for (literally?). Then the story came, oh boy did it come with a bittersweet taste. Without spoiling it I will say it started out rather optimistic I think. Of course you get the feeling that something is wrong you still have a little hope to find what you're looking for, but then it hits you. Once it does the story gets progressively darker until the very end until you see what really happened. That's when the anger hits! 

There were some technical difficulties (only one or two) so definitely mega WORTH to play the game. Also, who doesn't love a good puzzle game? So why not try it? It's free and there's two "chapters". Give it a whirl! 10/10 have made friends play.

25676412.review: I'm not much of a puzzle game person myself(mainly because I suck at them), but this game was amazing. 25666946.review:
体验非常差。解谜部分只能按照预定的层次走，艾娃衣柜那里，必须要先拿到二层抽屉里的安魂曲这个无关道具才能打开衣橱遇见黑猫。我跟你讲我这个表情（哦）。
组合系统，放在其他内容上估计还算有趣，但是本作中基本上就是在看一个脑洞少年的脑洞到底有多大，玩家比他想得多了没用，他想不到就是想不到。要不是本作元素足够少，排列组合一下怎么都出来了，我相信绝大部分玩家玩到一半都要摔鼠标。
音乐本身不错，但是跟整体环境不搭，非常不搭。关了游戏我只能记得这一首BGM是个带跳楼机的摩天轮，过一会吵吵一次过一会吵吵一次。游戏BGM本身如其名背景音乐，应该给玩家提供的是沉浸感，而不是“又来了”“你仿佛想吓唬我”这种对抗感。或许制作者本意是要告诉我们平常的环境中存在恐怖的危机，但是确实是没做到家。
配音负分。收起以前做日配和现在做国配的翻译腔，不论本作是解谜作品还是恐怖作品，嗲嗲的翻译腔都和游戏定位不搭。
界面……也是因为小品吧，没怎么上心。进游戏第一眼我没找到拉卷轴的按钮（左右下角），试着用上下左右，发现所有调查元素都可以通过左右定位……而且窗口化情况下会定位到画面外的元素……我找了好几次鼠标都找得有点烦躁了……

国产游戏啦w支持支持。
其实总体来说感觉还不错，但是有些细节，还是没有注意到。
从贴吧上看到很多人没有看到片头的问题，这个我是没有遇到啦0 0我觉得主要的问题是，遇到文字的时候，没有日志之类的东西，也就是说，如果手滑按快了，也没有办法看到之前说了什么。另外物品选择的操作上显得十分繁琐，因为要播放过度动画，同时又要重复选择选项，还有就是，地图上每选一个选项，主人公都要挂个几秒钟走过去。个人觉得其实这个走路的动作显得有点违和，可能用渐隐渐现表达效果会更好。另外，关于第一周目结束的时候，中间一个男子抱着一个萝莉的对话，感觉十分突兀，一下子没懂。
唉嘛，不过一款超级短篇的解谜游戏啦，也不会特别注重游戏操作方面，关键还是故事剧情和解密要素。个人觉得，通过线索和合成出发剧情的方法，表现形式还是蛮不错的。

25652898.review:
Price is a short point and click  game experience with horror mystery elements. I completete the game in just under 2 hours.

Pros: 
- Great sounding music
- Beautiful artwork
- Atmosphere is consitantly creepy and makes great use of the uncanny valley.
- The system of combining the clues to form new clues to piece together bits of Ivry's past memories is really satisfying.
- I enjoyed the story

Cons:
- Translation can sometimes be a little off grammically. It's not a big deal, but  it is a little immersion breaking sometimes.
- While the vocal track that plays in the background is hauntly beautiful, it's the only song you'll here for most of the game.  
- Objects and furnature often have multiple places to click and it's not always easy to tell. Just try clicking everywhere  the interaction icon shows up and you'll be fine.
- A few of the puzzles have really obscure clues. I had to look in the guide section once or twice.

- The largest problem is that there seems to be an encoding issue in the game that causes 4 small cutscenes  in the 2nd half of the game to not play. Most of the info about the story can be figured out without them but it's stil a shame.
One of the game's guides that are post on steam has links to the missing cutscenes though.


Overall, this game is far from perfect, but I didn't come in expecting it to be. It's free and it's short while providing a story experience that is well worth the small time investment it asks of you.

25648757.review:
A pretty straightforward point-and-click game. But a very good one at it. 

The music keeps composing itself in the background while you progress through the game, making for a great ambiance. This is basically the greatest feature in a already great game. Even if point-and-click games are not your style, this mechanic alone makes the game worthwhile.

The point-and-click mechanics are really good too, with a clue association screen that serves to propel the story onward and to connect the dots. The story is a little all over the place at the start, but it does come down to something good. 

Try this game, you won't regret it. The only thing you will be sorry for is that it's short. Let's hope that this company keeps producing this kind of point-and-click games in the future.

[h1]DONT play this game after midnight with your music volume turned up high. Seriously, the doll singing got me real hard, i had goosebumps throughout the game.[/h1]

[b]Price[/b] is a point and click puzzle game about Ivry who wakes up into a nightmare. His sister is missing, he's locked in her room with only a candle to light his way and to make matters worse there's a creepy doll locked with him in the room. 

[h1]PROs[/h1]
✔ Cool AMV intro
✔ Enjoyable gameplay
✔ Awesome, well-done graphics
✔ Great soundtrack although a bit eerie
✔ Challenging puzzles
✔ Free to Play

[h1]CONs[/h1]
× Awkward story translation? I'm not sure if it's a translation problem but i found the story rather badly-written. The plot is there but the delivery is quite confusing. The transition between ECIRP and PRICE is awful. The game also ends rather weakly. I think the story is great but the gravity of the unfortunate circumstances Ivry experienced failed to make an overall impact. 

Still, 8/10. Price is an entertaining game you have to try.

25610835.review:
前言，某天实在闲得蛋疼，dota弃坑了，饥荒只剩我一个了，一眼瞄了下steam看到有部国产解密，而且免费欸，果断下下来玩了，发现是个很不错的作品。

先说重点，关于吧主贴剧情分析中没有的，兄妹之间的关系。从一开头我只是觉得这对兄妹只是苦苦生存相依为命，但是男主从艾娃床上醒来，情侣的塔罗牌下是兄妹两牵着手的图，我们的爸爸的那幅画只有男女主和一只玩具熊我总感觉种种迹象都在暗示我这兄妹俩绝对是那种禁断的关系啊！而且兄妹俩相依为命十几年，我爱你这句话不像是一般兄妹之间会说的话啊。

在回忆中我觉得爱娃的大概意思是：大家都很喜欢哥哥，但却不是喜欢哥哥本身，而是哥哥的曲子罢了，而只有艾娃爱哥哥的全部，有一天哥哥病了，要死了，但也只有艾娃会关心，只有艾娃能关心，艾娃必须要救哥哥，因为哥哥是艾娃的唯一也是全部。也许这兄妹之间的感情甚至更在禁断之恋之上。而且，我觉得正是这种深刻而扭曲的爱情才会招惹来恶魔，才会值得恶魔亲手来收割，在这种强烈的爱意驱使下妹妹甚至愿意与恶魔进行交易，哪怕这个交易的代价很大，哪怕她要亲手杀了哥哥，沦落地狱。最终恶魔收获了美味的灵魂。

呵呵，猫（恶魔）什么的最讨厌了。。。

通篇攻略下来大概一个半小时吧。第一周目我花了一个小时，二周目进入节奏后攻略速度变快了。在这里我必须吐槽，一周目的时候我智商捉急了一下，我玩到玩偶那里我就知道是要用刀子破坏的了，身经百战的我早已洞悉一切，但是我却：诶？玛德道具怎么装备啊，为什么怎么点都没有反应。。。

在反复存档退出，疯狂搜索地图，外加退出到游戏标题界面，试图找游戏操作介绍，过了半个小时后，我干！原来是切换到那个道具上面就行了啊，WTF！而且游戏还一直播着略诡异的BGM，初听感觉还不错，但是一卡关心情不好再一直听着实在觉得烦躁，嘛不过这大概是我自己的问题，但是弱弱的说一句。。。我觉得装备道具好歹提示一下装备成功嘛。。。我根本不知道装没装上去。。。

最后，哼，身经百战的我怎么可能会被虐到，作者你过来，别害怕我只是给你加个祝福

25602596.review:
고스로리풍의 포인트 앤 클릭 어드벤처 게임.

고스로리틱한 게임의 분위기가 인상적이다. 그림체 때문에 처음엔 일본 게임인가 했는데, 놀랍게도 중국산 게임. 고스로리풍의 분위기가 괜찮은 편이다. 오프닝은 진짜 애니 한 편 제대로 찍어놨다. 게다가 의외로 중국어 더빙 연기가 괜찮았다. 어디까지나 의외의 범주. 고스로리풍의 아름다우면서도 공포스러운 분위기를 표현하려 했던 듯 한데, 아름다운 건 성공했어도 공포스러운 건 좀 모르겠다.

게임 자체는 전형적인 포인트 앤 클릭 어드벤처 게임. 좁은 방을 조사해서 아이템을 획득하고 필요한 곳에 아이템을 사용하는 방식. (아이템은 필요한 곳에 자동으로 사용되는 듯 하다.) 진상을 파악하는 증거와 실제로 사용하는 아이템을 따로 모아나간다. 조금 번거로워보이긴 하지만 획득한 증거들을 합쳐가며 게임을 진행해나간다는 점은 나름 신선했다.

하지만 보이는 것과는 다르게 플레이어에 대한 배려 역시 불친절하다. 커서가 고양이발로 바뀜에도 불구하고 상호작용이 가능한 오브젝트를 정확히 분간해내기가 좀 어렵다. 아이템을 '장비'하는 방법조차 제대로 알려주지 않아 이것때문에도 조금 헤메게 된다. 퍼즐 자체도 직관적으로 풀어나가기 어려운데다가, 줄거리도 어딘가 맥락없이 진행된다. 설정이 조금 뻔하게 느껴지는데다가 엔딩이 굉장히 황당하게 마무리된다. 

그래도 무료 게임치고는 정말 준수 퀄리티를 보여주는 게임. (게다가 도전과제도 쉽겠다...)

25596898.review:
Price is a free, short game with an interesting story to it divided into two parts. When I say short, the time I have in this game is how long it took me to beat both parts and get all acheivements. Progress is made by solving puzzles by using items, the environment, and combining clues. Clues and Items each have their own menu. Here, you play as Ivry. There are a few other characters, but you only really see him.
Pros
+Story
+Background music gets more in depth with progress
+Easy to get into and finish. (Walkthroughs available on Steam if you need help... damn drawers)
Cons
-Have to go to main menu to access part 2. (I actually had a black screen until I clicked and was at main menu)
-Some puzzles unclear.
-Translation? There's no english audio, but there is english text in game and subtitles for cutscenes, but I feel like it's a bit off. Probably grammar issues mostly.

Overall
Game is very short, as I but a little over an hour into the game to finish it. I loved the short story it had. There are some darker, creepier elements to the game as you explore that add to the story. Overall, I'd rate it a 7 or 8/10 as most of the Cons are just annoying bits. There's not much to gameplay, just explore and combine clues, so not much for replay value (until you forget half a year or more later).
Final Score 7.5/10 for story.

The art is good. The animation isn't. The music would be okay if the sound settings did anything other than on and off, or if it wasn't constantly blaring. The story is terrible, part of that seems to be bad translation, and part seems to be because it's just terrible. The gameplay is bad, it's the silly, classic, nonsense mix-and-match of old adventure games. It's not scary, there are indeed jump scares (which are not even jump scare scary because they play out like cutscenes), and it's fun in the sense of like, if I was in a retirement home, it would be slightly better than dying.

Is this like somebody's college project? Cuz I'm really getting that vibe. "We have to make a video game for class but we all want to be AMV directors." You're getting an F.

25588535.review:
残酷黑暗的致郁系童话

优点

免费好评
背景音乐多声部和声+通灵感很应景
画风……还不错？


缺点

剧情缺乏张弛。虽然中间部分通过穿插回忆和转移视线试图让紧张感松弛下来。但周边诡异/紧张的环境因为没有合理解释来化解，因此一直给人一种一线紧绷的感觉导致到后面都麻木了……

作为找线索类游戏，线索间和物品间的关联逻辑性不够好。功能类的联系由于物品说明中的提示不够，需要很跳跃的思路才能联系。形状类的联系却直接通过描述直接漏包袱了。文字类的联系说得过于隐晦，比较难跟上那个思路。
而且总体操作略微笨拙。最后一些关联完全是通过试错法完成的。
中文配音捧读感略强，有些出戏。

音乐的确不错，但入原声却让人感到有些犹豫……

因为流程也就一个小时多，所以推荐试试，如果觉得那个体积没啥问题的话……

25584514.review:
【一句话概括】小时候——要死了要死了——诶妈碰到个卖安利的说信安利得永生——结局（原来是个放高利贷的）
【关于主线】
[spoiler]哥哥因为肺痨重病，担心哥哥的妹妹遇到了魔法师（卖安利的），被授予了禁术的匕首，因为安利说那个禁术不能对死人用，所以就得趁活着的时候……所以是妹妹杀了哥哥，然后哥哥的灵魂被放进了人偶（魔法师按照哥哥样貌做的等身人偶）里，而那个禁术是有代价的，但是如果哥哥一辈子不知道真相，那妹妹的代价就不会被触发，所以如果不继续探索真相也就是玩二周目的话，俩人就能一直在现实中幸福生活下去，但一旦知道了真相，代价就被触发，妹妹偿命，哥哥变回人偶再次死去，所以等于说是哥哥最后亲手害死了妹妹	[/spoiler]

【关于一周目背景】
[spoiler]一周目是辅助用的迷香，让哥哥在梦里给其一个假的认知并模糊相关记忆，让哥哥觉得自己是活着的，妹妹是死了，让他记不起自己死了的真相，至于为何是“让他觉得妹妹死了”这个认知，估计是迷香认为这样他就会放弃探寻真正的真相，而的确一周目结尾，即使哥哥心中存有恐惧也仍然装作不知道妹妹是鬼也要陪着她一起生活下去	[/spoiler]

【关于二周目背景】
[spoiler]主页君认为是妹妹可能哪天忘记点迷香或者恶魔偷偷减弱了迷香的作用（收高利贷的哪有那么多耐心等个几十年hh），让哥哥看到了房间的真正样貌	[/spoiler]

【几点大家容易误解的】
[spoiler]1.妹妹直到二周目结局前都是活人
2.哥哥一周目结局醒来后一直和妹妹生活在人间，只不过是以魔法人偶形态
3.魔法师和格林不是一人
4.兄妹小时候被送进了孤儿院，但哥哥长大后因为音乐天赋很高，所以有了自己和妹妹的新家（其实他也算富帅嘛，对，没有高└(:3」┌)┘）
5.格林抱着的是小女主啦w在Liars里他不是把女主带到幻境后重新养大了她么♂
6.妹妹不是病娇，这么小的孩子只是怕一个人被留在世间，更何况是一直为兄为母的哥哥
7.猫为何被关在柜子里，可以理解成魔术师阻碍恶魔诱惑哥哥开启真相之门的一层魔法？
8.因为哥哥并非活人，所以渐渐地吸引了一些游荡的亡灵在他家中。也就是各种诡异现象的缘由了。
9.开场动画是哥哥的梦和预示	[/spoiler]

【二周目结局后如何了？】
[spoiler]妹妹的灵魂被恶魔收走，永远在地狱承受折磨无法转世，哥哥的灵魂徘徊在人世间也无法转生，死生不复相见_(:з」∠)_魔法师不忍心自己的作品被丢弃在这里，回收了哥哥的人偶卖到了商店里，人偶身上残存着恶魔的力量但没有意识，几百年后被The liars的女主买回了家，被女主唤醒并拥有人格的格林正式诞生。

这个故事告诉我们不能贷高利贷（。	[/spoiler]

【关于PRICE的真正含义】
[spoiler]1.大家都猜得到的【代价】英文，一周目因为哥哥想要探寻真相，所以代价启动了一个【P】字母
2.游戏只有一首BGM《安魂曲》，游戏每解开一个重要谜题，就解放一个声部，分别是
【P】iccolo短笛
【R】ecorder直笛
【I】va艾娃人偶
【C】larinet单簧管
【E】nglishhorn英国管

集齐5声部直到二周目结局停止循环，变成死神演唱的管弦真·安魂曲，虽然需要玩家有一个比较灵敏的耳朵，但其实回去看图片，乐器上都有写着英文~
等到【PRICE】收集完毕，艾娃也要支付她相应的代价了。	[/spoiler]
没转完，大家有兴趣可以去看看   转自 http://tieba.baidu.com/p/2856277653

25581362.review:
[url=https://cowlevel.net/game/15ec3e05c03e23f82851571f22db31ac/review/1932110][b]转载自奶牛关的个人评测[/b][/url]

[h1]前言[/h1]

一个半小时左右通关吧...我觉得吧，完全可以不用上免费游戏的。

[h1]介绍[/h1]

整个游戏流程分两个阶段，每个阶段最终目标就是走出所在的房间（？）当然，整个游戏的重点是在以这个目标为前提下，在房间进行四处的搜索，整合线索，装备收索出来的物品去开启新的场景物品这样。随着与周围场景物品不停交互的过程中，推进整个故事的剧情，艾玛在是谁，艾玛在哪，为什么自己的记忆如此混乱，现在究竟是个什么状况。

[h1]体验[/h1]

由于只在一个房间里四处搜索，在这种场景空间有限的前提下，制作者采用的是随着剧情的推进情况，可能会给对同一个物品的交互产生不同的情况。这点是好的，因为若只是无序的收集产品物品，会显得游戏过程过于简单，让玩家无脑的点点点然后差评。但另一方面，采用这种有序的方式是要求要有一定设计的，我觉得这部分制作者就没有考虑的很周全。所谓有序的意思是，你在随着剧情推进，可以在过场动画，或者后面收集到的文图信息，将玩家的思绪再指向那些玩家可能或必定交互过的场景物品上，而不是让玩家自己去一个一个点，这种指向是可隐晦可明示的。但若是完全没有，就容易给玩家的游戏过程附上一堆无意义的点点点的寻找当中。

整个游戏是音乐还是很不错的，至少我是很吃这套...入了17腿的OST！这种音乐实际上应该是属于教堂音乐的一种偏流行化的变种（...或者说是哥特乐？但其实我对哥特乐的理解是它跟教堂音乐是有交点在里面的。再考虑到整个游戏的画风，大概哥特乐可能是正确的答案......）。很容易就能听出来那种教堂或者教会这类地方所需要的那种让人有种体验到何谓神圣的感觉。

[h1]剧情[/h1]

[spoiler]关于剧情，我觉得其实也没啥好讲的，实际上我自己也没有搞懂是一个什么结局，到底是在人界还是在个什么地方...大概是地狱吧。反正这种东西，具体真相到底是什么也不是很重要，对于我这种没有妹妹的人，也没啥好想的。但是里面关于美人鱼那一小段我倒是有点想法：虽然最终美人鱼变为泡沫消逝而去，但我觉得也没什么好遗憾的。美人鱼做出选择时，若是已经考虑到可能的结局，自然没什么好遗憾的。没有任何考虑就做出选择，必定自己的愚蠢付出代价，也没什么好遗憾的。王子做出的选择，虽然挺人渣的，但世上本来就存有人渣，遇到也不出奇，也没什么好遗憾的。所有做出的选择，都必定不存在绝对好和绝对坏的。谁知道王子就算娶了美人鱼后来的生活会如何，变为泡沫消逝或许是更好的结局。[/spoiler]

[h1]吐槽[/h1]

我觉得应该是我自己的问题......这一个半小时游戏过程我卡了大约有半小时那么多？原因主要是我不不知道原来有些场景物品时需要改变当前的装备物品才能解锁的......所以，开头的提示还是要仔细看啊，不然就会被坑。

还有，黑暗风格和恐怖风格，应该是不混合的吧。难道窗台突然扒个人影，或者头突然掉了就是恐怖吗......这游戏还是比较偏黑暗风的，恐怖我倒是没看到哪里有..

25581071.review:
本作為哥特風的恐怖解謎遊戲。[strike]其實一點也不恐怖，兄妹萌得將恐怖要素全壓過去了。[/strike]

作品的文字量不多，約一篇短篇小說。謎題不算難，流程就是找東西→合成或放置東西→劇情推展。

章節分為上下二篇，上篇為童話故事般的假結局，而下篇才是真結局。只要將二個篇章完成就可以獲得全成就，約一小時即可完成。

音樂相當襯托故事背景，能感受到兄妹情感的糾結哀愁，不過玩破一輪後再回去聽一次OP才發覺劇透到爆了，這是素材不夠多的宿命嗎？

整體為上乘之作，雖然故事量不多且為常見題材，但是在優美的音樂與細緻的插畫的幫助下，吸引玩家坐下來好好聽聽這對兄妹的故事。

評分：9.0 / 10.0 (5分以上推薦、未滿5分不推薦。)
扣分原因：
◆ 人物配音還能加強──特別是貓──講難聽點，已經到達破壞氣氛的等級了。(-1.0分)

25580335.review:
Having not played a classic adventure game in awhile, I enjoyed the game a lot.  Mixing the genre with horror and classic music was another surprise.  As is typical with many of these games, some of the puzzles asked a lot from the player to solve them, more than seemed reasonable.  I certainly wouldn't have finished the game without help.  Additionally, you sometimes have to re-inspect things after story moments to get new results.  Sometimes it's intuitive, othertimes it seemss random.

It's worth noting the audiovisual presentation, the music is pretty, although there were some cutscenes where it was competing wwith other music, and the art is highly polished particularly for a free game.

The game is short, but it's worth noting that the game is basically as long as it wants to be.  Would you rather the game have an extra 5 hours padding out its story for the sake of length?  Espcially for a free game I think the length was perfect.

25567724.review:
At first I was endlessly frustrated by the puzzles.
(It wouldn't be a good puzzle if you didn't get frustrated now and again!)
Then as I listened to the mild music that made you feel the need to look over your shoulder and went into the story I found myself entranced by it. Although dark and with a pinch of madness I fell in love with this sad tale. Of course I find some things by all means foolish in the story (Not the way the story is but a characters personality).
This is due to my interest in psychology though, nothing to do with the game.
Artwork was fantastic for a free game, the atmosphere was somehow spot on with the way it flowed through. I cannot recommend it enough, for a short game to get you through an hour or two of boredom, I would say play it. And come back a year later to play it again.
Other than having to download Codecs to see the cutscenes and wishing the voices could be turned off (or maybe I missed that)

9/10 in my book. Or maybe I'm easily pleased.

恐怖游戏，晚上想睡好觉的各位，千万别玩！尤其是妹控！

==========================================

据说我给差评很多人不服气？那我就详细说说，涉及剧透！这游戏是压抑你的情绪，触碰你的心弦的恐怖，主要原因有以下两点。


其恐怖元素用到了“魔鬼的交易”这个话题，这是悲剧中的常客，特点就是压抑，一点点消磨掉你所有的希望。尤其是放在恐怖的环境当中，本作更是没有小说中一步步慢慢给你希望的环节，直接跳到恐怖的死神来临的剧情。

游戏当中更是用日式恐怖的最高境界，替身娃娃来增强恐怖的画面，之所以说是最高境界是因为是血腥的娃娃！不仅有挖眼球，断头断臂，还有睁眼流血这种恐怖的死状。

以上所有，如果你是恐怖游戏爱好者当我没说。

25564834.review:
[b] Wow! [/b] Just wow! PRICE is a horror point and click adventure with beautiful art style and an immersive story. The atmosphere and sound are just perfect. For roughly 2 hours you can completely lose yourself in this game. On top of that PRICE actually has no price and the experience is just priceless! (Sorry for that one)

I heard about cutscenes missing in the English version, but since I'm not sure about this myself it won't affect my rating. People say they're important to the story. Maybe they're in already, when you're reading this or maybe they never were missing, you probably won't notice anyway. I think I understood the story pretty well (according to what I read in the steam forum), so I don't think there should be a problem.

Recommended for everyone who likes puzzle/horror games. If you don't, play it anyways. Pretty sure you can spare less than 2 hours for an awesome game.

[b] To the devs: [/b] Since I'm German, I couldn't help but notice that most of the German texts are pretty... Well, they're just not German. I really love the game so I'd be happy to help with those translations. I don't know whether you want/need help, but if you do just tell me.

Edit: Yeah, there actually were some cutscenes not displayed in the english version, but it's fixed now. There shouldn't be any problems understanding the story now.

25555055.review:
After reading GaoKao.Love.100Days, I've grown a soft spot for Chinese works. PRICE just so happened to be free, so I decided to check out what it was about.

I found it pretty hard to figure out what sort of game it was initially. The screenshots on the store page didn't help much, but PRICE is essentially an atmospheric horror point-and-click adventure game. Note that I said atmospheric, because while this game has very little in terms of scares, it makes up for it in its ominous atmosphere and a tad of shock value. PRICE actually does more of an effort to make you care for the main characters than it does to scare you, which I can praise.

As a point-and-click adventure, it's decent. The puzzles are fairly challenging, although I had to briefly look up a walkthrough twice in order to finish the game. One thing I do like is that when checking some objects, you can find clues that tell you about what exactly is going on between the protagonist and his sister. You combine these clues together to form an assessment of the situation, which I think is a clever idea to tell the story. 

The game's artwork goes for this sort of gothic-anime hybrid. Combined with the fact that the game seems to take place in some Germanic residence, it makes for a very interesting style. The cutscenes are nice as well, although sometimes the video gets glitchy and choppy for some odd reason. There are only three songs in the entire game, and the one you'll be hearing for nearly the entire game is Requiem. It's not a bad song, but hearing it over and over again as I try to solve the puzzle grates my ears. They try to vary things up by adding instrument layers to the song as you progress, which is a neat idea in concept, but it's all you hear, and you'll be wanting to turn down the volume to avoid going insane.

Overall, PRICE is a decent game. It's forgivingly short and not terribly difficult, but it has some flaws that may hurt the quality of the experience. I suggest giving it a try, if only to see if you like it. If not, then I don't blame you.

I want to recommend this game, I really do...
It has amazing music (except they play 1 song on repeat), great art, and a fairly decent story.

But the puzzles... Awkward clue combinations that make no sense. Clicking on every possible item to get a reaction. Unobvious clickable areas (looking at you 3 drawer dresser). I would have really enjoyed this game, if I didn't spend all my time switching back and forth between playing and the discussion thread.

首先来说说这个游戏的特点：1.解密较简单 2.作画音乐都很棒，音乐很棒，气氛很完美 3.流程短 4.免费。所以这个游戏我是很推荐的，尤其是音乐，感觉真的非常棒。剧情一般，因为有一些没解释的地方所以我觉得还是不太完整。只能靠自己的猜测圆一下了。但是看了微博的解释之后我反而觉得更迷惑了。

下面来说说我最不理解的地方。[spoiler]剧情很简单，哥哥得了绝症，所以妹妹和魔法师做了交易，杀了哥哥并将灵魂封印在人偶中，这样就能永远在一起了（雾）。。。代价没有说明，我从物品中推断应该是自己的生命。所谓永远是妹妹和哥哥都是人偶。但是这样的话就说不通了，哥哥是如何发现的呢？一开始哥哥在妹妹的房间中苏醒，并发现了迷魂香的存在，想必就是这个东西迷惑了哥哥。那么问题来了，如此病娇到哥哥和自己都不放过的妹妹，为何会忘了放迷魂香导致哥哥发现真相呢？看了解释我的迷惑更深了，解释里说是妹妹忘了放迷魂香，忘了，了……就这一点我实在是没办法相信，原来整个故事就是因为一个粗心的妹妹引起的血案？[/spoiler]

最后就是结局：[spoiler]哥哥得知真相之后崩坏了，只剩下了一个空壳人偶，被那个魔法师捡回去了。然后呢？哥哥和妹妹的灵魂呢？剧情好像没说明，我看解释说是他们死了也是永远不得相见。那么这所谓永远的意义何在？果然还是无良魔法师忽悠人的吧！不过对于我这单身狗来说还是很欣慰的……（完）[/spoiler]

25541294.review:
一向支持国内独立游戏。然而这款真是爱不起来。
这个探索节奏拖沓的一塌糊涂，开局又没有什么能立刻吸引住人的地方。
你并没有一个能抓住人眼球的招牌，开局却都是陈旧套路，玩烂的套路，真没什么能让我更多停留的点。
界面切换并不流畅，是用心，然而体验并不好。
还有使用物品和合成，真心辣鸡……
开局觉得音乐不错，然而房间里一直徘徊着小女孩的低吟真的怪吐了。氛围并不好好吗。还不如RPGmaker的魔女之家和ib来的爽快。


可能前面没玩完就这么评价不公平。
这次耐着性子玩完了我来补充下：
这个CV真的很差，我不信大天朝人才济济，专业的就算不谈，粉丝里找不出个能听的。
谜题之间逻辑性真的不强。
在二周目调查会出现BUG，左右滑动两个会向相反方向移动，如果是制作人别有深意当我没说。
还有人物的表情，搞的想悬疑悬疑不起来，想有爱有爱不起来，不伦不类，十分突兀。
唯有剧情差强人意，但也是老东西，而且里面的人物和突发事件都让人觉得匪夷所思，矛盾而不合逻辑。

25540192.review:
(WARNING:  You will need a guide due to video clips within the game being removed from the English version, thus removing a few vital hints.  And no, this game made it a little hard to write a negative review about.  Agree if this review was HELPFUL. Comment if you believe I'm just a hater...which I'm not.)

[i]Price[/i] is a free point-and-click adventure game that tells a story and mystery...a story of macabre nature.  That said, this IS a horror game with a super eerie vibe.  Now I mean no disrespect to the developers (who did a great job on this project), but horror is not something that works well for me.  (And the omitted clips even included a super sad/horrific ending, without which just leaves the consumer in confusion)

The artwork is really good, the backgrounds are well done, and the game is without bugs.  However, there are puzzles where you'll ask yourself "How was I supposed to figure that out?"...which you'll unfortunately run into a few times without referring to a video walkthrough...in Chinese/Japanese (until the inevitable moment where someone records an English walkthrough sans animation clips).

Now, the music adds more instruments when you hit vital points within the game.  It'll get annoying as you struggle to find out a vague answer to a puzzle, but in some regards, it's also nice...sadly, it doesn't pass in my book.  It does add to the creepy atmosphere and...well...me and horror don't mix...


PROS:
+ Free (it's worth the [i]Price[/i]...get it?...GET IT?!...I'll shut up forever...)
+ Achievements
+ Short

CONS:
- Missing material from the English version
- Cryptic puzzles that make no sense (like [spoiler]inspecting a frame to a fireplace BEFORE the fireplace...before a clock...[/spoiler])

Now, to compare this to another title, [i]Price[/i] is like [i]Miles Edgeworth: Ace Attorney Investigations[/i]...except more cryptic...  If you want a free game with achievements, feel free to play this title.   I, unfortunately, do not see myself revisiting this title...

3/10  A well-done horror point-and-click that...only made me uncomfortable.  It's NOT a bad game, I just didn't like it.

25540078.review:
Fiquei impressionado com a qualidade deste adventure/puzzle game, não somente por ser um ótimo passatempo - mesmo que sendo curto - mas por ser de graça!

Aqui temos um contexto gótico criado quase que em forma de visual novel (não chega a ser uma, mas pelo fato da carregada utilização de artes presentes em mangás e animes poderia facilmente se tornar uma se feito com outras mecânicas). Como falei, aqui não temos uma visual novel - como muitos talvez pensem ao ver os trailers - mas sim um adventure/puzzle bem à moda antiga, onde clicamos pelo cenário acumulando objetos e guardando-os no nosso inventário para depois combiná-los ou utilizá-los na resolução dos puzzles presentes no jogo (e pode esperar que aqui existe uma boa gama).

O jogo é bem curto, mesmo. Daria para terminá-lo em menos de uma hora - com certeza - se você vir a utilizar um walkthrough (passo-a-passo), mas eu não recomendo, pois estragaria definitivamente a imersão no jogo e ele serviria de nada, afinal o fato de ficar "quebrando a cabeça" atrás de uma resolução para os puzzles aqui acaba por atiçar o nosso entendimento diante da trama (que aqui pode ser bem complexa se não for bem interpretada), portanto é crucial que você realmente vasculhe tudo lendo todas as pistas (aqui temos uma ferramenta obrigatória onde teremos que misturar pistas para obter formas de avançar no jogo, ou melhor, respostas mais "claras" para podermos avançar na trama) e lendo todas as descrições de objetos.

Alguns enigmas podem ser um pouco desafiadores se não houver uma boa percepção de cenário: aqui precisamos estar atentos a tudo, clicar mais de uma vez nos mesmos lugares (principalmente depois de cutscenes) e interpretar bem certas imagens. Vi gente reclamando que o jogo não mostra onde você precisa clicar, e isso - ao meu ver - é uma justificativa muito fútil para não gostar do jogo, pois essa modinha de apertar com um botão e no cenário aparecer todos os pontos de interesse clicáveis com uma lupinha ou sei lá mais o quê é algo bem recente e apenas permite que o jogador permaneça desatento (tudo bem que sempre há exemplos onde podemos arrancar os cabelos imaginando onde deveríamos clicar para obter algo, mas não é o caso deste jogo). Por isso que eu disse que aqui temos uma jogabilidade baseada nos clássicos: esteja atento em possíveis pontos clicáveis diante do que você possa estar procurando e, se quiser utilizar algum objeto com algo no cenário, apenas o selecione antes no inventário.

Bem, acredito que é isso. [i]PRICE[/i] - repito - me impressionou por conter uma trama curta porém complexa e instigante, possuir méritos que muitas vezes apenas podemos observar em jogos pagos, como: uma excelente trilha sonora e arte caprichada, e por - obviamente - possuir tudo isso e ainda ser de graça. Você só não irá gostar deste jogo se realmente não for fã de resolução de enigmas, não gostar da arte gráfica ou dublagem oriental (que neste caso é chinesa), ou for chato mesmo pra reclamar de qualquer coisa porque - fala sério - ainda temos achievements para desbloquear aqui. Não tem desculpa para não jogar. Pelo menos dê uma chance, fica a dica.

25539748.review: PRICE is a very short but highly engaging point and click adventure game. While it only has two levels, they are both of decent length and it is very easy to get stuck on some of the puzzles. This difficulty however, is what makes such a short game so fun. It has a pretty interesting story that I only wish was developed further, but it serves its purpose for this short game. The visuals are quite nice and there is a bit of voice acting in the game, although it is in Chinese (I don't know if it's Mandarin or not). Most of the music is quite good, although the same repeating track during the levels get's annoying after a while. Overall, this is a good puzzle game to pick up if you're willing to spend 2 hours or so. I hope the devs come out with more, the game has a lot of potential.

+ Awesome opening to draw you in
+ Nice art-style
+ Touching Story
+ Free

- Short
- Easy to get stuck


It is a nice click & puzzle game which was translated.
It is short however the length comes from how quickly you search the forums when stuck or if to give your brain a challenge.

Some puzzles are hard, others are easy to figure out, I was stuck at first until I found out your bottom menu affected what happens when you click certain things when other items are conencted, this may turn people off but it is easy to get used to.
However this makes it a game breaker as if you are easily annoyed then you will most likely rage-quit after each new step.

It is free, give it a go. The story is nice once you understand it but could not help but see Len as the main dude here.

怎么说呢，这是我第一次在Steam上玩解密游戏，更是我在Steam上玩的第一款国产游戏，这个游戏很简单，就是点点点。期初我发现不能跳CG时，内心是崩溃的，因为我不喜欢等待，但是当我认真去玩这款游戏之后，我发CG又是不可或缺的，它能告诉你很多跟游戏剧情有关的信息，而当我细细地品味这款游戏之后，我们会发现，这款游戏有着一个完整的剧情，当我们在看了这个剧情之后，第一个想法就是——狗血，没错，这游戏的剧情就是狗血。但是在当我们去细细品味这狗血的剧情之后，我们又会有一个想法——狗血，但是不讨厌！那么在我们不讨厌这剧情之后，我们再继续第二周目，最后迎来这款游戏真正的结局。
如果有不喜欢剧透的玩家，请不要将鼠标移到黑条上，以免造成不适。

25533114.review:
NOTE: This is a non-spoil review that was made without the paid DLC and created on 9/16/16 during that current update build.

WARNING: DON'T GET THE DLC IF YOU DON'T KNOW CHINESE! 

PRICE is a point and click puzzle detective game. I've encountered random bugs such as being unable to save and losing my progress and some glitches "maybe?" that might have been intentional or not. The game is free and only takes an hour or two to beat. The actual puzzles and other gameplay mechanics appear cryptic, but not impossible. The story is entertaining though and feels like a visual novel of sorts. Visuals are OK but the font and text seem a bit janky and out of place sometimes. There are two parts of the game that features two different but identical rooms, but after beating the game, it seems that it has no replay ability at all. Overall, it is a quick game and free game that has a horror asian-like indiegame feel.

Verdict: 7/10

25531135.review:
The music is pretty nice and the art and the story are okay. The real issue with this game lies with the puzzles wherein it fails in almost every aspect. 

1) You have to click on objects in order to discover new items. But some objects have more points which can be clicked on. This, however, you cannot see. For example the fireplace. You think you interacted with the object but in truth it has another hidden thing.

2) Item usage is very unnatural. You always have an item from your inventory selected. You can inspect an object. But if you suspect there are other things you can do with it, you just have to cycle through your inventory. It would have been better you just select and item from your inventory and click on the object like in normal point and click adventures.

3) Certain objects only become interactable after a certain event (like with the closet). It doesn't really make any sense.

4) Certain puzzles (and clues) are too far fetched. For example, it's illogical you cannot combine the key. Instead you have to combine some (weird) clues before you can use the key.

I would say the puzzle aspect is pretty mediocre. Because this is the core of the game I cannot recommend it.

25530462.review:
音乐：虽然只有一首，不过本身就是经典级别的音乐确实全程都不会感到厌倦。
解密难度：除了2个地方特别难看到和某个地方提示居然没法在解那个密时查看之外并没有什么难的地方。
吐槽：开头的OP一下子帅我一脸，于是我跑去群里直播玩。全程最吓人的地方就是摸衣柜出配音哪里，真心吓一跳，前面和后面的都没啥。群里某人一周目时觉得BGM好吓人，然后玩到二周目说都已经习惯了23333333。最后，游戏出过一次致命BUG，就在我二周目时拿完最好拿的所有东西后拿着半张安魂曲去点钢琴，然后不知道为啥弹出个报错，说有致命BUG出现，然后按任何键都只能让那个对话框显示或消失……导致重玩了1次二周目
游戏挺好玩的，免费太好评了！成就也相当好拿，剧情……也还好。

剧透上面写的难点：第一个：[spoiler] 一周目里的说没火导致有点冷的火炉附近的发条。[/spoiler]第二个：[spoiler] 第二周目的剪碎的乐谱旁边的墨水瓶[/spoiler]没法解密时看的指：[spoiler]有4个空白框的画框下面的那个铁条的字[/spoiler]

25530126.review: 对于本人正值中秋佳节缺面对这一对打折的游戏却一毛钱都没有的无奈，我凑热闹一样的下崽了这款免费游戏，起初我并不知道该游戏的类型，看宣传图的画风挺对味，就很冲动的下载了他，进去一看我才傻眼了。第一感觉这是一款恐怖游戏，但本身解密要素大于恐怖元素，凭借自己在多款游戏中的摸爬滚打，自己通关这游戏并没有费太大的力气，不过故事吼虐啊，病娇兄妹控什么的真是太可怕了，本以为这款游戏会非常治愈，结果自己同类型的漫画偶尔看看，也就有点乏力了。免费游戏也做的非常棒呢，就是流程略短，叫我如何边玩边挂卡，期待以后还有第三章之类的吧，开发者大大心里也要阳光一些。ps：黑猫的配音好欢乐使我瞬间出戏，也支撑着我玩通关了~圈一波粉~

25527916.review: 第一次玩时，我以为只是一个无聊的游戏。当我已经玩完这个游戏时，才发现，这其实是一款很悲伤的游戏。从故事剧情来看:妹妹为了救哥哥死了，永远徘徊于地狱，而哥哥则活在梦里【迷香大概就是这个用途】，梦里和自己的妹妹在一起，这个妹妹应该是真货，之前在镜子看到的那个东西大概就是妹妹的灵魂。在哥哥得知真相前，这个梦永远不会醒【即为【永恒】】。这是我的个人理解。二周目玩完的体会是：希望制作组再多创新点这游戏的剧情比如dlc新剧情，表示没玩够，支持夜兔制作组的下一部。总体评价就是：bgm很有创意，第一次玩让我有点惊悚的感觉，心里麻麻的。这其实是一款兄控，妹控的游戏。不错。好评。

25526848.review:
[h1] PRICE [/h1]

Is a free puzzle game made with KIRIKIRI Engine...
This is a point n' click game where you find things by clicking until you find it...i mean really until you find it...
the puzzle on this game is really difficult at some point and really need patient...
the music is really fit the environment...and a bit annoying

i love the art...for a free game the art is quite great but at some point the emotion of character is a bit too bright(?) for a dark environment game...but well...it's his character anyway!

i love how the story keeps me to not quit the game and hooked until the end...though the puzzle is really a pain but worth it...

Well...if you really interested and just stop by to the review section because you don't really know if you should play the game...
then i say YOU MUST TRY IT XD
it's rare to find a good puzzle game with a great story in free to play section...so if you get a free time or waiting to update your big sized game...then take a coffee and cookie, sit in front of your PC and enjoy this game :)

Overall 9/10
Recommended (y)

25523593.review:
+ 契合游戏氛围的优秀配音([spoiler]hanser prpr[/spoiler])
+ 契合游戏氛围的优秀配乐
+ 契合游戏氛围的优秀美工
+ 令人难以想象是free game的优秀过场演出(结合原画风格来看的话,目测原画和过场演出的是v家mad的制作经验者?)
+ 免费,说实话这诚意这质量收费真没啥问题,而且反正官方有免费下载,steam这边不如弄成像片道勇者那样,供想要支持制作组的fans专用的充值信仰的地方


- 谜题设计的些许不合理之处. 比如只有在立起某个flag之后,调查某个地方才会有效果,否则无论调查多少遍都没用,而相关flag和因其解锁的调查点之间并没有能让人联想到一起的联系,所以不看攻略的话,最笨的情况只能每推进一点就重新翻一遍房子,如果改成在立起某个flag之前,那个地方不能调查的话,会亲切很多,虽然这样看起来就成了一本道的线性游戏了([strike]本来不就是[/strike])
再比如说整合线索那里,有时候你已经猜到剧情了,但是那两个线索竟然不能整合........
- 极短的流程与单薄的剧情. 嗯作为一个创作者其实还是比较理解剧本同学的痛处的,毕竟像这种全手绘的游戏中,若是增加剧情量的话,美工原画那边的工作量估计会呈指数级增长,所以剧情篇幅肯定不可能很多. 而要以少量篇幅构建一个具有可信度 能震撼人心的故事,就算是对大咖来说都是项困难的工作,因此剧本担当的痛处是可以理解的.
不过,作为玩家来说,既然已经让我们见识到了这么棒的演出,音乐,原画以及配音,自然也会期望同样等级的剧情. 所以,如果制作组还打算制作类似题材的游戏的话,建议可以像《死亡之舞》那样通常流程部分用rpg制作大师一类的来做,这样在增加剧本量,保证剧本有发挥余地的同时,也保留了其它的优势([spoiler]more hanser! please! (拖走)[/spoiler])

25522995.review:
点击类解谜游戏，流程较短，两周目，1.5小时左右即可全成就通关。
剧情发展比较出人意料，[spoiler] 是那种你看一半觉得能猜到走向，但故事完全不按套路走的类型 [/spoiler] 几次转折都令人印象深刻。
文本作者功力不错，寥寥几句就可以把气氛渲染到位。
谜题设计精巧，有些谜题误打误撞解开之后，回头再看才发现有提示，巧妙的提示确实让人拍案叫绝。
总体来说难度还算友好，部分调查事件需要解开前置线索才能触发的机制增加了一些游戏难度。
美工方面，大部分内容非常精细，小部分内容画风诡异。
音乐很棒，与游戏流程完美贴合。
OP、ED的演出非常精彩。
总体来说，这是一款精彩的游戏。确实内容稍显简单，而且有一些小问题，但是能看出制作组所蕴含的巨大潜力，值得支持。

O jogo é bem criativo. Arte e música são bem encaixadas e história é interessante. Mas só. Não me envolveu em nada simplesmente, mas gostei do jogo como um todo, isso não posso negar.

Os puzzles, que são o tema central do jogo, são bem feitos, mas um poucos chatos demais. Resolvi praticamente todos sem precisar usar a cabeça, simplesmente no método de tentativa e erro. Principalmente na parte de juntar as pistas que o cenário lhe dá conforme seu personagem investiga.

Embora todos esses problemas e acertos que o jogo possui, seria injusto da minha parte dar uma nota negativa para ele, devido a todo carinho que claramente foi depositado. Mas posso afirmar que daqui a poucos dias vou esquecer esse jogo para nunca mais lembrar. Não adicionou nada pra mim.

P.R.I.C.E.
P.R.I.C.E., court conte morbide soutenu par une bande originale et une illustration sublimes qui donnent envie de refaire le jeu en boucle.
Le concept est simple, en combinant une série d'indices et objets vous résolvez des énigmes afin de sortir Ivry de la pièce où il se trouve et découvrir son histoire et celle de sa soeur Ivy. Il faut également être attentif, même pendant les phases de cinématiques.
Le jeu ne présente pas de bug notable, il y a peu de commandes à utiliser et il est assez facile à comprendre.
Un jeu disponible en Chinois simplifié, en Japonais et en Anglais que je recommande vivement si vous aimez les histoires tragiques.

39529142.review:
PRICE is not a terrible game. If you are into this kind of thing you should play it. The reason why I don't recomend it is because it feels like an unfinished product. It's obvious that the game makers wanted a stylistic approach to the point and click puzzlers and they got it. The issues arise in the story, translation and gameplay mechanics. First off, I'm a fan of the art style, but the one opening cinimatic is used three times in a row if you watch through before opening the game. It's uneccesary and highlights that they may have not had resources to make a second visual. That's fine. Just play the visual once then. The story seems to be very choppy. It's due to the game mechanic. It's like most point and click except you have two inventories instead of one. One has ideas/clues and the other has the items that are used to solve the room puzzles. It would have been better to have been able to pull all of these up on the same screen, you page through the different menus alot. It just means that the classic drawbacks of the point and click genre are doubled along with the frustration when you have missed something... but then it turns out that you forgot to combine two clues before using an item in a particular place. 
Story-wise, I have to say I'm biased against this sort of story. There isn't anything new here, which I don't really mind, but its a classic case of taking a fairytale and twisting/changing important facts to better suit the storywriter. I wont spoil which story is referenced, but it truly did nothing to add to the story at all, in fact, it seemed like a huge stretch to include  this tale into the storyline at all, which keeps it from standing out.
Anyway, again. Not a terrible game, but you could be playing far better.

40963332.review:
Fantastic music and a story that sucks you in.  It's definitely worth the time, even though so very many free-to-play games aren't.

The only real issue I had was that the item use system wasn't very intuitive.  Setting an item as the active slide in your tray, exiting, then clicking whatever you want to use it on isn't something I'm used to.  Once I got the hang of the item use, the game progressed quickly.

All-in-all, I greatly enjoyed this game and am looking forward to playing other titles by this developer.

40757669.review:
I wouldn't call this a game, more of like an interactive novel with tricky puzzle bits. It was fairly straightforward, with me only getting stuck on a couple of points. It's basically two "escape the room" situations one after another, but with a neat story to make it interesting. Unfortunately, I figured out most of the big twist fairly early on, except that I got the... err... "intended person" mixed up. (I thought it was the father). I'm not going to spoil it here, you'll just have to play the game. The whole thing took me just less than an hour.

I must admit, the story is about a brother and a sister who love each other very much. Perhaps a tad too much. Then again, the game is set in China so maybe it's a case of different cultural customs or something, but my eyebrows were certainly raised at some points.

As a free game, this is really done well. I contemplated purchasing the design collection, not because I particularly wanted it, but because I thought I should tip the developer for a job done well. In the end I didn't because I spent too much on other games.

Oh yes, and it's got that "YOU MUST UPDATE YOUR VIDEO ENCODER" thing warning. I don't know, my video's pretty standard and I played fine for me.

40613650.review:
[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
The first 10 minutes of this game are quite enjoyable. Unfortunately, after that point, it becomes very repetitive. There are too many clickable objects in a single room. I haven't count them, but I would guess there are at least 20. The worst part is that most of them aren't even a clue. After you investigate an object, it will still remain clickable. This causes you to click the same object over and over again, because, most of the time, you are completely clueless about what you should do. The ‘puzzles’ feel like a boring trial and error task to me.

After you unlock a clue, a new clue becomes available to discover. This basically means you have to click the 20 objects in the room again until you find the new clue. I have to admit, sometimes it is quite clear which object you have to pick. [spoiler]You should open a locked box after you've found a key[/spoiler] However, sometimes it feels extremely random. For example: [spoiler]the piano isn't openable when you first investigate it, but after you've discovered some unrelated clue, the dude suddenly sits down at the piano when you investigate it again.[/spoiler] 

Another weird mechanic is the way you need to equip your items. You click on them in your inventory and exit the menu. Then, your item is then ‘equipped’, but there is not indicator to show the player which item they are using. Here is another example: [spoiler]you have to click on the petal in your inventory to equip it. Then, you need to click on a table to put your candle on the table. This causes the (equipped) petal to expose a code, because it is near the fire. This feels illogical to be discovered by a player to me. I eventually found the clue with a little bit of the trial and error method, but I had never thought of using the candle to expose the code on the petal myself.[/spoiler]

[h1]Music[/h1]
Speaking of repetition, when I first heard the girl sing the 'creepy song', it made me feel a bit uneasy (which is a good thing, because it's a horror game after all). However, the song continues throughout the whole game! The creepy effect completely disappears, it becomes very annoying to listen to. Which is a pity, because the effect is cool, but just not for such a long period of time. It would’ve been better if the song stopped once in a while. Silence can be just as scary as a creepy song. The game does have some silence moments and other sound effects, but not enough in my opinion. This game definitely needs more variation in sound effects and music.

40465558.review:
[b]PRICE[/b] is an interesting [b]puzzle game[/b] about a boy named Ivry who wakes up from a nightmare and finds himself in a weird room. To escape from fear and darkness, he has to search and explore on his own until he discovers the truth and finds his sister, Iva.

There were a lot of thoughts put into this game, including [b]unique animations[/b], really [b]beautiful character designs[/b], [b]interesting stories[/b] and a [b]cool soundtrack[/b]. But, to be honest, the [b]art is amazing[/b].

This short and amazing puzzle game lasts [b]barely over an hour to complete[/b] and the best part is - [b]IT'S FREE![/b]

[b][u]Also don't forget[/u][/b], after finishing E.C.I.R.P. [b]you unlock the continuation[/b], so, go again in menu, click the Start button and play the second part of the game (P.R.I.C.E.) aswell.

Now, for those who don't understand yet what happened and couldn't enjoy the game as its full potential, let me explain you in few words. - [b][u]!! SPOILER ALERT !![/u][/b]

[spoiler]Ivry was dying from tuberculosis. Iva, his 13 years old sister found a wizzard and made a contract. Iva killed Ivry, put him into a doll and Ivry entered an illusion living a happy life with her...until he finds out he is dead. According to the contract, once Ivry finds out the truth, Iva pays her soul and Ivry return to death. End of the sad & beautiful story.[/spoiler]

40350366.review:
It's a mildly dark story game, but due to personal preferences, length, and some awful sound quality, which is ironic since I'm pretty sure the music was supposed to be a selling point, the game was not appealing to me. The puzzles can be stupid because of the unintuitive item system and the fact that some of the things you're expected to click on in order to progress are not very easy to find, especially when they're RIGHT next to or on top of already clickable objects. Not to mention that some of the puzzles might not trigger correctly without doing specific things first, which makes the aforementioned puzzles even more of a nuisance. And the jumpscares are completely out of place and a waste of time.

At any rate, I'm glad I got it for free. The art is neat, so if you like the art style it might be worth looking into, since it might only take you an hour, tops.

40306002.review:
Hm, this is an interesting little "escape the room" game about a boy who wakes up in a creepy place. He can remember fragments of his sister but not much else. You click on stuff, combine things and try to figure out what happened. PRICE was made by a small Chinese team and they did a good job with the production values. You have well-animated cutscenes, full voice acting (!) and the usage of sound to create an eerie atmosphere is nice. 

The actual gameplay is okay, but it would perhaps be better if names appeared when you hold the mouse cursor over objects, showing exactly what's interactive. Also, certain tasks need to be completed in a tricky, not-exactly-logical order, and even though this game is barely an hour long I still got stuck and had to look at a guide.

The story isn't bad but is kind of confusing. I sort of understood it, but had to do that thing where I look at forum posts afterwards to try to figure out exactly what happened. I suppose if you've played a lot of these games or read a lot of shoujo/horror manga you might find parts of it cliche - ie, the brother and sister who love each other a little too much and the flowery European setting, which probably seems "cool" to Asian audiences. 

The thing that you find in the closet as well as references to a certain famous work of literature were well done, though. I enjoyed those. 

Overall, I'm not sure if I would pay money for this... But as a free game it's worth a look. It's better than an actual escape room that I went to in real life recently, so there's that.

Мрачная, темная и очень интересная история из 2х частей, исследуйте комнату, находите вещи, связывайте и вспоминайте, что же произошло с вами и вашей сестрой.  

[b] Плюсы:[/b] 
[i]+ Бесплатная.
+ Классная рисовка и музыка.
+ Интересная история.
+ Легкие в получении достижения.[/i]

[b]Минусы:[/b]

Играть определенно стоит, игра слишком короткая, много времени на нее не уйдет, а взамен вы получите приятные впечатления от пройденной истории и "идеальную игру".

40061150.review:
1小时两周目通关，说实在的感觉浪费我1小时时间。
总体来说这款游戏为纯粹的女性向游戏，至少在我玩的解谜游戏中没有哪个和这个类似。
游戏的BGM开始听比较惊艳，但贯穿游戏始终无变化，即使在有配音和八音盒放音乐的时候音量一直比较大，感觉不太和谐。
配音整体来说比较出戏，虽然一直就没怎么入戏吧。
谜题给人没有什么逻辑的感觉。
操作相当反人类，头一次见使用物品是这样的方式……
剧情方面看很多人说二周目泪目了……实在不知道这个泪目的点在哪。

总体来说，游戏有些矫情，恐怖元素基本没有，连一个jumpscare都没出现过。可能因为性别的关系，是在GET不到女同胞的点。
优点可以举出很多，缺点也可以举出很多，不过我认为，作为一款解谜类游戏，莫名其妙的谜题和蹩脚的操作，基本就算败了。

+ 不错的BGM
+ 中文配音
+ 画风尚可
+ 免费

- 莫名其妙的谜题
- 操作不流畅

40015684.review:
PRICE是由夜兔游戏制作的一款恐怖解谜骨科小游戏。游戏有两周目，每周目都只有一个场景。但就是这么两个场景，你将见证一场来自地狱的骨科故事。由于解谜游戏靠的就是剧情吸引玩家一步步发现秘密，所以剧情方面便不过多透露。所以本文重点介绍游戏特点。


慎得慌的游戏氛围

哥特式的画风，还有环绕在耳旁的小女孩的低吟，让小弟不敢在深夜里自己玩二周目。由于氛围塑造得当，明明简简单单的寻找信息，却比突然闪出一个人影还要吓人。建议深夜带着耳机玩该游戏，你会享受这个游戏的。


轻微改变的解谜方式

解谜过程在一幅横画上进行。在一般解谜游戏的点点点操作的基础上，加入了线索整理，两个线索可以合成一个新的线索，而新线索产生时候，会有剧情动画，通过剧情一步步探索真相。而相同于其他解谜游戏，你搜寻到道具也能触发一些事件，有个比较坑的是游戏的道具，你选择完，就是默认装备了，刚开始我还傻傻的打算拖动。


因人而异的游戏时长

算上二周目游戏只有60个左右的关键点，算是比较精简的。但就这么一些关键点，非常容易卡关，比如像我这种热爱解谜游戏，头脑又不发达的人来说，卡关还不是轻而易举。游戏在一开始，就能让你探索十几个事物，而你获得一些装备，这些装备又都可能重新触发这些事物，所以，当你毫无头绪时，你根本就不知道，要用什么装备触发什么事物。而游戏也没难度的选择，对一些玩家来说，就过于不友好，如果事件与事件之间更加紧密，或者有发光小提示，这样应该会提供更好的游戏体验。


个人吐槽带剧透

[spoiler] 结局压抑的不行，是，骨科的伟大，是无私的。但却把自己的兄长困在一个虚幻的世界里，有想过等到他醒来发现一切一场空的悲痛吗?这种强加别人的爱，真让人又悲又叹。[/spoiler] 


不客观评价


剧情：7分。骨科的力量是伟大的，但是有些过于扭曲。
画面：8分。哥特画风很赞，而且画得比较细致。
音乐：8分。氛围的塑造，这背景音乐有一半的功劳，特别是小女孩略微吞口水的声音，毛骨悚然。
游戏体验：7分。有些难，很容易卡关，小弟也就卡了5、6次关卡。为了通关，还特意去百度找攻略。
性价比：10分。 游戏免费 还有什么好说的，感谢夜兔游戏。

总分：（7+8+8+7+10）* 2 /10 = 8分

40010133.review:
[h1]The short and narrow:[/h1]

It would take longer to write a detailed review than to finish the game. It's free, but if you are very concerned about 
quality level of the story, puzzles and content or have no time to waste, like an hour or two, then I wouldn't bother. 

It's not great, but really short, mostly solid and it's free and if you are curious about anime type adventures it's probably a good place to start or finish. There were a few bugs.. That reared their ugly heads by an absence of trailing dots in little boxes.. It's a rather weird concept with typed inputs in a game that do most of the thinking all by itself and at first I was a little happy about it, but it dulled my mind and made it harder to think.. 

Personally I have had enough of just one play and unless you really love this kind of anime it has no replay value. It was an interesting experience. I was a bit impressed about the arts and decors and it's pretty obvious that whatever tiny budget this game had was put to great use, but it's also marred by some really out-of-character, cartoonish, silly and juvenile avatars that puzzles me more than the game, which for the most part seems pretty solid. 

[h1]Prologue[/h1]

Usually when I start playing a game I make some notes with first impressions. A habit I got from playing some really anoying games where I was in need of a lightning conductor. Sometimes they are very rude and aggravated, because I write in the immediate past-tense as I play the game. Unfortunately I don't type as fast as I think.. And I didn't know that the game would be so short. 

[h1]First Impressions:[/h1] 

Download and installation is fast. Took a few seconds. I think my shoddy connection just had a brain-fart. 

Game starts in 1280x720 window.. Stylish and pretty with a soundtrack, that isn't really bad, but just really out of place compared to the old fashioned theme, arts and feel of the design. Graphics looks pretty nice, there is clearly an artist with a good sense of direction at play here.. 

And then it begins.. It's very quiet except for a few rustling sounds and short dramatic ouvertures at critical points.. Every time I interact with something I see boxes. Boxes with texts, thoughts(?), outbursts(?), appear, but no voice. Sometimes the boxes have faces that seems far too rough around the edges, cartoonish, silly and juvenile. Fortunately they are short and few, but still so out of place that I feel like the intended age-limit for this game got hammered down to about 7-10 years old. 

Suddenly a big box with stylish decors and a horribly out of place title called "Tips" in cyan colour appears with three ordered bullet points.. I can't be bothered to read it, because it's in the category of pampering, I ignore it and forget about it not to ruin my experience, but I feel like it's breaking up, that help was way too soon and out of place. Anyway, on with the game. 

I get started on the adventure.. Point and click.. Walking animation begins, with whomever I am, to the point of the click and then followed by a quick slide to the center.. It hurt my eyes and feels like my eyeballs get pierced. Five minutes in and I am already having small issues.  

Art and decors looks pretty nice, but something is a bit too rash. I examine everything more than once. Sometimes there is room for more clicks, but mostly it just display the same thing except in the few cases where I picked up something there is a message about nothing else of interest. 

The cursor changes according to the object.. When it turns into a bear claw there is something to examine, but it can be a little hard to see what it is exactly, because there is no highlight. Sometimes the interactive area is rather big and it's hard to tell whether it's just a big blob or a collection of tightly packed individual entitites. I click on a lot and sometimes there is more than one thing packed away in the interactive areas. 

After I picked up a lot of stuff from places I had already examined another piece popped up and a whole sequence played out with investigative moments and finding new things, that made me feel like I was just robbed of a pivotal adventure experience. I wonder if the developer thought if figuring all that out would have been too diffiicult for the player or it was just the confines of a very tight budget kicking in. At another point I fixed a music box and a new point of interest appeared that basically just said "Meh" before disappearing on click.. I moved on to mixing things.. And a voice appeared, speaking something in japanese I think.. A lot of it.. Having done everything I can do in this room I am somehow stuck. There are two passwords in this game that eludes me and I have to look up the solution for each. It's quite bizarre with a game that dulls your mind with cute mindless anime and then you suddenly have to think, what came after was really quite boring and sentimental. 

Adventure is a pretty big word for this short and paperthin interactive novel, but it had its moments.

39879230.review:
这是一款国产的较为简单的恐怖解谜游戏，全程靠鼠标点击来进行游戏，流程较短，双周目的设定好评（有一种表里世界切换的感觉），游戏以操纵哥哥艾弗里来探寻兄妹俩身上发生的故事，但在这个过程中却以各种物品与回忆的形式重点塑造妹妹艾娃的性格，以至于妹妹全程没有出现（除了结局），但是妹妹这个人物形象刻画得反而比哥哥艾弗里更加鲜活清晰。游戏触发的回忆剧情采用复古的画面感与线稿的搭配虽然看上去比较简单却不简陋，氛围还是比较到位。

但是游戏的UI与剧情还需要进一步加强，具体想说的有以下几点：
1.	道具栏左右划动的按钮使用起来手感非常生疏，改成向左右的按钮会好很多，如果要使用鼠标拖动滑动的话也非常不灵敏，操作起来略微生硬不够流畅，影响游戏体验。线索整合界面虽说界面清晰易上手设计得不错，但是缺少退出键，要按键盘“ESC”才能退出，既然定位是一个点击游戏就应该更好地解放左手。而且无论是道具栏还是线索栏中都没有自动循环浏览的设定，一旦浏览到了最后就要往回倒回，这些步骤有些多余且毫无意义，建议设置循环浏览，将之简化会更好。

2.	关于游戏场景切换的的设置建议设计成鼠标拖拽切换与原有的左右按键切换两种方式双管齐下会更好。

3.	入场动画的蝴蝶贴图太粗糙辣到我出戏了。

4.	输入密码的界面建议模拟机械密码锁而不是这个数字密码锁（不符合场景，会出戏）而且，就像之前说过的，为了更好解放左手也不该使用键盘输入，鼠标拖拽即可。

5.	自动触发的剧情小图片以弹窗（漫画分镜）的方式呈现十分有趣，美观的同时还略微增加了一点故事性，剧本很不错，不足的是情节与人物感情的铺垫略少，伏笔有是有但代入感并不强烈，节奏较快，玩家的感情与对情节的理解有时并没有跟上剧情流程。

话又说回来，这只是一款免费游戏而已，又是国产游戏，谜题与氛围都比较到位，打个好评推荐还是毫无问题的，该制作组的新作：无终之旅据说是这个的前传，也推荐给大家，我已经将该制作组加入我的关注名单了，游戏质量确实是挺不错的，值得多多支持。

39864850.review:
好评是打给cg、画面、动画、界面和音乐的。哦对了还有免费……对于我这样一个穷学生来说这可是福音。
反正这游戏的优点都给别人说完了，我就来说说不足之处吧。

怎么说呢，其实我个人不是很推荐这款游戏。

它的开场op和开头动画可以说是极尽华丽诡异，有种怪诞凄然的美。
但这没啥用。只会让人对游戏的体验感大失所望罢了。

简单概括下面吐槽的内容：

大概就是一个包装精美的盒子，你通过上面的一小块塑料膜可以看见里面的食品，它看上去非常诱人而且是免费的；可当你把它拿回家打开来一看的时候，却发现里面的食物居然只有透过塑料膜可以看见的那一小块，而且还只是看上去诱人而已。
于是你只能感叹，哎，没办法，毕竟是免费的嘛。


当我看完宣传片，也就是游戏开场op的时候，我以为我会欣赏到一部能让我享受很长时间——起码得有三四个小时的优秀作品。但是我错了。
emmmmm？是我太聪明还是你的谜题太简单，或是你的剧情太短？一个章节半小时啪叽一下，一个小时就两章全过了啊。还有一个很大的问题，就是这部作品它没有对于操作方式的明确指示，导致我在不知道如何进入第二章节的情况下打了两遍第一章。
时间短倒也不是问题，毕竟像《魔女之家》那样的、只要四十分钟到一个小时左右就可以全部通关，却给人以惊喜的杰出作品也是有的。但是人家《魔女之家》好歹把故事讲清楚了，你这个不明不白突然啪叽一下跳出来的、有关这对金毛兄妹的各种设定……很遗憾大概是我太笨我反应不过来。

总而言之，这部作品可能是想要表现一出爱恨情仇的绚烂感人剧，但篇幅实在太短，导致交代得突兀而不清晰。

谜题说不上很新颖。是满大街随处见的类型，这里就不多说。

不过反正是免费游戏，要是你觉得你缺钱且时间充裕的话，可以试试这部作品。不过，寸金难买寸光阴，所以我真的不推荐它。

说得难听点这就是部靠脸吃饭的作品。
以上，纯属我的个人观点。请持客观态度阅读。

It's basically freeware with a budget. And it's not that bad.

Not really into the whole 'sibling relationship [strike] wincest-esque this is not Japan guys! [/strike]' thing going on here since the game is so short, but I get the gist of the story and it may be fun to make some theories on what the hell the story was about. But after unlocking all the achievements, that is about it when gameplay is concerned.

If you want to kill about one-and-a-half hours of your time, then maybe its worth? I didn't really buy into the story and probably everythinig else apart from the production, but if you're looking for a decent looking freeware game that could run on PC's built during the dark ages, then this could be right up you're alley. I'm already betting some dosh that most of the budget was on the art and sound if there is seriously nothing redeemable about this [strike] 'made by the slaves of the Chinese' [/strike] game.

39739622.review:
先说一句，憨色宝宝小天使么么哒！
画风非常漂亮！与其说是哥特式不如说是巴洛克式更加恰当一点（人物瘦得像洛可可），让我想起我的一位在意大利读研的学姐，她的画风就是这样的，华丽中带有一丝诡异。
过场演出和音乐都超棒！让我简直不敢相信这是全免费的游戏。为这么小的一个游戏设计这么繁复的包装，可见制作组是花了不少心思。
以上都是我推荐的理由。
以下都是我不推荐的理由。
解密反人类。
有的时候你手上的线索齐了，却什么都干不了，因为你没触发某样剧情……感觉就像是为了剧情强行拖时间……
有些东西必须调查两遍，而且还没有提示，让人在房间里疯狂抓瞎。
解谜方面的逻辑设计跟那些经典作品《特工A》、《锈湖》系列比起来真的算作业余。好在这个游戏很短，精美的演出和憨宝宝萌萌哒的童音足以抚平玩家的焦躁情绪，但夜兔的下一部作品就没有这么幸运了。
没有硬核的内容，再完美的包装都是虚假的。
金玉其外，败絮其中。
望工作组能够重视这个问题，努力改善玩家的游玩体验，而不是固执的在包装上下功夫，走上一条不归路。

39737505.review:
PRICE is a point and click adventure about two siblings. The older brother, named Ivry, awakens from a nightmare in the room of his younger sister Iva. Without memory, the player now tries to escape from the room and to find his sister. Genre-typical, the player will look out for various hints and items that he must combine to solve the various puzzles. The game also has some light horror elements, but they are pretty harmless compared to other titles of the genre. The music is actually above average. Especially the intro song is very good (it also fits the atmosphere of the game nicely). Graphically, it is based on an anime-like style that is quite acceptable.

The game is neither very long nor difficult, but the end leaves room for enough interpretation to be enjoyable. PRICE is also free, so you can't do much wrong.

39721753.review:
Short, but a really nicely put together little game, impressive for what it does considering it's free. I'd love to see YETU make something lengthier that can really flesh out a story and its characters more, even if they need to charge for it. I really did like the art, story, and atmosphere we got here, though.

My only complaint is that it can be a little hard to tell sometimes when there are two interactable objects right next to each other - I spent a little bit confused an unable to make progress because I didn't know that I could get another item if I moved my mouse just slightly to the right. But it's still a pretty minor complaint! Would reccomend, and will be playing the sequel, too.

39720393.review:
这个游戏并不需要花费你太长的时间，大约一个小时左右，就可完结。
游戏整体上偏向于黑暗抑郁的风格，尤其从画风就可以看的出来。
作为一个解密游戏，它的解密元素并不是太难，只要耐心去找，很轻松的就可以破解迷题。
剧情上，对于我来讲，并不是太出彩，第一章还没玩玩，就可以大致推理出后面的结局。没有任何让我惊艳的地方。但正如大家所了解的，这只是一个小游戏而已，只是简简单单的向我们陈述了一则黑暗风格的小故事而已，对于抱着休闲心态的玩家，简单又带点黑暗的小故事是在好不过了。
对于人设，我只想说：受受的欧尼酱和可爱的妹妹真是太和我胃口了。这种有着贵族气质的金发碧眼的萝莉和少年，真的是一个很棒的人设。
最后希望制作组可以在剧情上下点功夫，补全世界观以及让玩家意想不到的剧情，黑暗风格又让人猜不透的剧情真是在好不过了



最后，来讲一下本作的最大疑点


为什么连电灯都没有的中世纪，会有着直到20世纪30年代才发明的螺丝刀？只其中一定有更深迷题和阴谋！

39700828.review:
So PRICE is a free game, that is heavy on it's puzzle elements with some loosely interspersed dialogue to explain the plot and scenario.
The game is not intuitive to play in that normally in puzzle games when you need to interact with objects your cursor will change. The cursor only changes to show "interactive" areas and does not reflect a change when you choose to interact using an item. This confused me immensely in the beginning as I was not sure if the item I had selected was actually active or not. Eventually you do get used to just highlighting the item on the lower menu however it seems strange without it showing on the game screen.
Some of the interactive areas are also quite close together and due to the angle (side-view) it is sometimes hard to click on what you want, especially since the general area outside of your lamplight is obscured and some regions are never exposed to the light (especially if they are near the ceiling or low to the ground. Combined with the fact that the mouse cursor isn't exactly accurate it can be a little frustrating at times.
The puzzles themselves are not especially difficult and mainly just mean that you need to pay careful attention to detail, (which is not hard to do considering the beautiful in game art). The only frustrating issue was backtracking unintuitively to previous areas you had interacted with to just observe them again rather than interact with a new clue or object you had discovered. i found this somewhat strange. 
The clue combination is fairly simple and makes a great deal of sense though, and I enjoyed this aspect, as the additional art and information is nicely presented.

The graphics are lovely, rendered in a standard style for gothic anime, which suits the elements of the story. The only issue is the cutscenes which try to experiment with a few different visual styles that are jarring and don't really lend to the aesthetic or meaning of the game. As well as occasionally jerky animation from Ivry as he walks across the screen, that seems a little unpolished.

The story itself is cleverly imagined (the importance of symmetry to show the relationship between the two characters). The integrated items that illuminate the plot and make the games plot cohere excellently. However the relationship between the two characters at times seems disturbing, it is somewhat too intense for a normal sibling relationship, and yet the game does not explore this aspect in detail at all but merely glosses over it. The framework device of a father telling his daughter a story is barely integrated at all, and seems tacked on, which I wonder at since it would have cost addition time spent animating and recording/directing, as it is entirely unnecessary. 
Overall the plot reads much like a short story, with a weird fairytale twist, using standard genre tropes such as cat familiars/animated dolls and amnesia. It takes itself seriously though and the game can be forgiven its unoriginality since it utilises the premise well. The only problem would be the vague Christian references alluding to hell, devil-pacts and the tarot or witchcraft... that seem to be simply appropriated by the game designers without thought to broader ramifications of the culture and religions of which these form a part.
The characters are a little simplistic and shallow, and I didn't really identify or feel a great deal of empathy for them. This is partly that they conform to a standard Dickensian plot... but also that I simply didn't have enough time to truly begin to care for them due to the shortness of the game. It's a pity but not a major one since the subversion of one character at the end is decently executed, if not particularly surprising.


The sound is well done. The effects such as creaking doors, sliding drawers, footsteps etc are lovingly produced. And even the bgm is quite nice... initially. However later on the song becomes repetitive and annoying, after 20min of play I was frustrated by it and ended up turning it off, since the loop is too short. 
The voice-acting was quite good, although I did struggle with the Chinese dialect (it's a little different from the Mandarin pronunciation I know), but that is due to the large number of dialects and even then enough emotion was carried through by the actors convincingly.
The translation to English is quite good. I had no problems with the spelling and although some of the dialogue felt a little forced, (which is true for many direct translations from Asian Langauges to English) they still flowed and it benefiied from keeping the dialogue simple and relatively straightforward. The German parts remained in German which I appreciated. The initial description of the commands is a little clumsy near the end where it fails to completely describe the interaction commands, but other than that it is well done.

The game seems to have some problems with save bugs as I tried to save the game and it did not do so. It's an annoyance... again but not a major issue as the game is quite short. I see more people say it takes them 40min to play through, however it took me 70min. So it can be played in one sitting.

As a free game this is highly recommended, and even if it had a small price tag it would be worth a purchase. It's also recommended to check out its successor (albeit not a prequel/sequel) that delves into the mysterious character you meet at the end of the game titled "The Endless Journey".
